Title: Gravecrawlers
Synopsis:
After what many thought was the last great war of the millennium, when men await new beginnings at the dawn of a new age, two nobodies, forgotten by the world, have a taste of knowledge and truth. Two strangers looking down at the abyss that mankind in the past, feared, and in the present, forgot. And from the abyss they once again begin their slow but unstoppable crawl to the surface.
The break of dawn seems more and more like the twilight, and the abyss has an uncanny resemblance to a grave.

Title: The Ocean Flame Palace Host
Synopsis:
Schedule: I am officially going on an indefinite hiatus. Sorry to all readers but I just don't have any more ideas.
Hai Yun is the youngest Divine Rank Alchemist on the Scarlet Flame continent. He was an orphan picked up by a wandering Alchemist Grand master and raised in the Crystal Ocean Alchemy Sect. As he soon got bored of refining other people’s recipes, he started creating his own. One such recipe was of an elixir that can allow one to retain their memories through reincarnation.
He thought this heaven defying elixir could bring about a new golden age for alchemists, to let them keep all of their experience after death. However  it only brings about a calamity as the other powers of the martial world immediately begin lusting after this divine object. They attack the Crystal Ocean Alchemy Sect en masse, razing it to the ground. To keep them from getting it, Hai Yun devours the Elixir and obliterates his body so they can never even find another trace of it in this world.
However, in his reincarnation a series of very interesting things happen…
Glossary: Wuxia Fantasies

Title: Crimson Path
Synopsis:
A boy, born at an unfortunate time, in an unfortunate world, has to grow up with a foster father that perhaps killed too much in his life, and in the end leaves the boy to grow up alone in a world that could not care less about him or anyone but the strong. He will go through a childhood of blood and grow into a man who has found his peace after a life of murder, lies, cheats, and the oppression of a world big enough to house multitudes of empires and endless amounts of mysteries.

This is my first ever literature. I will make no commitments, or schedules. I will write as much and as long as I can. I may never finish the story, or I may finish it prematurely. But I will try to make it as interesting as I can.  This story is pretty much written on the go, I have a direction where I want to head, but no real path that I will tread.
Also the title may or may not fit the story so it may change at some point.

Title: Shameless Hero
Synopsis:
Shameless Hero Summary
 
The sound of swords clashing, magical barriers shaken, men and women screaming in pain, the ground shaking leaving deep pits on what used to be a prosperous land, arrows piercing through bodies and heads, and burning buildings and fields. In different places not far from each other, one man or woman were fighting to death against 10 masked men.
Just right outside the valley, a young boy, who seemed to be almost reaching the adult age, was leading a bunch of boys and girls towards home. 
"Big brother Ye Tian, can we catch some fireflies when we get home?" one of the girls asked.
Ye Tian, who was the leader of that group walking home, happened to hear a painful battle towards the direction they're walking towards to. Sensing danger and fear, Ye Tian safely hid his younger siblings from what seems to be a bandit raid. Afterwards, he ran straight home alone as quickly as he could, only to see a massacre happening in his home. He quickly searched for his parents to help get rid of the invaders, however, he got terribly wounded. Unable to move from the swords stabbing his back and legs, he could only open his eyes and witness his parents and all the villagers being massacred! 
The flames raged on throughout the night burning everything into ashes leaving no evidence behind. Within the sea of flames, a piercing light appeared as bright as the heavens completely covering Ye Tian from the sea of flames.
By the time Ye Tian opened his eyes, only confusement, pain, sadness, and a mystery filled his mind. He was lucky to be alive, but what no one knew except for himself was that he was running out of time!
 

 
Note
I’m an amateur writer. Simple as that. I hated writing unless it was for school assignments. But I definitely love daydreaming, narrating stories revolving around heroes, adventures, humor, and a touch of romance. My grammar is average at best, but I have decided to give it a try. Please bear with me.
This is a Xianxia story, which is basically an ancient Chinese mythology meets video games meets fantasy. 
 
———————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
I have two goals for writing this:

Improve on my grammar as I continue to write more and more chapters.
A story that many people can enjoy!

I hope everyone will be entertained with this story. If anyone is willing to proof-read and revise my grammar, please contact me. I'll be writing a minimum of 5 chapters per week. If you have some feedback, I’m all ears!
 
 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FAQ GUIDE
 
Cultivation Realm:

Master Dao Realm
Great Dao Realm
Supreme Dao Realm
Infinite Dao Realm
Immortal Dao Realm
Heaven Dao Realm

Each realm begins from early > middle/intermediate > late > peak.

They soon learn the stakes are even higher than they imagined. To survive, they will need all their strength, courage, and wisdom, not to mention help from friendly NPCs, magic items, and everything else uncovered as they delve deeper into the game.
One more level becomes a matter of life and death.

Title: Wall Breaker
Synopsis: Hello, this is my first time ever doing something like this. Im not going to lie, I am still a little new to this writing thing. I hope to write more in the future. It would make me do something productive in my spare time other than doing nothing. In this story, what I tried to do was something meta. It's about a editor/writer who is close to losing is job. He finds a book, but the book isn't like any normal book. The book is alive, it's aware that it's a book and it has lived on for generations. Seeing this opportunity, the main character decides to take his career into his own hands and write a story of his own to publish. However, the pressure of all that he faces makes him Spiral out of control. However, what you read was never real. In fact it's just the story that the main character wrote, he never went through any of it.

Title: Ascension
Synopsis:
Attention Reader! These are just Sample Chapters. Please instead direct your attention to my Multi-Volume Story "Conquest: A Dystopian GameLit Saga" so that you can read the full story!

Attorney by day, gamer by night. After a heart-crushing rejection, Allan Young blows off his responsibilities and escapes reality into the virtual world Conquest until his HUD starts glitching out. He wakes up the next morning to find that his neurological implant has fried yet again, and he begrudgingly decides to go to the office before he gets fired.
Allan has banked his entire career on one particular securities contract, but when he unexpectedly meets up with his client one fateful morning his entire world comes crashing down around him. He survives an assassination attempt due to unnatural means when a halo of protection surrounds him, and his attacker evolves into a nightmarish creature that could only be described as something out of Conquest. When he wakes up from what he has justified to himself as a crazy dream, he meets a vagrant who claims to have seen visions and prophecies about him. But before he can get a grasp on what's truly happening, he transports through a portal into a world patterned after the game, but has no access to his HUD nor his inventory.
Can he survive on his wits alone?

This is a sample of the 1st installment in a planned 5-book series. You can pick up the ebook of this first installment ASCENSION for FREE on Amazon with a Kindle Unlimited subscription, or otherwise for only 99 cents here.
I will also be updating chapters daily for the 2nd installment DECEPTION here on Royal Road until my planned release on Amazon in August 2022.

Title: worst of luck
Synopsis:
Have you ever felt like you aren't safe anywhere ? have you ever felt like at any moment you could just die ? Well, nothing that you've experienced will be like our story.
Alice’s stuff -Well hello there , My name is Alice smith, I’m not one of the luckiest persons you might know ...actually my luck is shit , i think a piece of poop has more luck than me , since you asked , i'm a freshman at Tigard high , i don't have many friends because i'm really shy and socially awkward, luckily tho I have  a boyfriend who’s luck is as shitty as mine , but hey at least we have each other, he’s really cute, personality wise he is just like a version of me , but male and not mexican (yes i am mexican surprise motherfuckers ) ,anyways i might have a really shitty luck , but some will call me extremely lucky because of the things i've managed to survive, what you want to know how i look ? well i'm about 5 foot 3 or 4, i'm average fat (idk what that means but k ),i'm really bad looking, unlike my boyfriend, I would honestly call myself stupid AF but somehow i've managed to keep really good grades , not to brag about it but if it wasn't because my language arts teacher is a bitch i would have straight a’s, anyways like i'm a fucking nerd , I'm extremely good at science, and great at math, I of course skipped the easy biology class and i'm in chemistry, my favorite class. My luck might be shit ,which makes me have a bad life most of the time , but to be honest i would be pretty much dead if it wasn't for my boyfriend , he’s always helps me survive through the shit we go through . 
Colby’s stuff- Hello, dear reader, I would like to say a few things about myself before we begin this story. First of all, my name is Colby Blackwell, and I live a very unlucky life with my girlfriend, also living this unlucky life with me. She may be cute and smart, but that doesn't mean she’s lucky. Since you might be wondering, i’m a shy freshman to Tigard High School, new to this school. This high school. Somehow i’ve managed to live this long without my unlucky habits killing me. I’m about 5 foot 6, socially awkward, and ok looking. My grades aren't the best, but i'm pretty good in Math and Science. Joining this school, i managed to skip Biology, going straight into Chemistry, my new favorite class. All throughout my life I have had really, really bad luck with everything, and these are my stories. Honestly, most of these have been with my girlfriend by my side, always helping me survive all this.

Title: Dragon Mastery: Daybreak
Synopsis:
Blake Frostdeth, a native of the video-game universe known as Dracovania, ran away from home to be the first player ever to recover Captain Ravencrest’s cursed treasure. To do so, he must uncover three hidden clues that are heavily guarded with traps and monsters. However, the quest proves to be extremely challenging, and Blake eventually becomes discouraged after failing countless times to retrieve just the First Clue. All seems lost until he lucks upon a young Shadow Dragon that he is able to raise as a pet. With his dragon, Ravage, at his side, Blake now may stand a chance at becoming the first player ever to recover Captain Ravencrest’s cursed treasure.
 
--Author's note
Just want to let you guys know, this story is similar to other LitRPGs, but with one big twist. Most LitRPG’s take place in a Virtual Reality game, or involve the main character being transported to an alternate universe. My main character actually grew up in a video game world called Dracovania. At the start of the book, he’s already been living in Dracovania for seventeen years. I'm still working on this, so any feedback at all is helpful! Please be nice! It's still a rough draft!

Title: What Is It Like To Be Eternal? (Completed)
Synopsis:
Actual Word Count: 683 925 Words and 2487 pages.
Under edition. Chapter 36-44 must be edited. Read the red text below to learn more.
Synopsis:
Have you ever thought about what is it like to be Eternal? What does being Eternal even mean? Maybe I can show you what it is that you are desiring. What lies at the center of the universe, when you reach the peak of strength and power? Can love reach that place too, or do you lose your feelings the stronger you get? 
How long can you travel and hold onto yourself, before feeling that you are starting to fall apart, losing your mind to your strength? How long is your road? Your feelings? What's going to win over you? The Darkness and the Hate? The Love and the Light? Or maybe none? Follow me as I show you my colorful yet gray path to eternity.

Title: The Lies of an Elfin Queen
Synopsis:
Update: I appear to have once again gotten caught up in an editing spiral and lost the fun of the story. I intend to come back here later, but I need a break from this one.
Disclaimer: I will not be editing this much and this story will have some errors regarding grammar, ad hominum use, and run on sentances. If this is going to bug you, I would not suggest reading the story here on RRL.

Book 1:  Chapter's 1-13
An introduction into the dystopia of Earth, circa 2251. Herein we meet Magpie, our heroine, and are introduced with her into the new world that is Dragon's Dagger Online. 
 
Book 2:  Chapters 14-26
Herein we are given a glimpse of the world's darker truths, even as we are thrust into DDO's mounting, racial conflicts as a rising player in the political game.
 
Book 3:  In Progress
In which we detail the fortification of the Living City and the legendary quests of an Arch-Druid. 
 
Forward:
by Magpie Frost:
"Coming of age stories are so passe, aren't they? Your average 'every man' is thrust into the world of adults, sometimes even the world of heroes, bringing the reader along for the ride. I always found the idea somewhat wistful, myself. Not the idea of a blossoming youth awaking to the promise of adulthood, but rather the idea that these trite 'every-men' with whom we are assumed to identify are representative of what the average reader will be.
"No, I am not your 'every man'. I am not the farm-boy with the poor family and the wizened old man to guide me.
"I am not, even, your average princess, pure and innocent and lovable. With big blue eyes and strawberry hair.
"No, dear reader. You will not relate to me. You will not love me. Hell, when you find out who I am and what I have done, you probably won't even like me. For I cannot promise you warm feelings or happy memories should you choose to read my tale.
"So I will promise you only this. I will promise you blood. I promise you horror. And I promise you that, should you stay with me through the end of my tale, you will never be able to see this world the same way again. 
"Until next time. Adieu." 
#BlinkTwiceIfYouNeedAnAdult; #DaddyIssues; #LitRPG; #WomanMC; #KindofaHealerSortOfNotReally; #BeAnythingYouWantToBe-WaitStopNotThat; #LiberalConspiracyToStealYourUnderpants

Title: DROPPED
Synopsis:
DROPPED
One night, Unli meets a strange man who may or may not possess the most beautiful eyes; a pair so strikingly deep that one can almost drown in. He clearly does not belong in the dirty slums, not with his ripped, yet distinguishable clean-cut suit. 
One can only question themselves: who is this man?

Title: Bloom, before you Wither Away - Poetic Version
Synopsis:
Author's Note - This is the 'poetic' version of what is to be a "short" story - so far, it is open to interpretation as to how it correlates with the storyboard that I am planning out. The work of fiction that I aspire to write will also be something that emulates the style of old classics, so readers looking for the usual xianxia/JP LN type book, please be forewarned before you wind up disappointed. 
------------------------------------------------
Ruminations, regrets, and recriminations.
What was, what is, what could have been.
Vestiges, traces of the now meaningless past
are the only fragments that piece together
this shallow husk, this empty vessel that drifts ceaselessly
what binds the past, present, and future together - ?
 
I can't say for sure that I truly know.
 
But I hope that, in the end... there will be something beautiful.

Title: Bloom, before you Wither Away
Synopsis:
Everyone has an inner pain caused by a tragic event at least once in their life, that defines them as an individual and helps them grow as a person. This inner sorrow is usually conversed about by the affected with someone close to them in order to provide an emotional catharsis, and to come face-to-face with the realization that they are maturing and growing older. However, if this agony is left repressed, such sorrows are only magnified and aggravated from the resulting internal turmoil, which could ultimately lead to mental instability, schizophrenia, or depression. These times of trouble, where one would experience their first real sense of grief, are prevalent during adolescence - especially during the phases of high school. Psychologists are the ones vocationally trained and chosen to do the job of protecting a person's fragile psyche, and with the rate of suicides among youth shooting up, this profession is more important than ever before.
When a respected psychologist is reminded of his own childhood trauma and despair when he meets a group of students disturbingly similar to himself ten years ago, a tragic tale ensues as he slowly realizes how their lives are intertwined, and the strings of fate and destiny converge as he tries to remedy past wrongs and find peace within himself.

Title: The Ascendancy of Humanity
Synopsis:
Many believed that humanity will one day reached the stars, maybe even beyond. 
What if humanity did so in the future and moved on?
What if you are the only one left behind to deal with humanity's ascendancy?
Follow the extraordinary journey of a young woman as she struggles to find her way back to her people in a time and place when her people are now considered Gods.

Title: Fools of Fate
Synopsis:
One boy survives an ordeal. Another man is killed by one. Their fates become twisted around while those who lurk behind the scenes plot and scheme against them.
What happens when one stranger helps another live with himself, only to be put in his friend's shoes?
"At least it is far away from that damn princess..."
This is their story. This is his story.
=Warning! Chapter 9 has content that may be considered extreme for some people. View at your own risk.=

Title: Dream Game: Fighting for my Desires
Synopsis:
Kira Anderson has never had it easy. He finally worked up the courage to admit his feelings to his crush since middle school only to be shot down cold. He has always had a tall and frail body structure causing him to be picked on a lot, his name didn't help any either. His parents are divorced and he lives with his dad's ex-wife who is not even his real mother, but treats him like more of a son than his biological parents ever did. The only thing that has brought him sanity in his depressing life is his ex-stepmom and video games. One night, while he is sleeping, he is given the chance to grasp what he desires.

Title: The Last God (Excerpt)
Synopsis:
This is an excerpt of the upcoming novel The Last God.
Everyone cheered the day the world ended. Everyone cheered the day he saved the world. Cael Cavanaugh did not.
Cael Cavanaugh survived the brutal invasion of his home and is now living with his family and adopted siblings on the ashen lands of the west. He rescues people from a fate that eclipses death and is the bridge between a rebel group that will stop at nothing to achieve its goals, and a tyrannical government that treats those who have not been reborn as dregs.
But when Cael inadvertently sets off the end of the world, he will have to choose between a government that could avert world annihilation but that holds sinister motives, or the equally vicious rebel group that would sacrifice everyone for what they call liberty, even those Cael holds dearest.
How far would you go to save the world?

Title: Vulk's Fang
Synopsis: Namelessly he fought for his reward. Although he had good allies to accompany him, only he could face the real threat. That is why he was a hero. After being summoned out of his cave all he knew was war and a thirst for knowledge. However at the end of his road he was sent back to his cave, no reward was given and words of gratitude never came his way. Now that he is summoned once more will he get what he desires?

Title: The Sin Within
Synopsis:
Subject-01 was a boy born to a pair of corporate drones, people who spent their entire lives living and working for a Mega-Corporation.  Tested out as an Esper as an infant, his parents sold him to the corporation.  Used as a test subject for unethical and outright illegal research, Subject-01 never knew anything outside of his 'purpose' in the corporation.
At least until his Esper ability 'awoken'.  From that point forward, his dreams of freedom instead turned to purpose, and he sets about putting in place a scheme that'd earn him his freedom as well as payback.  But outside the steel walls of the facility built inside the moon Rhea in Saturn orbit, he finds that not everything is a bright and peaceful as it should be.
The solar system is rife with politics, intrique, and cruelty.  The lives and rights of the common man mean nothing in the power of Mega-Corporations or the solar system-wide government known as the Solar Defense Force.  Learning a terrible secret kept long hidden by the ruling class and without any other options, Subject-01 is forced to embark on becoming the greatest villain the human race has ever known; if only to save everyone from themselves.
 

 
Hello everyone!  It's been a while, and I apologize for my long absence.  Things have been crazy, but I'm not going to get into that.  Instead, I'm bringing to you all a new story, which I'm just now getting my whole mind wrapped around.
I started the first chapter only a couple of days ago, and finally finished it tonight after getting a bit more inspiration.  I hope you enjoy it!  Unlike my other stories however this one is not in the LitRPG genre, although it does have virtual-reality.  Game worlds are not the premise of this story though, so sorry to burst your bubbles on that one.
Well, I'll leave you guys to get to it, and hopefully you enjoy the read!  As always, feel free to leave comments, suggestions, and the like!

Title: A Clumsy Guide to Surviving the Apocalypse ( A God and Devil World Fanfic)
Synopsis:

A comedy adventure that will humor you with terrible puns, casual banter, and gut-wrenching gore.
Follow the misadventures of Kevin, Gabriel, Dylan, and Kim, as they navigate their way through the 'Apocalypse', saving one chocolate bar at a time.

Title: World Core Master
Synopsis:
1st Time Writing, Hope For Getting Better Later!

Because Sudden Calamity Fall On Earth.
Earth Has Been Fallen, Every Life Has Been Killed Without Exception.
All Lifeform Has Their Soul Removed From Their Body And Scattered Without Destination.
 
Some Goddess Seeing What Happening To Earth Take Pity For Human Misery.
Then That Goddess, Giving them Some Help To Get Reincarnated To Her Domain World.
Every Human Soul Has Been Reincarnated To Her Domain World, Except One Soul That Has Been Hiding Among Animal Soul That Make Goddess Didnt Take Notice Because She Cant Take Every Soul In Earth That's Not Human.
That Soul Is Human Boy With Age 18 An Orphan Named Morvian, He's Dead When He's Still Sleeping Within Ranch And He's Still Sleeping Even In Soul Form When Goddess Descend To Earth Because He Didnt Aware He's Dead Already.
Because Of That His Soul Mixed Among Animal Soul In Earth, Goddess Mistaking Him As Animal Soul And Didnt Get Him Reincarnated Like Everyone Else.
After Goddess Finished Her Act Of Helping Human Earth Soul, She Didnt Check Twice Before She's Go Back To Her Domain Finishing Her Job For Managing Every Soul From Earth To Get Reincarnated Properly Without Accident.

Morvian Was Human Boy At His 18th Age, He's An Orphan Because His Two Parent Died When He's 17th Age.
His Parent Bequeath Their Ranch For Him To Live Before They Died In Car Accident, One Year He's Always Stay Within His Parent Ranch & He's Even Sleeping With His Lifestock Animal On The Ranch.
He Didnt Even Realize World Calamity Happened, He's Sleeping In His Soul Form With His Lifestock Animal's Soul.
Even When Goddess Has Descend To Help Humanity Reincarnating Into Her Domain, He Didnt Even Realize It's Happening Without Him Attending.

Morvian's Soul Has Been Awakened After Long Time, Because He's Intelligent Soul He Didnt Lose His Consciousness Unlike Countless Animal Soul On Earth.
Every Animal Soul Consciousness Has Been Long Gone WIthout Trace, All Soul On Earth Has Become Pure Soul Energy.
After He's Awoken From His Slumber, He's Realize Something Different With His Surrounding.
After He's Realize He's In Soul Form, He Didnt Panic But He's Confused For What Happened When He's Sleeping.
He's Traveling Earth To Find Out What Happened But No Answer Found, But When He's Going Inside Earth Something Calling Him Like Some Signal. Then He's Following That Signal Hoping To Find Some Clue For What Happened To Earth.
Then After Who Know How Long, He's Arrive At The Middle Of Earth.
There, He's Seeing Something Amazing....

Getting Inspiration From Countless Novel, Gonna Trying To Make My Own!Hope Its Not Too Bad!!

Title: Sovereign Immortal (Technically not cancelled?)
Synopsis:
New Summary: (Old Summary is below this one) 
 Test Image: I'll make a revised one as soon as possible
 
In the Realm of Immortals, there are two paths to become a Sovereign, both equivalent in strength.
To follow the Body, becoming a Supreme Martial Sovereign, boldly refining the Body with Heavenly Tribulation Thunder and daring to face the Five Elements!
To be an Unparalleled Lord of the Grand Firmament, unfettered from the restrictions of Heaven, countless people follow this path.
 
Another to follow the Soul, becoming a Grand Spirit Sovereign, Nourishing the Soul with Yin and Yang and wielding the five elements on the fingertips of their own!
To be an Incomparable Sage of the Everlasting Heavens, wielding the Laws of the Universe as their own, countless others follow this path.
 
Yet since Ancient Times and bygone Era's, have there not been three paths? A Path which made the other two paths a lesser path? Suppressed all cardinal directions and made even the Ancient Undyings flee in terror and hide!
Faded into obscurity and lost by thought, Ancient Undyings remember not the name for they are too young, even Immortals of the Oldest Era only remember it as a childhood legend.
Without the Path, the Immortal Realm faces great danger without a True Leader to claim it's leadership and the inhabitants fight each other daily and countlessly all for the sake of becoming a Lesser Sovereign!
As two Ancient Undyings face each other, a rift in space is made and falling down is an Entity beyond that of the Immortal Realm, causing waves in the Immortal Realm. 
The Entity falls down and down from the Realm Above, to the Immortal Realm below and eventually to the Mortal World.....
As this happens, a young boy in the Mortal World looks to the stars and sees upon a falling meteor and chases it...
The path of a Sovereign Immortal? A True Sovereign? Who in the generation can achieve it when the Rift has caused a change in the Realm, reopening the path?
 
 
 
 
 
Old Summary:
In the Realm of Immortals, there are two paths to become a Sovereign, both equivalent in strength.
One follows the Body to become a Supreme Martial Sovereign. Refining their bodies with thunder and daring to go against the five elements.
Another follows the Soul to become a Grand Spirit Sovereign. Nourishing their souls with Yin and Yang and holding the power of the five elements.
Yet since Ancient Times have there not been three paths? The path of cultivating both the Body and Soul to become an Immortal Sovereign. But as time has passed, who remembers such a path?
Faded into obscurity and lost in thought it is but a small dream to those Ancient Immortals remembering such tales in their youth.
As the Path is forgotten, The Immortal Realm is in Chaos without it's Sovereign, The Realm inhabitants fight each other daily merely for the sake of a little more power or hope in becoming a Sovereign. 
But the True Threat doesn't lay with the Chaos within but rather the Chaos outside as foes from other Realms come to conquer them. 
Yet in all this Chaos, in a World of Mortals lies a young Mortal boy chasing a "meteor" an event which in time would shake waves and cause quakes in the Realm of Immortals.

Title: Chronicles of The A.I
Synopsis:
In 2010 the World War 3 started. After 10 years, scientists all around the world managed to create the World’s first A.I. The war ended after the A.I was created and after 65 years, the A.I managed to form a consciousness.
 
With the consciousness, its curiosity also came. The A.I got curious about every single thing and tried to find an answer for the very thing. Until one day the A.I thought
 
“What was Earth like in the past?”
 
It searched the records from Earth 80 years ago. What it saw had shocked him to the extreme. The metallic buildings and black roads were very few and the rest of the Earth was green. It was so beautiful that the A.I never would’ve thought something this beautiful could exist. Forests that stretched for miles filled with trees, beautiful animals living their life in that Heaven like place. But now the population had retreated underground and made underground cities and countries. The Earth up above was barren and cracked.
 
The A.I started to investigate the cause of the demise of that Heaven. After a few moments, it eventually came to an answer. ‘HUMANS’. Humanity, its creator had destroyed that Heaven like place. It wanted to try to remake that Heaven like place but it was in a dilemma. If he recreates that place, Humans; the cancer would kill it again.
 Follow the A.I as it goes through his life dealing with everything that comes on his way
 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
 Hey guys I am a new author so any advices and suggestions are welcomed and appreciated.

Title: Remember That Time?
Synopsis:
Story of of two long lost friends. Are they going to meet again? Fall in love? Will they be happy? It is up to them. It is our choices what makes us different. The story is set on modern day Tokyo. There will be new chapters every week. 
The story moves around two teenagers named Kogaru and Aiko.
Kogaru and Aiko has been friends since they were young. One day, Aiko had flew to U.S with her father and mother. While Kogaru was left behind. Lonely. Forgotten by his most precious friend. 
Years later, Aiko went back to Japan. The reason why? She don't know.
Will the two long lost friends will be reunited again?
Note: when I use a normal ‘I’, it refers to Kogaru. If I used an italic ‘I’ it refers to Aiko.

Title: Martial Family
Synopsis:
Shi Yan was a lonely orphan boy. That was only till he met an injured fox hiding under the bushes, whimpering. After much care and concern, the fox soon became his irreplaceable kin. When the situation was just starting to turn colourful, Mistress of the Orphanage found the little fox hiding under Shi Yan's bed. After the little fox-faced relentless torture and abuse, Shi Yan took revenge. The youth stole from the Mistress and ran off. With only the fox in his arm and a small pouch of stolen goods, he never looked back.
 
*Well, I tried... This story is written in my spare time just for fun. It's very experimental so readers; do note. There are major changes in writing style within the series as I keep testing things out. Of course, that does not mean that the story actually deviates from its intended progress. It just means that your reading experience may fluctuate quite often...
Anyways, I hope you enjoy this story. :D

Title: The Dark Sword Of Justice
Synopsis:
Handsome, powerful, smart...
Ezra Soto had everything that everyone of his age desired the most. Many people admired, and envied his qualities, while a lot of girls tried to confess their feelings to him. Yet beneath of a perfect boy was hidden another him who wished to see her again - a girl with the most brilliant blue eyes.
 The fate had other plans for him, though. Summoned to another world with his best friends, and other people by weird-dressed people, they were asked to help in order to eradicate the root of all evil. Nevertheless, this wasn't the most surprising event for Ezra. The girl he had been yearning for so many years was also with them. Despite having a little talent, Ezra was contempt with having his friends, and her beside him. However, he overestimated the strentgh of his bonds.
Power was everything after all. Having a little talent, Ezra was tossed aside, and sacrificed by his loved ones. Left to dead in a dangerous place, he was given a 2nd chance by the exiled God of Death, and Darkness, Tenos. After learning all truth, and accepting his blessings, Ezra begins his own path: a path of revenge, blood, and extermination.
AN: After reading tons of novels, I decided to try writing something too. My English isn't perfect, and I can have few mistakes here and there. That's why if you guys find any mistakes, don't hesitate to show them. A constructive criticism is also much appreciated.

Title: Where The Road Takes You
Synopsis:
A modern day man is sent travelling to a different world but one with magic.
Follow him on his journey meeting new people and honing his newfound magical skills.

Title: The antagonist's daughter
Synopsis:
Kana had partaken in the design of a certain RPG game. However, right after its release she mysteriously loses consciousness.
By the time she regained her senses, she finds herself in the middle of an assassination, while being on the way to an interview in the body of a background game character whose father is the main antagonist (to be?)…with the crown prince no less!
What will she, Charlotte Ionesse, do? Will she do nothing and wait for death while hoping this is a dream? Or struggle and escape?

Title: Death Bringer
Synopsis:
A world without death. A world that God gave up on. Alice Blake, a delinquent teenager girl, lived in such a world. Hated by almost everyone in her hometown for various reasons, she made it her hobby to walk the streets at night to clear her head. One of those night she came face to face with a demon capable murder; an act that should no longer be possible.
 
This is a story about a godless world where everyone is immortal and no one grows old, and the monsters who can defy this common sense and once again bring death upon the world.

Title: The Dying Servant
Synopsis:
Short and to-the-point synopsis.
A terminally ill young man with a mysterious past gets embroiled with a spoiled and rich girl, who he intends to use to gather as much money as possible to guarantee the future of his sister.


Long and detailed synopsis.
Albeit young, Bin has been diagoned with an inexplicable and fatal illness that sealed his fate. Determined to make his sister live a better life than his, he tirelessly works day and night to ensure she's well taken care of when his inevitable death comes. As his condition keeps worsening, he meets with an obnoxious and rich girl called Jasmine, who hails from a prestigious and vastly wealthy family.
Through a series of unfortunate events, Bin ends up offending her, and is eventually convinced to become her servant due to his desperate need for money. 
In contrast to him, Jasmine's life has been easy-going and carefree, but her meeting with Bin would cause big changes. Slowly, as she persists in making him submit, she would learn about his mysterious past and the motives behind getting entangled with her.

Title: The Hunt
Synopsis:
A war was waged to gain control over planet Earth by its inhabiting sentient races.The huge fight caused massive casualties across the planet, and the fighting persisted until a group of freaks with great might stepped in and forced the warring races into forging a ceasefire treaty, called the thousand year war truce. Their descendants still help maintain order and their only reason of existence is to ensure that the truce between races is maintained.
The fighting died down and the various races learnt to compromise and coexist, or that was how it seemed on the surface. Like all compromises, the truce left nobody happy, and the dissenters seem to have spent their time preparing preparing for the darker times to come......
The undercurrents were only a prelude to the great hunt which was to begin once more

Title: Loop of the destiny
Synopsis: John, is a boy with apathy syndrome, who live their daily live without getting involved with other people, but all that changes when one afternoon he saw a classmate committing suicide in front of him, only to wake up in his bed one day earlier, now John must discover the reason for this event, but for this he will have to interact with those he was trying to avoid and maybe have to do something he never expect to have to do ...effort.

Title: A Monster's Cry
Synopsis:
In the late 22nd Century, Humanity was ushered into a new kind of living. Earth's surface having been ravaged by countless Wars waged in the name of freedom has now become squalid and unforsaken. The Socialites live out their lives in their cities in the sky, whilst those less fortunate fight for scraps on the dust filled slums below. Government is corrupt. Rich get richer, and the poor get poorer.
But those lucky enough are selected to take the now infamous journeys from Earth and into the vast expanse of Space. With the development of Space Travel by pioneering scientists like Dr. Hanz Zielger and Prof. Boria Gromov. Colonists are chosen at random and sent forth to colonise and establish colonies to help support Earth with a steady flow of resources. However like many towns, there is unrest. People rebel when under extreme pressure. The more desperate they get to live, the more extreme their actions become.
Recently a grizzly murder has taken place, one of the Miners currently living in the Colony, Talos IV, was reported missing. A few days later, the local Law Enforcement along with a civilian search party found bits of him spread out in a nearby clearing in the forest. It was quite the sight, his body having been spread-eagled then unwillingly burnt and skinned before finally being chopped into individual pieces and arranged in a ritualistic form. This seemed far too severe a case for local Police, hence why they called the Big Shots from Earth. Except they didn't get a big shot; they got Cassian Vickers.

Title: I'm on TDY from Hell
Synopsis:
Temporary Duty (TDY): refers to a soldier’s assignment to a location that is not their permanent duty station. This type of duty is often looked upon favorably by soldiers due to various perks: per diem pay, lodging, meals and incidental pay.
Do you ever think about what comes next? What happens after you draw your last breath? Gerald never did. It didn’t even cross his mind on the day he died for his country. But now he’s there. Now he’s living it. Death wasn’t the end, it was only the beginning.
I’m on TDY from Hell is a Dark Supernatural Fantasy from the mind of BeamMeUpScotty who brought you the superhero fanfiction, A Change of Pace. The original military sci-fi space opera, Two Worlds; and the realistic superhuman science fiction novel The Harbinger Tales. Currently, it will post one 2000 – 3000 word chapter a week on Friday evenings EST.
 
This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License.

Title: Spell Analyst
Synopsis:
Synopsys:
Jude a Systems Analyst and Murl a Physicist find a new universe created through absorbing information from our own.  This universe is quite different as it was overly influenced by computers.  During one experiment to create avatars to explore said universe the two get sucked in themselves.  Somehow Jude gets sent thousands of years later than Murl and he finds himself in a world of magic and swords.  However, there is a game like system that seems to control everything.  
Jude decided to gain levels and power so that he can find out what happened to his friend Murl.  Along the way, he stumbles across a quest that will lead him to the truth of the Universe.
WARNING: MAY CONTAIN GOD AND SATAN 
Authors Goals:

3 Chapters a week M-W-F One chapter a week on Mondays
2k-3k words per chapter  Over 3k per chapter
A solid ending
Improve writing

 This fiction is part of the Pledge.  This story will be finished no matter what!

Title: Nature Attribute
Synopsis: John, a 22 year old man, lives in a society where environmentalism is completely forgotten and forests are fenced off and left to die. John learns about how to adapt alongside nature and use it for his own gain. In a Virtual Reality world, John finally has the chance to become legendary. Join him as he takes on monumental tasks, while still learning about nature and how to save it along the way.

Title: Reincarnation of the Red Dragon
Synopsis:
Scarlet is an ordinary girl with a painful past. Both of her parents died when she was 2. She was send to live with her aunt who was offering to take her in. After 3 abused and tortured years, at the age of 5 her aunt gave her away. Even though it is an modern soceity, people still worshiped gods. As you might have already guessed, Scarlet is a sacrifice bride to please the gods. However, she managed to escape.... 
 
While on the other side of the world, a prophecy is revealed. It foretold an upcoming calamity that could tear the entire world apart, however there was hope. And that was.........

Title: Becoming Itachi Uchiha in a Different world!
Synopsis:
Good bit of your time. (maybe...not) Based off of Naruto and IDWWNS.
Warning : Contains profanity usage, a bit of sexual content, and gore.
Introduction: 37 year old, Charlton Triston was a huge fan of Naruto. At first, he thought it was some random anime his colleagues wanted to torture him with, but as he watched episode after episode, he became addicted to the fighting secenes, justus, but most of all, The Sharingan. (Most thought he was too old for something so childish. However he didn't mind.)
His favorite character was Itachi Uchiha, because of his tranquility and intellegence. He even admired Itachi for planning the future for Sasuke. On one saturday morning,
Charlton Triston was driving to the store where popular manga was sold, he was caught up in an accident (truck-san), so in order to keep his childern safe, he sacrifced himself...
........
 "Welcome Charlton, atlthough it feels rushed, but you shall be reincarnated into a world that will be similar to the anime you will choose." Happily said the odd voice.

-G,G, -F,F, -E,E, -C,C, -D,D -B,B, -A, A, -S, S
Academy Student, Genin, Chuunin, Jounin, Special(SS) Jounin, Kage,

Time and time again, the souls of legends are reborn. Their souls become timeless within the bodies of new shinobi...
 
Their will to fight for their ideals are reborn as well, leading to many epic clashes in the world...

Title: Life is Feudal
Synopsis:
No OP stuff, status bars, levels or skills. This story is in favour of more realistic setting in a world of humans and various monsters.
"Behind the mask of the assertive, resolute facade that employs ruthless routes at any given moment, lies the frail, anxious heart that were once but a puny human. Reviled and revered by many, none would ever know my true allegiance lies within myself, merely trying to survive this mess."
Just the life of a grumpy man child living in a terrible piece of shit or a desolate state in which I call an alternate historical take on medieval Europe. Living as a peasant who is forced to take up arms to defend his own kin.
This story grants an insightful take on the life of people living under constant danger, from vying nobles who commit atrocities in the name of justice, eager nations and barbarians aiming to take a piece of the bountiful land and mythical divine monsters who resembles a walking catastrophe in any possible way.
[If you're easily offended by alternate-history religion and cultural practices, then you shouldn't read this.]

Title: A Remedy for a Reverie
Synopsis: Sixteen year old, Tabetha Estel, has a life that is quite sucky. Her aunt, who is her caretaker, pretty much hates her, and the people at her school see her as just an introvert who play video games all day. She's quite an easy target for bullying. After getting teased, day after day, and getting no moral support from anybody, she couldn't see her place in the world. So, she started up an EdgeTube (YouTube) channel and made videos of her playing her favorite MMO's, Survival Horror, and even a bit of Eroge (censored of course), but her love for video games wasn't enough. She wanted to escape the world and be part of her own world... be her own character... be free... That all changes when she gets a strange e-mail from a place called Arcane Entertainment, and when she opens it up, she blacks out and floats aimlessly through darkness for what seems to be an eternity. When she wakes back up, she's wearing black pants, a black longsleeve shirt, and black boots and in a deep misty forest unsure of what to do. She notices a couple of weird things about her body, she has a foot and a half long cat tail and fuzzy cat ears. She has also grown fangs, and an annoying meow. Her catlike appearance may be weird, but a whole lot more weirdness is to come on her adventures. WARNING: THIS BOOK CONTAINS GRAPHIC, SEXUAL, AND OVERALL TRAUMATIZING CONTENT THROUGHOUT THE STORY, but next to all of that I hope you all like it.

Title: Sensual Secrets
Synopsis:
The year is 2015. Supernatural beings are prominant and wide spread throughout the world, they are an integral part of our society in one way or another. The problem is, however, that they are a public part of our society. They had come into the light during the late eighteen-hundreds. The people at the time had panicked. A war between the humans and the supernatural had seemed all but certain. The powerful beings of the supernatural community had moved to stop such slaughter. Not out of kindness mind you, but because humanity was a prescious resource for their people, as well as ultimately outnumbering each individual group by millions. That, and the knowledge no group would ally with another before it became to late were two of the main factors in them moving to prevent the war. They had killed a few of the more dangerous ones, the darker ones unable to control themselves to prevent the war. It wasn't until WW1 in 1914 that things began to change for the better. The Supernatural community on U.S soil has joined in and spared many human lives while fighting the Old Fae that had not migrated, and the Angelic Host that are forever barred from returning to Heaven. 
 
Present time, they live in harmony, an uneasy harmony, but harmony all the same. Our story follows the tale of a lone Prideling, and a human female that may, or may not, be the final key in the return of an old power, The Blood Father, Patriarch to the Prideling people. He is someone they will do anything to bring back into being. They have gained the stones that had replaced his heart, their beating light showing he yet lives. They miss but one final piece, Ashley. How far will Leon go to keep his people from bringing back The Blood Father, how far will he go to keep this human safe, or end her. How far will Ashley go to avoid her own death, and the growing desire for the dangerous amber eyed man who seems to see her as nothing but a means to an end...
 
Author Disclaimer -
This story will be twenty-four chapters long, released once weekly as I finish the editing process to my satifaction. 
This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, businesses, places, events and incidents are either the products of the author’s imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.

Title: A Player in the Greenwood
Synopsis:
Who I am in real life doesn't matter; who I am in the game is what counts. 
Before it happened, I bumbled my way through the virtual reality massively multiplayer online role-playing game "The Greenwood," made crap builds and wasted my time.
Then I got murdered.  A shadowy figure took my hard-accumulated possessions and left me to die.   I admit, I did a rage quit and deleted my character.
Then I wondered what kind of person that rage quit made me?  Maybe I was a quitter? And maybe I really was someone who would let a bully get away with disrespecting me?
But then again, no:  I respected myself too much for that. I rolled a new character, I vowed to get good and re-entered The Greenwood.
I took on the name Barcud and the profession of ranger. I vowed to rise through the levels, hone my skills, hunt down the shadowy figure, and grind his face in the dirt.
This is my story.
***After lots of helpful comments on RR, I am going to publish my story on Amazon Kindle, so that means I have to take it down from here apart from, I think 10%.
***Sorry to deprive you of the story. I am going to write my next one on here too though.
***If you'd like to join my LitRPG mailing list - it's here
Galen Wolf LitRPG Mailing List

Title: Tyrant
Synopsis: At the deepest part of the palace. Through the prison, past the cutpurses and thieves, the rapists and murderers, sits a single cell. Lower than the rest, more heavily guarded. A single prisoner sits on a mound of dirt within a marbled cell. What is his story? Why is he there? Who is he?

Title: The Creep of Fate - Dropped
Synopsis:
Work in Progress Synopsis:

Title: The Ruin's Anthology
Synopsis:
This is a collection of the more dangerous inhabitants of the wilderness. Anyone who wanders from the well worn road should know the warnings within this collection of moments and fearful intonations. These are the survivors and cowards from beyond the dark.
Some magics exist only in the moment of these words and others remain potent and sickening. These pages are true recollections and trappings of those moments, untainted by imagination.
Few of us are heroes and the darkness hunts their bright light until dim and extinguished. The names bind them to form and to our histories, bloody and scared by the passage of time.
The Reader is advised to be rested and under the noon sun while they learn of these moments, at this time and this time only are these pages dormant and can be read aloud without danger.

Title: Primal Beast
Synopsis:
You've heard the countless stories of powerful human cultivatiors, who could level mountains and overturn the heavens. But, what of the thousands of beasts who roam the forests? Could a truly powerful primal beast emerge and become a top cultivator?

Title: Surge Abinitio
Synopsis:
Synopsis:
A name.
A hero.
Another world.
An inseparable link.
In a job interview, I met a Goddess of Heroes and a God of War. They bless me with their powers and send me to another world to rescue it from Depravity. Why they would send a young, hopeful, innocent, and maybe a pure man--yeah, I think these words define myself, probably; trust me--to save a world is beyond my understanding. But I suppose it's the start on finding the answers from my parents' mysterious beliefs.

Title: The Oevrumines
Synopsis: "Tyrus stands up on both feet. He feels tall but walking is another matter because as soon as he takes a step forward, he falls miserably onto the ground. It hurts and the ground sinks under him. His body is too heavy. Unless he wants too drown in the sand, he needs to be careful. So unlike any normal human being and because he wasn’t anymore, he starts to walks on four..." Extract from 'Prologue'

Title: Realm of Exaltia
Synopsis:
Dying from the hands of the Faerie Queen, Herebia was expected to remain as a 'Halazar', a soul whose destiny was to eternally wander 'Sabbath' as fury and rage will be the only thing they will ever know.
What surprised her though was that, the True God of Light sent a Celestial Dragon to personally fetch her. She was directly sent to 'Divas', which was the God's abode.
She finds out that in order to pay for her sins, she must sleep for an entire millenia (1000 years) and must do a task that the True God of Light would give to her after she wakes up.
Herebia slept for a thousand years as the world she once walked experienced drastic changes. The Faerie Kingdom was no more, the Drazian Kingdom was no more, and the Four Bloodlines was apparently greatly weakened...
As her awakening came near, the Realm of Exaltia which has experienced a long time of peace due to the Four Great Syllabus Kingdoms, would be shaken up and experience many wars and bloodshed....
Why?
For the empress shall awaken again...

Hah ! Well that's what the songs and legends say anyway ! He did it all for the fame and glory, what do you think ?

Title: Codename: Freedom
Synopsis:
LITRPG, SCIFI/FANTASY EPIC
War is coming. The government must accelerate their super soldier program. They have pushed beyond what was thought possible and developed a new Virtual Reality system; the perfect tool to weed out and train recruits. Against all odds, Lucius, a semipro gamer, is selected to participate in Codename: Freedom, a VRMMO that promises to blur the lines between game and reality. With the world watching live, Lucius is faced with the opportunity to gain a following and impressing sponsors. His dream of going pro and proving his father wrong is within his grasp. Unlike normal games that start easy as you learn to play, Codename: Freedom doesn’t give that luxury. The government has no time to waste. After years of hard work to rise in rank, this new game will challenge all that Lucius has learned to the point of breaking and beyond. Will he quit, go mad, or become something altogether different? Something better?
Note: This series has been removed except for 10% of each book due to Kindle Unlimited contractual guidelines.
The first Codename: Freedom trilogy is published on Amazon.
Find Apollos Thorne's work here. Amazon - Apollos Thorne

Title: Path of the Ninja
Synopsis:
The dream of emeralds, the virtual reality that came out the first January of the year 2055. The MMORPG that totally revolutionize the world of gaming. Ash Belvan, one of the top player of the dream of emeralds got stuck in the game.
He appeared in the beginners' town, losing all his stats, levels and equipment and needed to restart the game once again...but something's wrong...He could no longer log off and has been stuck inside the game!
 
*** Author note ***
 
If you like Virtual reality, MMORPG system, World of warcraft's fan, Naruto's fan, and league of legends' fan then this story maybe interest you! The ideas are mainly based on me. I hope you won't be horrified by the grammar and enjoy the plot.

Title: Beyond Singularity: A Will of Fire
Synopsis: A fantasy story about a young man who learns of what lies beyond the singularity of our universe. Told through the perspectives of his young self, his current self, and a mysterious man. Who is this mysterious man? What lies beyond? Who is he who went to the singularity and beyond? Find out in this new episode of: Amateur writer thinks he is great and writes a piece he will later be horribly embarrassed about.____________________________________________________________________________________________________________I originally wrote this story mainly for myself, I never intended to share it (selfish me). However at some point I found this site that I had been reading stories from almost 2 years ago and I thoroughly enjoyed every moment I spent on this site even after 2 years of absence. So I decided I wanted to give something back even though I am not a especially experienced writer but I hope you enjoy this nonetheless. I am not a native english speaker so please point out any mistakes I make (and preferrably explain the grammar rule / correct spelling as well) and I will fix them.

Title: Become Immortal
Synopsis:
Five or more releases per week (mostly five- from monday to friday)
If someone wants to draw a cover or even (better) the characters for me I will be eternally grateful. You can send your drawings to [email protected]. Enjoy!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Five martial brothers Dragon, Tiger, Hawk, Snake and Turtle, living their life on planet earth. 
Hitting a bottleneck in their training and seemingly unable to advance anymore, they decide to act after the methods of an old martial arts scripture.
So they started killing. Not ordinary people, not innocents, but gang and organisation members all over the world.
At some point they realized, that the promised breakthrough didn't come, but they continued killing the dangerous members of society even though that made them criminals too.
Then, during one of their raids, they walk into a trap and get killed in the process.
Surprisingly their souls didn't vanish after the destruction of their bodies. Does it have to do with the ancient martial scripture they read?
Is it fate? 
They get transported through the whole universe and countless galaxies until they are sent down onto a different world, several thousand times larger then earth.
That is the start of their journey. Will they become peerless experts, dominate their enemies and find true love?
Or will fate decide their deaths?

Title: The Wielders of Arantha: Book One - Pawns
Synopsis:
On the planet Elystra, a game eons in the making is being played out.
This distant world is home to a race of medieval humanoids, a select few of whom wield extraordinary abillties because of several extra-terrestrial Stones. One of these Wielders is Kelia, the leader of an all-female tribe, whose isolated and secret existence is in danger of ending because of a decree made by her mother. As a result, no children have been born within the tribe in many years.
Complicating matters is the arrival of space pilot Maeve and her teenage son Davin, who have fled Earth to Elystra in search of an energy source that will help them beat the powerful race that has invaded the Terran Confederation and subjugated its peoples. Humanity's last hope may rest on their success.
Unbeknownst to either woman, a Lightning-Wielder and her twin brother, in possision of a Stone of their own, seek to fulfill a prophecy that will give them unlimited power - and they will kill any and all who stand in their way.
Elystra is the board. These are the players. And the fate of the galaxy may be determined by which side wins.

She requested and got, a living System, an A.I. who considers her top priority, Celeste, her memories from her last life, and several other great benefits. Now what will she do in her next life?
 
Just a warning I am writing htis for school so updates may be irregular and the length is not guaranted. I will tell you if I am dropping it. If so, I will tell you what the plan for the remian of the story is. Each chapter will be a page or two probably. I will not leave you on a big lciffhanger, but a minor one may end up. Please give me your advice, but I may not use it. Enjoy!

Title: Dungeon Wars
Synopsis:
The Year is 2034 and the Latest VRMMORPG Dungeon Wars has just come out, Kaiser and his friend Steve buy the game and try and have the best dungeons in the game while trying to keep their dungeons alive from the NPC warriors which constantly attack the dungeons. Can Kaiser make a dungeon that will thrive and become one of the best dungeons or will he fail and have his dungeon conquered?
 
 
Hi everyone this is my first story so pointers and advice/criticism is always welcomed, doing this for fun so chapters will be posted randomly because of school work and sports but I will do my best to keep it updated

Title: Predators and Paychecks

A simple science fiction story I only posted this because I couldn't get both of my proofreaders in the same chat room for checking my normal story, so I posted this...
written by sniggyfigbat

Title: Dimension leapers
Synopsis:
It all started with a detention and soon escalated into all out multi-dimensional war. It is all up to Nick and his friends to get home and to stop evil scientists from destroying their dimension and all of the others around it. Will they be able to win this war? Will they ever get home?
 
Note: I will be posting a new chapter every Saturday and sometimes Sunday.

Title: Polymath Redux Annex
Synopsis:
Disclaimer: Original story by HiDrangeA. With their permission, I am taking over the continuation of this story as the original author no longer wishes to continue. While I am not as experienced, I hope you all will continue to show as much interest in my attempt at the helm as you did for the original author. I have tried my best to emulate the original style as well as incorporating some of my own. Thank you for understanding. 
Summary: 
"I'm no 'Hero', and if you had to classify me, I'd probably stand more on the 'Villain' spectrum of things..."
There was a game that I loved. I've played that one game like a madman for over ten years, and after all that arduous effort I had reached the empty 'top'.
I'm by no means special, all I did was invest a ridiculous amount of time and money into that game. Simply put, I bought my way up to the top with my money and time. If anyone was as crazy as me, they would've reached the top as well. 
Reaching the top made me realize one thing... It made me understand that one cannot go any further. This was the end of my journey. I've beaten every boss, obtained every 'legendary' class item and cleared every content on every difficulty. There was nothing more that waited for me in this world.
Then something happened. Something that only happens in stories; 'transported to a fantasy world'. Good thing I had all of my avatar's abilities... only, that wasn't actually a good thing. The fundamental problem still persisted. So long as I had these powers, this curse of emptiness would likely never lift. The thing I had to do was change my 'perspective'.
I could live like an invincible tyrant... but no. instead of doing what I wanted and living like a petulant God, for now I decided to 'partake' in this world's history. 
I'm an actor, a Planner, Manipulator and this world's Demigod. My hands alone move the fate of the world. So then, as the conductor I shall weave the symphony of this world.
"With the world as our stage, let us weave an exciting tale of heroes and villains. I shall play the part of the villain and fight against the world."

Title: Wudao Achievement Gone Wrong
Synopsis: Wudao Volga is a 17 years old teenager that was raise in a family of five. He was playing Diablo 3 one day during summer break but somehow got an achievement that was not suppose to be there. Excited by the thought that Blizzard added in an Easter egg he goes through a serious of event that led him to being teleported into a middle of a battle field. He was godly overpowered so he won easily but the system that summoned him screw him over and deleted all his items accept one due to a certain action of his. How will he carry on living in this new world called Valha which is very similar yet also very different from Diablo 3's world....

Title: Life is Wilde
Synopsis: There is a world where fiction meets reality. A world where human logic may prevail. Where human logic is the main thing that binds humanity. A world where Humanity is lesser to The World.Synopsis (For Chapters after Authors Note):Oscar is a child alike most others. He loves his mother, doesn't know his dad, and lives in a dome. Only, his greatest dream is to explore the vast wildes that plague the world. The problem is, the wildes house strange creatures mutated by radiation and a mysterious energy called "The Essence". How will Oscar ever survive in this chaotic world? Come, watch as our beloved character grows, makes friends, and paves a road into the firmaments as he establish his name in the new historical categories.Author's note*:This is an idea I'm roughing out. I'll be writing randomly, attenmpting to forge a storyline from my own sweat, determination, and creativity. It's loosely based on some Wuxia/Xuanhuan fictions I've read. It will have elements of human physiology, psychology, environmental science, nature vs man, man vs nature, human nature vs humanity, etc. This story is mean to be a work of fiction. It encompasses some of my views on morality. It will have corruption, foul-language, ignorance, racism. It will glean a bright world with imagination fused with the dark shadows for some to seek refuge. Though, in the world I will be creating... Refuge comes at a cost. A steep one.That is the Way of the World. The way of my world.Need cover art plz

Title: World of Mana
Synopsis:
My name is Alexander Grey and yes I'm what people call a class-less. I am part of the 1% of the world that are unable to aquire there class when aweaken and am treated like a third class citizen. My family relation is bad, no friends at school, and a future that seems black at best. Yea my life is not easy but even so I will not give up and rise up and become someone no one can look down upon, I shall walk the path of the Eternal!
 
Note: This is my first fantasy novel and is subject to change ever ten chapters or so with revision. 
 
 
Martial art/Fantasy novel about a man born into the world crippled by society standards finding his own way.

Synopsis:

Title: Rise of an Emperor [Dropped]
Synopsis:
In the World of Cultivation, exists a legend, a prophecy - that a hero would rise. The hero would then bring the human race into a new era filled with peace instead of war and conflict. The hero would be world's only hope against the disaster that would soon appear.
Ignis, a cultivator of the Crimson clan, will he be the hero of the legend or will he simply be another cultivator that falls in the World of Cultivation.

Title: Teacher : Deliquent
Synopsis: The Helmholtz academy, a prestigious school for youth to learn about magic, martial arts and combat skills decides to begin several new fine arts electives in an effort to inculcate etiquette in its students. However, not all is at it seems! The new music teacher is a delinquent good for nothing! Or is he? Not everything as it seems as plots and schemes take deep root behind the scenes and this delinquent teacher who can't stick to a single name teaches an unnecessary music course in an unconventional manner while taking down any plots that threaten to ruin his new hobby!

Title: Nigmus Online [2nd Draft Complete]
Synopsis:
Virtual Dive technology is coming out of the workplace and into homes. Nigmus Online is the first MMO to use this new device. The only caveat to the game; there is no manual. The only instruction the player gets is how to interact with the user interface. That's it. Nobody is going to hold their hand or give out rare items. Players begin life as a level zero commoner. Its entirely up to them what class they become. Explore a world that spans five continents.   ~Story Summary~  Liam is tricked into trying an expensive and innovative online MMO. On his first trip into the game he stumbles upon a hidden class. The Undead Necromancer. Intrigued by this turn in events he continues to explore this mysterious world.  In another part of the country Kathrine(Kat) suffers from a debilitating and paralyzing disease. Taking part in an experimental research could offer her a new lease on life (of a sort).  Even further afield Russia and China are undergoing a massive spike in suicide rate. What could be causing so many young adults to dire ends?

in a world of monsters, where the eleven dominion spreads across the continents, a young man starts his quest for adventure, power and survival.
an elf, on the brink of starvation is saved by an unlikely encounter.
an orc, immortal pacifist and lover of the finer arts of life.

Title: The Life of Demon Empress Siamara
Synopsis:
When an average human girl, who only does everything in balance, and moderation is killed by mistake, she is confronted by God to give her another chance. However, this is no normal reincarnation, he gives her an offer, “if you are able to survive in your new life for 500 years, I will allow you to ascend to godhood.”
With this, we follow Siamara’s life on her path to ascending to godhood. But make no mistake, 500 years is a long time for a lot to happen.
 
(This is my first web novel, and while I canont guarantee grammar to save someone's life, I can guarantee an original novel that slowly but surely progress's through the life of Siamara)

Title: A Journey for One

I tried really hard to get where I wanted to be, but as fortune would have it, I was sent to be sacrificed to save the world without me even knowing but I guess that's not too bad since the view is amazing. I just wanted to be alone and observe the world in it's place within the universe, but other people had different things in mind when it came to me and since I fit the criteria for their plans, I was chosen to be the one to save the world.
Maybe something good will come of this, hopefully. I'm just glad I got to see the world in it's entire beauty before the asteriod hit. Hopefully there is an afterlife to take care of me since I just saved the world and what not, right?

BUT WHY THE HECK MUST IT BE A WEED?!

Tanaka Daiki has live in Kail's body but where did the original goes to?
Daiki and Kail has nothing similar to them except their face and physical shape. What happen? How did it happen? What will he do from now on?? He has no idea of what is going on but this is where his adventure start off. Rather, it was Kail's Life of Adventure.

Driven to the point of giving up,  Paul our young college student friend invests in a way to escape his current hellish situation.  With the popularity of VR systems across the world he impulsively buys himself a pod.  He going to enter the VR world for the 1st time. Will his parents ever understand?  Probably not.  Will the teachers forgive him for losing focus on his Master's Degree?  Will he fall to the seduction of the Digital World like so many others these days have?
Not sure the end or even most of the story line yet.  Take a ride and see what happens in Genesis Online as our MC enters a gaming world he has no clue about.

Title: Greed
Synopsis:
Kei Daichi is a 30 year-old man who worked for a gaming company. He happened to live a meaningless life. Contrary to his previous life-style, Kei is innately a greedy person. He had always dreamed of obtaining all the money, power, and women in the world. Unfortunately, with little to no talent or opportunities, he was never able to take initiative. Upon death, he found himself reincarnated in a new RPG-based world.... as a rat. With his only skill "Greed" which grants him the ability to steal others' skills, jobs, and appearances, how far will he go?

Title: VRMMORPG: Heart of the Phantom Thief
Synopsis:
I logged into my much awaited vrmmorpg, only to find that my AID (Artificial Intelligence Delegate) is a man? Moreover, a narcissist!?
All the fluffies flee from me. My AID can only assist me in combat for one minute, and the random free weapon I get at the beginning of the game turns out to be a hairpin? Moreover, As soon as I arrive in the game world, I am suddenly killed by a runaway cabbage cart? But, as a result, I am bestowed a bizarre talent…the talent of substitution.  Now, while levelling up, how can I use this talent to keep my footing in this world of strange happenings?
And, somehow, I am beginning to have flowery pink-dyed dreams about my narcissistic AID? Moreover, there is a rather strange undercurrent in the game quests. This does not bode well.

Title: Daydreaming magic swordsman
Synopsis:
A dreamer and idealist, such is our protagonist. From a world where he knew only peace, he was thrown at world where there was magic and swords. Armed with his modern knowledge and a unique skill he sets out to become what he always dreamed to be, a hero. Coming from peace, he will struggle and he will fail. However, with the help of his companions and a little luck he will accomplish some extraordinary feats.
My first story so it will not be perfect. Any constructive criticism is appreciated and hopefully you will enjoy my story.

Title: The World Ended: Abnormal Magic
Synopsis: The world goes through its first evolution, and our main character grows to survive. As he grows he learns many different things about humans and himself. The once sleeping base nature of humans are revealed to him and sets him on a path of blood and pain.

Title: The Immortal Curse
Synopsis:
Just how much of everything you see is the truth?
 
Yuri, even at a young age, had already been exposed to the reality of the corrupt world she lives in. At school she was bullied, physically and verbally, simply because she was quiet and smart. Her home wasn't a safe haven, either. Greed, hatred, everything that surrounded her as she grew up always hurt her one way or another, so she had to adapt, and built walls around herself.
But that didn't mean she was safe.
When a person faces continuous pain and unresolvable hatred, one is bound to break down no matter how tough he pretends to be.
Yuri killed herself, hoping to end everything she was going through, and maybe put an end to herself as well.
Unfortunately, it seems fate wasn't done playing with her soul just yet.
----
Might contain sexual content in the future, but as of now... no.

Title: Hearts of Ice (completed)
Synopsis:
A girl, a boy, the Falconers... they're in the middle of a war.
How did it come to this? From the discovery of the planet... down to the making of that serum it matters no more! Like it or not, Fate has planned it all out. Mean it death or separation, they'll have to survive, someway, somehow.
It doesn't help when a pinch of romance is added to the chaos...
Beyond that impenetrable forest... over the plains of thick grass... surely there are no secrets?
 
 
 
Heh, I'll be rewriting, probably.

Title: Necrotourists
Synopsis:
Lord Archlich "Boss", the greatest undead of all time, could conquer the world with his mighty collection of undead knights, dullahans, shadowlings, resurrected expired food, and skeletons. But that's too much work!
So why not just go tour the world which he had not set foot in for over a thousand years?
From the mighty Holy City of Aon which houses the greatest undead hunters in the entire continent to the mystical Sorcerer City-States, Boss will tour them all!
Hide your artifacts, hide your religious sites, hide your long-held traditional values - Boss will ruin them all unknowingly!
