Title: Triple Orb Academy
Synopsis:
In the parallel world of Zeffernon, magic is equivalent to science. Magic is explored and used everyday, and it is something that cannot be eliminated. Since magic is drawn from the blood, it can never disappear from the world.
 
This story is also posted on fictionpress.com and vicslab.com.

Title: Revelation
Synopsis:
Attention Reader! These are just Sample Chapters. Please instead direct your attention to my Multi-Volume Story "Conquest: A Dystopian GameLit Saga" so that you can read the full story!

Lily Thatcher is an undercover agent with the National Security Agency (NSA) who gets tangled up in a bizarre series of events. An immortal villain has used his ungodly powers to decimate countless empires, and today he stands as the CEO of CyberBolt, the augmented reality platform hosting the popular game CONQUEST.
After she is ordered to undergo a dangerous medical mind-wipe procedure prior to re-assignment, she avoids arrest and becomes a rogue agent. In her journey to uncover the truth, she must Level Up to unlock the game's secrets. But before she can unlock them she is dragged away through a portal to an alien planet that the game CONQUEST was patterned after.
A sentient dragon becomes her companion on her path of discovery as she unlocks innate powers of divination that have been dormant since her birth. After escaping certain death, Lily knows that there's far more at stake than just her mortality. A morbid question looms in the back of her mind: Can she prevent Earth's Apocalyptic Fate?

Title: Lasershark of The Laserocean
Synopsis:
Lasershark — a magnificent, truly stunning creature which inhabits the wast expanses of the Lasersea. It is known for its thinking ability which is considered to be on par with most aliens and even some humans. The lesser know fact about it would be that the lasershark's body consists solely of one big condensed sharkshaped laser beam. This meaning that lasersharks are the only species of fullybeam EVO group.
If you ever happen on a chance to see one in action don't miss it!

Title: Clash of Cards
Synopsis:
Summary: Napoleon Bonaparte, a genius general from the eighteenth century, finds himself in a new world after his death. Betrayed by his country and friends, the now old, now in a new body, is determined to once again become a leader of great status. However, in this new world, strength is decided by your level and the strength of your?Battle Pets?
Can Napoleon conquer this world through his wit and experience?
A/N: Remake of an old story. 1-2 entries of 300-500 words per day

Title: The World of Argos
Synopsis:
Description: Zachary Alan Lee was a computer programmer who died in his sleep. Having been a fan of LitRPG and a writer on his favorite website. Little did he know that a God of a different universe was one of his fans. Upon his death, Zach was reborn on the World of Argos. Having a second chance at life and the ability to live in a world with Magic and system that would allow him to upgrade his body and soul, Zach sets off to forge a new destiny. One of his own making. 
 
Author’s Note: Hey, if you like Town building please come in and read my story. My main focus will be writing a fun story about a struggling MC trying to gain power and a little bit of safety in his new life. Since I am starting a business and have a family I will be posting infrequently. Additionally, there will be errors in spelling and grammar, but I am being up front about it, please leave specific feedback and I will gladly correct it. Cover art is not my own and I will be returning from Hiatus soon 4/27/18

Title: The First Boss
Synopsis:
Hello my name is Nai but everyone just calls me weakling.
There is a reason as to why they call me that, and the reason is that I am the weakest dungeon boss in the tower. The first boss. You know, the one that's supposed to be a sort of warm up for the adventurers that attempt to conquer the mighty tower.
…..What was that? What’s the tower? Well that’s easy! The tower is a giant 500 floor deep dungeon built by the demon of gluttony Beelzebub to protect all of his treasures.
What? You want to hear my story? Well, then let’s start from the beginning…

Title: Records of The Last Land
Synopsis:
Once the land spread far and wide and the world was bathed in sunshine and life, but, this is not the story of that land. Many say the corruption is a curse called down by Sol when he saw how humanity ravaged the land and how the other gods allowed this to happen, but, this is not sol’s story. 
 
The last land is all the druids could save from the corruption and even now, 2000 years later, they fight on however the kingdoms within the last land have forgotten what lies outside and they fight internal wars and struggle for power.
 
Nihe is little more than a tool. Raised to fight in the gladiator arenas as an interesting experiment by his owner he knows little else than fighting.
 
Danen is running from the ker-ja kingdom unsure of what lies ahead but knows he can hide from what is behind him if he joins the druids order.
 
Lara is the genius of the druid fort Hac-Lu regularly boasted about by her father as a one in thousand year genius. Oh how she hates his boasts, hates the gazes of admiration, hates the title and veneration that cost her happiness
 
This is their story

Title: Seventh reincarnation is as a dungeon
Synopsis: Making god angry is bad idea. Especially if it's overworked goddess of reincarnation. Even if bound by law she still will find a way to get back at you. So no great luxury and power for you. Only eternal reincarnation and what you will be able get your self. And this time you ended as a dungeon.

Title: My Life... With a Twist
Synopsis:
(Dropped) - Wrote this a few years ago, might rewrite it sometime in the future!

Wake up, eat, go to school, eat again, than sleep. Rinse and repeat. Erin is a striving dreamer, but is limited to dream within his mind.
Today his best friend and the existence which he trusted the most, his computer, killed itself while it electrocuted him.
However maybe it's not dead... Maybe it sacrificed itself to unlock Erin's potential...
In a world where uprising supernatural powers begin to occur, what will Erin's life twist in to?
 
 
Note: This story is being posted here, even while not refined or perfected, mainly because I need an incentive as well as criticism to help me continue writing. I’m actually quite neglectful most of the time and if not for the followers so far that give me a sense of guilt when I don't post a chapter, I most likely would not continue writing. So thanks for the support! :D

Title: The Reawakening: A Legend Begins
Synopsis:
Lanso Soar De Renko, one of the strongest mages and warrior was on his deathbed. Despite being one in the million of both talents, this was his end. He was very unwilling to. Before his death, he wanted to go on a grander stage that all his peers yearn. It was "The Celestial God Domain" where all those that ascended went to. So, to escape he put his all into magic, trying to find a way to cheat death. Finally, due to his strenous efforts, he created a spell that could give him a second lease on life. He called it "Heavenly Samsara Spell." Even though it was very overbearing, it agreed with the highest truth. Fortunately, his attribute dealt with life and death or else it wouldn't have been done. There was two requirements for this spell, one needed a extremely powerful soul or else his would be destroyed. Second, to rebuild the body, bodies was needed. If one wasn't found, the soul wouldn't have no vessel and eventually would die. Coincendentally, his strength went forward one step and was stronger then people on his level. Also, luckily, they was his enemies. He defeated each one. All five of their lives was taken. Every one had great viltality. They was the same as him, mage and warrior. When he got reborn, his strength would be very great. Kai set up the spell. He prepared everything. Then, he waited for death to take him away. Finally, the day came. Everything was prepared. Activating the spell, it lit up. After it was done, a body was made. His eyes was tightly closed. For him to have complete control over the body, his soul had to synchronize with the new body. Ten thousand years, he slept and gained power thought was impossible.
He was going to become one generation of "Celestial Emperor's", the earth and skies will wept because of his might. On his path to ultimate strength and immortality nobody was going to stop him.

Title: Demon Saga: Phoenix Dancer
Synopsis:
If you like my work, donations are greatly appreciated!
 
The Phoenix Dancer follows the story of Corrin, a young girl from the Asla'ati demon hunters tribe, who serves a monstrous Phoenix-God. Corrin's adventures will lead her far from home as she seeks to restore a long lost magic that may be key to saving the realms from the tyrannical Immortal Beings who rule over them.

Title: Children of The Sky: Heartcore
Synopsis:
In the realm of Yggdrasil, there exist nine worlds. Each and every world has unique stories to tell, but there was one that stood out--The Floating World of Speir.
In the land of Speir, the impossible does not exist; this world has given birth to thousands, if not hundreds of thousands of tales, fables, and legends. The fight for the fate of the world is a common occurrence and the neverending stories of the people which reside in it were all, by itself, always unique and interesting. 
Now, after many aeons have passed, the world has changed. Not only the power of magic could shape reality, technology also has the ability to change the world with just a thought. And from the world where futuristic technology meets magic, I have chosen to tell you a story, a story picked from countless others. 
This is the story of a boy who recently entered the prestigious, and the most powerful academy in all of the nine worlds--Yggdrasil Academy, to fufill his dream. What is his dream, you might ask. Well, allow me to show you the life of Reynard Foxtale, one of The Children of The Sky.
 
*Warning. For those who don't like lengthy explanations or long talks, this might not suit your taste. However, the setting of my story does not adhere to most of the main stream fantasy/sci-fi settings. So, you might find my ideas unique or a little too weird and complicated or both. Whatever opinions you might have, I truly thank all of you who are willing to spend your time to read my story.
*The cover (which is a picture I do not own) is not in any way an accurate depiction of the world in the story. 
P/S I will post this story on FictionPress as well.
P/P/S I'm relatively new to this website, so if I made any obvious (to regulars) mistakes, please tell me.
P/P/P/S Will update every two weeks.
*Important: In Hiatus for now.
**13/7/2017 Update. Check chapter nine (and maybe ten) post-chapter note.

Title: Wayland Crossing
Synopsis:
Kaori Tanizaki. First year student at Akakawa Senior high. Sole occupant of her parent's house. Great friends with an idol, the soccer team co-captain, and a loud, cheerful girl she's called her besties since she was six. Trying to take charge in her life, she goes through days in melancholy while monsters, mighty and destructive, appear all over the world, attacking endlessly without any hints to where they are from. The world's only hope is the Super Six, a group of heroes who always appear to combat the monsters with awesome powers. But, working in secret, no one knows who the Super Six are, or what their motive is.
Towndown Shibuya is attacked, with Kaori and her best friend stuck in the middle of it. But Kaori is rescued by one of the Super Six: A sixteen-year-old who has found himself unable to return to his home country. Kaori must hold herself together as she faces monsters in Japan, the boy who has suddenly come under her care,
...And the crush she has on him.

Title: The Destroyer of Worlds
Synopsis:
At Japan 10:00 am, 2020
Our main protagonist wake up from his long night of gaming for 8 straight hours.
As he heard this message from a God like being.
"Hello mortals it time for the rebirth of a new age of power. if you can't survive then you will die a painful death.
 oh yeah before i forget i will the make the world more like of a game.Bye bye now."

Title: A Demon's Gift
Synopsis:
Erin Weisz is a brilliant young woman who has been hard used by life. After being fired from work and having her greatest creation stolen from her, Erin decides that she will do the unthinkable to grasp for the power that her world refuses to someone of her station.
Summoning a Demon is an act condemned by all mages as they are known for the chaos they always extract for any bargain. But the power that can be gained makes it all the more tempting.
Her past tortures her and shows clearly the cost of dealing with the creatures from the void between the worlds, but with nothing left in her future, she bargains for transportation to a plane where she can gain power.
The cost is always greater than the gain, but will it cost Erin or her new world?

Title: Trickster
Synopsis:
Jeana Mindy , The right hand of the biggest drug dealer died during a suspicious deal , The DEA memebers were stuck as she was the only hope for them to catch The Dealer , Only to find hope again in a poor women that looked exactly like the dead Jeana Mindy , Now with hope filling their heart again they begin to teach this women how to act like Jeana in hope to catch the Dealer.
 
Unbeknownst to them that they were bringing their own downfall.

Title: This is the Wrong World! (Beta Version)
Synopsis: It's not her fault she was born with a face that screams arrogance and villainy! Maybe, she should have controlled her temper and not called the Goddess a slut. But after being cursed, ten years later, Izo finally defeats the Demon King and is sent home. Except there is one small problem, it's the wrong world!

Title: Everyone Else is a Fantasy Character
Synopsis:
I was reading Everyone Else is a Returnee and thought, "Wouldn't this be awesome if it were a sci-fi?" Thus, this was born.
This will be a mixture of sci-fi, fantasy and litrpg elements. The leveling system will be similar to EERT but the world as a whole will be of my own creation. I just liked the way the akashic records were described in that story.
I'm just going to post my first chapter, see how it's recieved and go from there.
(The title is open to suggestions.)

Title: The Misr Effect:  Key of Life
Synopsis:
THE GODS PUNISH MEDIOCRITY...
When the players of Immortality fail to impress the Gods, the wrath of Ra descends.
As players fall, Erik Silva,  a troubled veteran finds himself amongst them.  Stripped of his hardcore title of Champion, he questions his sanity and quits.  He soon discovers to quit is to die.  But death is not the end of his journey.  Forced to accept the quest of an irreverent goddess, he is faced with challenges that will test his skill to survive in the hostile world of Misr.
 
Author's Note:
This is a work in progress with the goal to publish to Kindle. I write for the love of knowing others are entertained.  So please follow, rate and leave a comment if you have a moment and enjoy this story.  I'd love to know more about the RRL audience. :) 

 
For more information on the LitRPG genre, please visit:https://www.facebook.com/groups/LitRPGGroup/https://www.facebook.com/groups/LitRPGsociety/

Title: Magic and time
Synopsis: Rain just recently dies from an illness that has been plaguing him for all his life. However he soon fines out that he will get a new chance at life and one without his pain and suffering, but what he makes of it will be up to him. How will he lead this new life?

Title: Hello, You're Through To Hades, How Can I Help You Today?
Synopsis:
Hades, the God of the underworld, has grown bored.
This was only the natural result since he'd been doing nothing except process souls for over a hundred-thousand years. It didn't help that the only person he could socialise with was the occasional Hero or fellow Divine-level being that graced him with their presence. 
However, his chance to break this monotony had arrived. Two souls had disappeared from Earth. They didn't go to Olympus nor did they enter the Underworld. This peculiar change was the final nail in the coffin for Hades.
How did the God of Death react to this? Of course, he chose to finally quit his job! Be damned to the responsibilities! ... Nothing bad could happen if he left the throne of The Underworld for only a few decades, right?
Follow Hades as he lives amongst the mortals and tries to enjoy his new lease on life. Hopefully, his absence won't create any unforeseen consequences for Earth... hopefully.

The cover art was drawn by the very talented Adsterhappy.

Title: Lazy Magi
Synopsis:
((this is my first thing i hope everyone likes it please give me feedback on any issues and everything, there will be grammar issues and spelling issues im sorry i hope that doesnt affect the story.))
We live life knowing strength is the only thing that pushes us forward, its the only thing that will keep you alive in a rough situation, the only thing that can make you powerful and fir to rule a country.
What if you have the strength but you dont have the motivation to do anything with it, in this story we find ourselves following a young man at the age of 17 we go through his life seeing how a young boy who wants to live a boring life keeps getting pulled into exciting adventures

Title: The War of Destiny (A Story from Vandaria)
Synopsis:
This is the land of Vandaria, a world where frameless and human resides. Frameless is a magical race who put great importance on logical judgement while human is a race who is not blessed by magic, but has resilience and braveness to chalenge all limits.
However, for three thousand years, frameless was the absolute ruler of Vandaria. Human was nothing more than slave and servant of frameless. Humans were supressed and those who bear the blood of both human and frameless were ostracized.
Yet the wind of destiny could not be stopped. The spark of rebellion was ignited and the flame of war would engulf the whole Vandaria. This was a story about men and women, human and frameless, who seek for their places in destiny. There was no right and wrong. Each of them held their own belief, yet they were destined to fight between one and another.
This was the greatest war in the history of Vandaria. This was the War of Destiny.

This is not my first story, but this is my first story in english. I want to try writing a story in english because, seriously, it is VERY difficult.
This story was a high fantasy epic story with multiple PoVs, like Song of ICe and Fire books. This is a bit out of my league, but I will do my best.
It was based on an existing fantasy franchise in my country, called Vandaria Saga. Thus, I do not take any credit for world-building and lore.
All critics are welcomed!
(Cover picture was taken from https://vandaria.wordpress.com/)

Title: Spaced Out
Synopsis: After the prospect of obtaining a giant sum of cash, Gabe decided he wanted to build a teleporter to pull off the ultimate of heists. But to his folly. He forgot to include locator and a way to return. Making a blind jump he ends up on a mercenary ship and gets conscripted. Join Gabe as he travels the stars as the only human in space!

Title: Arnar the Dungeon
Synopsis:
Arnar is a dungeon core. Everybody knows dungeons are evil, man-eating entities hell-bent on killing and absorbing whatever wanders inside their depths. The problem is no one ever told him that. Well, the truth is no one ever told him anything and he refused powers-that-be when they tried to make him into the proper dungeon. That should teach them not resurrect people into dungeon cores.
Now it is too late. He has a perfect plan to become the best dungeon on the continent and nothing will stand in his way. Especially something called common sense. 

Disclaimer of sorts:
I am non-native English writer that used to write mostly for himself. After my last computer decided to die on me taking all my works with it I lost the desire to write for quite a long time. This is my attempt to go find motivation to write again as this was my favourite hobby. The idea is to be held accountable. 
As for being non-native, I don't believe that should be a major issue as I feel my proficiency in English to be sufficient enough to not be too much of the distraction. That said, be forewarned that the rules governing punctuation are beyond my grasp. All I can do is try not to completely suck at that.
As mentioned this is an attempt to motivate me to write again so any message, encouragement or constructive criticism will go long way.
The cover was created with the help of http://fantasynamegenerators.com/emblem-creator.php
I hope you will enjoy my story.

Title: Selfishness can be so rewarding
Synopsis:
His father once told him "Son,men who do good things get good things." 
Since that day Nox Michael became the most selfish person in the world.Helping people,volunteering,recycling and everything he could do to get good karma.All to get what he wanted.
So when he died saving someone he thought he would go straight to heaven.What happened was so much better.
Becoming an overpowered being and going to another dimension that is basically a xianxia.
"This is awesome!Normally the objective is to become the strongest,get revenge,get a harem and enjoy life.I'm already the best and nobody killed my family sooooo all I need is my harem then I can enjoy life by wrecking the bad guys and messing with people.Being selfish is the best thing ever!"

Synopsis:

Title: God Dragon Emperor
Synopsis:
I am a unquenchable fire, The center of all energy, The stout, and fearless heart. I am truth and light, I hold power and glory in my sway. My presence disperses darkest clouds. I have been chosen to tame the fate. I am wisdom and charisma, I am the mystical enigma I am Avion. And I am the Dragon.
Join our hero as he traverses worlds, meets Gods and battle Deities.
But Alas, that isn't all. Out there in the chaotic multiverse lies a secret. A secret that would Shake the fabric of Space and Time.

Title: The Lazy Edgy Protagonist Is Lazy and Edgy Today As Well
Synopsis:
Beware: Edgy. Gory, and very very very bloody. You didn't expect that, huh?
Normally, people have things they want to achieve in life. Goals. Achievements. A legacy. Having kids. Wives, waifus. What if you took all those things away, sealed them away to live an indulgent life? Modern society can make you comfortable, but there's a dark side to that comfort. An edgy side. What's left in life, for the chronically lazy? Watch anime and play games all day? Take up writing as a hobby? Nah. Let's let life happen to us! There's no need to fight back. Humanity worked hard enough already, okay? Oh, maybe a demon sealed in your arm and an angel sealed in your eye bickering about everyday decisions. There might be that.

Title: dark night
Synopsis: one day and being of untold power showed up to scott planet telling them that thier world will end and they are given the chance to aquire great power that could make them gods, demons and dragons among men and become inmortal to time.

Title: Sever the Heavens!
Synopsis:
To sever the Heavens is my ambition.
To sever the Earth is My way.
Stand in my way, and I won't be Reasonable, I will sever your Fate!
 
I am the Inheritor of the lost Severing Heaven Sect, Liang Meng!

Title: The Bloody Legion
Synopsis: Tristan, a "normal" kid, was put in another world purely for god's entertainment. He was given the ability to create a new race. And so like any other insane person would, created living weapons.

Title: The Mad Scientist's Wife
Synopsis:
A man, betrayed by his girlfriend, vows to create his own perfect wife who will never betray him. But, in one of his experiments, he dies.
Now, he is reborn in another world. A world of swords and magic. Will he create his perfect wife in this life? Or will he find true love?
 ****************
This is my first novel and i will appreciate any input you can give to improve the story.

Title: My Name is Paul
Synopsis:
In the depths of everywhere and nowhere, not a chance nor a choice
I know everyone and no one, seeing no sight, hearing no voice
I have done everything and nothing, my life is a lie
Neither dead nor alive, I live to die
Fearing even the weakest, I'm the weakest of all
Before my might, even the gods shall fall
It has been a pleasure to meet you, my name is Paul

Title: Deity of carnage - Unholy Kingdom
Synopsis:
Book 2 has started:
Without body, withouth strenght. How do you fight the strong when you are nothing?

Title: The Queen's Rogue
Synopsis:
Magic Control Regiment Official Magician's Laws
1. Magic/mana may only be manipulated in a controlled or private setting, and only with the license of an official MCR magician.
2. Magic/mana may not be used for insidious purposes or murderous intent. This includes threatening, torture, and practical jokes.
3. Any user of magic/mana must be attending or have attended an MCR affiliated University.
4. Any user of magic/mana that does not adhere to the above rules shall be deemed a rogue.
Rogues will be hung.
 
Beau's a rogue. Let's find out why.
 
"I would reread this at a later date: favorited." - LordRavensNest
"I'm intrigued." - scorched100
"I quite enjoy this web novel, and I would like to see more" - selexie

Title: Holding the Line: The Mercenary Companies
Synopsis:
Manny Rosiaro is the president and CEO of ArmCore Securities, a small mercenary company operating out in Alliance space. ‘The Thousand Words’ the makes up the alliance is factitious and a hot bed of conflict. A perfect place for a man with a mech to make a name for himself.
ArmCore has built a respectable reputation by completing small contracts such as garrison and short-term escort duty. Manny and the Rolling Rekong, his Atlas-class mech has proven themselves reliable and efficient. They have never failed a contract.
 
ArmCore just finished a contract and is on their way to Merkatuan, a trade world, to rest their people and to update their equipment but unbeknownst to them, an alien force is silently making its way towards the world, the first target on their conquest of human space.
 
Will ArmCore survive the opening salvo of aliens looking to expand their empire or would the men and women of Manny’s mercenary company burn in the flames of war?

Title: First Convocation
Synopsis:
A group of magicians performs the first call of an entire universe follow the journey of one of your [Hero] `s in their cumin through the fantastic and violent world.
This was done online at the grammar school I did not go to learn to write in English for hobby.

Title: Aventuras de Galus
Synopsis:
El hijo del Dios Hwanin, al llegar a la tierra se dispone a conseder la Humanidad a la tribu del oso y del tigre cuando de repente la tribu del mono interviene.
Galus el representante de los monos causa caos en las pruebas con lo que el hijo de Hwanin en castigo convierte a los monos en Zorros con lo que las Aventuras de Galus inicial al buscar el camino a casa.

Title: Dimensión Desconocida
Synopsis:
Bunny es un oficial de seguridad en Puerto Limón, pero al inician sus labores, como todos los días, se encuentra un niño en un lugar donde no debería haber personas externas al puerto.
El niño se encontraba encerrado en un bus, su primer instinto es corre a rescatarlo y cuando se da cuenta, el terminan entrando en la dimensión desconocida.
Con lo que terminan redescubriendo el mundo que les rodea, que está lleno de magia y peligros inimaginables.

Version en español de Unknown Dimension

Title: When the madness arrives
Synopsis:
Some people just seem to be hated by life itself, living a complete suffering or better said... a death in life. Join our protagonist Dane Haldert from the end of a life to the beginning on another...
However, will his next life be a good one?, only time will tell.

Title: The Monarchs Chronicles
Synopsis:
Who knew all those things in life we considered fantasy was real and that most of them left this world long ago some simply stayed in the shadows but now they are back and earth seems to be growing larger along with people gaining powers what started this better yet who? The destined one they call him has endless Questions upon questions begin to stack up why him and why is he really on this strange planet other then to escape from them? What are these dreams that seem to plaque him really mean?

Title: Phantasmic Light
Synopsis:
The world is corrupt.Nobles and royalty step on the common people.
The common people have no choice but to join the military or live a life of poverty.
The military is brainwashed to only obey orders, even if it's to conquer and pillage innocents.
When living a life of poverty, you're treated as livestock, killed after deemed useless.
When a boy summons the power damned by the gods, will he destroy the entire world like they say? 
Or will he end the current regime and bring about a new era of peace?

Title: The Hero of Old
Synopsis:
This is a lore story to my Dungeons and Dragons world named Elandria. This is also going to be very slowly uploaded since I am also working on multiple other things and still in school. #GirlfriendsTakeAlotOfTime.
 
The story foretold on these digital pages are a fill in of the large lore hole about the body of the Lord Deus Invictus.
The Lord Deus Invictus is the deity of the world, however, he was long forgotten after the battle with the hell king Udorwrath. After the 28-year long battle Deus and The Hell King went into 1 on 1 combat and after 12 straight days of battling Deus succeeded at sealing Udorwrath back into the hellish domain from which he once came. Afterward, Deus was offered godhood and he declined violently as his own mind accepted it. The mind of Deus split from the body leaving the mind incapable of performing any mortal interactions and the body with only the physical powers of which he already had.

Title: The Maiden Of Death And Zero
Synopsis:
One tuesday, eighteen year old Kazushi Michizane finds a beautiful maiden girl in a Lolita outfit on the edge of his school roof about to commit suicide, and he therefore decides to go save her. That is, until he ends up getting stabbed and kissed. But after he gets stabbed, he finds himself back to the start of his day, almost as if he went back in time.
And on the same Tuesday, he ends up meeting a new transfer student in his class named Runa Chinatsu, a girl with dark silver hair, bright blue eyes, and fair skin. And it's then that he not only unravels what Runa was, but also becomes part of Runa's journey in a roller coaster of mysteries, time loops/paradoxes, and even necromancy. And with his friends and even some enemies along the way, it's only the start.....

Title: Gris Evighet
Synopsis: A man that has lived more than one life, wakes to one that he was very much not expecting.

Title: I am Lord Frieza! (A revival Story)
Synopsis:
How? How did it come to this?
Not just once... but twice? The great Emperor of the galaxy, yet defeated by a mere monkey? No! This is not how my story will end! I refuse to return that hell!
Until I have reclaimed my birthright as the ruler of all things I will not rest!

Frieza had been killed... twice. 
Yet as he was destined to be sentenced once more to the same agonizing hell from whence he had crawled out of, his fate had changed. This time around was different. It was not hell that he had been returned to but he was given a 'second chance' as he was reincarnated into a different world altogether. This was no longer the world in which he had ruled, but a world rife with vermin that did not know who he was. They had not bowed their heads in fear and awe of his presence and wielded strange powers known as 'magic'. Even for the galactic emperor, this world housed many odd species that he had not seen before, but this was perfect as he could soon teach them what it mean to be 'conquered'.
He was the galactic overlord; Frieza refused to follow the same path as these vermins and he would assert hs dominance the way he knew how. 'Magic?' he would not lower himself to the standard of insects but overwhelm them with the techniques that had earnt him his title in the first place.
"I do not know what this world holds in store for me... No, I do. I see an aureate throne with the bodies of vermin piling at my doorsteps. This world will be like all the others in my wake: conquered by me, Lord Frieza!"

Title: Linked
Synopsis:
What links all mankind? Is it the blood the runs through us? Is it the mana that all creatures generate. Or is it the bonds of family and business?
At the center of the tale. Drew, the young son of a bandit tribe leader, awakens to find he now leads them. He also possess something that he knows can't possibly belong to him. In fact it likely doesn't even belong to this world, but he will use it to his fullest ability if it can protect the ones closest to him.
In volume I, (Linked 'in blood') we will learn of the gruesome story behind what would soon be known as the 'greatest technological and cultural leap forward' this world has ever known.
In volume II (Linked 'in gold') we learn the lucrative exploits of the 'Duke of Blood'. This includes the building of the capital city, 'Goldianus'. And the greatest trade network of the three kingdoms. The begining of an era known as 'The Envious Rebellion'.

Title: The Fate of The Summoned (being ReWritten)
Synopsis:
The Fate of The Summoned
 
In the world of Aethion things are vastly different than on Earth. There is Magic and Monsters, as well as Demons and Dragons. Throughout the history of the world there have been many wars, both between all the various nations and kingdoms and between those nations and kingdoms and the Demonic forces lead by a Demon King or Lord. There are times that the Demons gain so much more power than the other nations, or that the others are embroiled in a war against each other and the lone nation is targeted by the demons. It was during these occasions that the various Gods and Goddesses started giving two things to the races. The First of these things were the Blessings, magical blessings given to the worth for chosen things. The Second of these things were the Summoning rituals, magic rituals that could summon beings from somewhere else, that would be Chosen, by the gods. These beings have almost always come from our world, Earth.



It has been centuries since this practice began and the countries of the world have almost always flourished for a time after a Chosen or group of them were Summoned. All of the countries treat the Summoned well, almost like kings or princes in their own right. Well, not all countries, there are some that have treated them almost like slaves, though those countries don’t usually last long. There is one though, that has lasted, for a long time due to their connection to their Patron Deity, the Goddess of Light. They only accept certain types of Summoned and they dote on certain members of the country more than others. Several years ago they performed a summoning, as they were being plagued by overflow from the dungeons. Now they, like the other countries of Aethion, have performed the ritual to fight against the current Demon King, who is said to possess a Blessing.
This is a story about Fate, and those that fight against it and those who accept it. In this story the main character(s) do not fight their fate, like those in my other story, rather they embrace it and let it shape them, though that does not mean they are total slaves to it. While there will be similarities to most other Hero sumoning novels, i hope the Mcs abilities and such will make it unique.

This life and story of mine, what shall be its title?
 

This is a short novel written in order to celebrate the upcoming February 14, Valentines Day. As it is made to celebrate the event, the story will be of course about love and — rejection.
This novel's chapters should range about 10-20 chapters.

Dale finds himself in a horrible situation and is offered a chance to turn his life around and find enjoyment in life once again within the spaces of the digital world where he can be free of all his Earthly worries and cares, and maybe make himself filthy rich in the process! What happens when one character in this world becomes a pivotal lynch pin that could change the entire game in ways the developers never intended?

    Apparantly he just got saddled with the position of managing the Earth. As you can imagine, he's fairly certain he's off his rocker. But is he, or is this all very, very real.

Synopsis:
Pan was an ordinary boy, practicing to become a mage's apprentice. He lived at home, and worked for his parents. Until the day his family is attacked by a rogue necromancer and killed. Pan is kidnapped by the mage for his affinity for magic, and in a bizarre ritual, Pan's consciousness is transferred into a dungeon stone and bound by the necromancer to serve him and create an army of skeletons.
Now Pan has to find a way to escape the magical clutches of the rogue mage, and if he can accomplish that, survive.

Lira was a second year student at the Grulik School of Magic,  a prestigious school where royalty sent their children to learn not only how to be mages but also the leaders of the next generation.  Here in this environment she struggles as the illegitimate daughter of a minor duke. Every second year student is required to summon a familiar to be there constant companions and helpers for the rest of their lives. Much to Lira’s surprise her familiar came in the form of a man that goes by the name Leon. The question now is he really a man or something else entirely?
 
Author’s note:
This one is going to be my take on Zero no Tsukaima(Familiar of Zero)  however the main female won’t be a tsundere bitch, and the main male won’t be a pussy. So expect a mix of slice of life and action and as always sex, lots and lots of sex.

Not to mention a something of a larger scope. In the search for someone who would be able to do this unrealistic feat, a group of like-minded people had banned together to organise a competition that would be held once every fifty years, Galactic Showdown! With the motto "May You Conquer the Vast Galaxy", they strived to find someone whose ability would trump everyone in their generation and even the people of the previous generations would have no definite certainty of winning again him.
Neo-Earth, an underdeveloped planet according to the Galactic Convention, was chosen to send five representatives for this competition. The only reason they were able to do so was because every time the competition was held, one planet would be randomly chosen by the organisation behind the competition and was given the right to participate. Only then did the earthlings realise that they were not the only intelligent beings that existed in the universe.

Title: My eyes can see
Synopsis:
Do you believe in the supernatural?I didn't. At least not until I woke up with a strange power.At first, I thought it was cool, but it wasn't.That power ruined my life
PS: this is a Yuri story.

Title: Jade General
Synopsis:
This spring, an imperial edict has been issued, just like it does every year. Young women from all over the empire are houled together and brought to the imperial palace, to become concubines of the Emperor, as is Wei Yin.   Wei Yin is first and only granddaughter of the late General of the West, and is acquainted with strategies and warfare, her knowledge could mean her survival in the palace... But due to the loss of her brother and her only friends, she locks herself in her room, only coming out for boozze, which results in excessive drinking.   Then she's sent to the imperial palace, to become the Emperor's concubine, together with fifty other girls... and she stirs up quite the commotion... being drunk and all. The Emperor takes a liking to her odd behaviour, but she hates him with her entire being, for an event that had occured a few years ago, when the Jade General still protected the Empire, the strongest man alive next to the Emperor.  Yin and the Emperor bicker and fight, Yin quite possibly fights everyone in the palace, but at what cost? Yin is slowly falling apart, the loss and betrayal weigh heavy on her. That's when war breaks out and the empire is in need of the Jade General once again... and it doesn't seem like he's coming, but instead...
---The story is set in a made up world, but I'll be using words from Chinese/Japanese/Korean etc.

Title: When Idols became your family
Synopsis:
When you have to choose between your dream and the love of your life, it's one of the hardest decision someone have to make, and in my case, i choose to be a dreamer ! 
I lost something precious but life rewarded me with something better .. Want to know more about my story? Want to know that living with an idol is not as perfect as it seems to be ? then ladies and gentleman read my story .

Title: They Say I Was Born a King's Daughter
Synopsis:
A murder victim is reborn, fully conscious of her past life,  as a king’s unwanted daughter in a new world where despite the end of all wars and advancement of science, misogyny reigns.
 
To read more of They Say I Was Born a King's Daughter, head to: https://tapastic.com/series/theysayiwasborn
For They Say I Was Born a King's Daughter Comic: https://tapastic.com/series/tsiwbakd-comic

Synopsis:
The PCSJ (politicaly correct social justice party) have taken over the united states, A man Creates a God in his basement, That God creates a virtual reality universe..It is only virtual.....Right? While the PCSJ regulates, taxes and brutalize the people they also fight a loosing war against the evil Faciest country Austrialia.. Jim Anderson enters a contest to be one of the first thousand people to be able to play a new virtual reality game ((name unknown atm.. work in progress)) Created by the worlds first true A.I. 
 
World setting Fant/Sci
Warning. :) If you don't have a sense of humor this story isn't for you. If you are the easily offended type..Again this story isn't for you. There will be sex, drugs, rock n roll, fried rat burgers, gratuitus violance and the ocasional drunk purple hippo. This story is NOT politicaly correct ..It is NOT approved for all audiances. Rated R for RAAAWWWWRRRRR there be DRAGONS HERE! You don fell off dee map son!....

Title: Heir to a Lost Sun
Synopsis:
With the planet’s surface reduced to a frozen wasteland after an ancient forgotten war, the last remaining humans have fled underground into a vast network of caverns they call Stelemia. 
Twenty-year-old Kara begins to have visions of a world of light she has never known and of an ancient enemy that seeks to destroy her people. But when destiny arrives- in the form of a mysterious ancient artifact- Kara discovers that her fate and that of her people are inextricably linked and that within her is the power to defeat the ancient enemy and, if she loses control or it, the power to wipe out humanity forever. 
The artifact holds the key. But it’s not giving up its secrets easily and time is running out.
Kara must learn the secrets of the past to save the future – before the ancient enemy finds her and brings about the end of humanity’s night shrouded refuge.

Title: The Elemental Dungeon
Synopsis:
A man, killed while protecting his girlfriend, reincarnates as a dungeon core on another world.
He choses the, as yet unknown to this world, path of the Elemental Dungeon.
The MC will use all maner of elemental beasts and creatures that range from made of the elements, to ones that command the very nature of those elements to thier command.
Follow the MC through the twists and turns of trying to survive as a dungeon in a world that is not always too friendly to the humble dungeon

Title: Dungeon Maou
Synopsis:
Our protagonist awakes in the middle of a bright white room with no recollection of how he got here or even who he is. The room is completely empty apart from a singular crystal in the centre of the room. After unconsciously touching the crystal, he's met with a message.
 
Dungeon has successfully been created.

Title: Abyssmal Downpour
Synopsis: Abysmall downpour is a story about a young civilian from a futuristic world, who undergoing everyday life finds himself in an unknown world as he wokes up one day.The protagonist (Karl Fenrir) tries every possible way to survive in a desolate world, where he may be the last of homosapiens !. Where evolution ,bought in various forms, is taking place at horrendous rates . Follow him on ride for answers leading to further questions. Truth is always laying front but couldn't be more hidden. As his two 'worlds' intermingle, what will the fate have in store for him?

Title: Unwritten Rules
Synopsis:
Kevin was a young man enjoying his college life when a car jumped the curb and crippled his body. Unable to support himself and dependent on others to meet his needs, Kevin was slipping into depression when his best friend convinced him to play a new game called Genesis Online. The concept was simple: a revolutionary artificial intelligence controlled the game world and adapted it to the actions of the players. Even the developers didn't know what course the game could take as it evolved.
Lured into the game by the prospect of earning real money, Kevin soon runs afoul of a man determined to control as much of Genesis as possible. He recruits other disenfranchised players to his side in his quest to find a way to prosper in the game. Can they stop the man who calls himself the king of Genesis from taking over everything?

Title: Let's Go Anywhere: The Journal of two Idiots mk 2
Synopsis:
Okay here is another go for a story once again...... Sorry.

In this story we follow not twelve but two idiots who died during an island hopping trip. 
They were true idiots as they jumped into a frenzy of sharks, during said frenzy's mating season. 
As nature dictates in this kinds of events, they get ripped to shreds. 
And as the way things are going they are reborn into a fantasy world.
 But instead of meeting Gods they were awoke infront of a temple and for the lack of better words looked as if it saw better days.

Title: A picture is worth a Chapter
Synopsis:
Hey there. This is a work based on Scribble's pictostory challenge. (If you don't know what that is, basically they give a picture and people have to write a short story on it within the allotted time)
This fiction will contain all of my work for that challenge, and possibly something extra.

Title: some story on the web
Synopsis:
a story about... well, i dont quite know. the plot is really all over the place. read it, forget it, move on with your life.
 
i guess one could consider it as a comedy, but dont expect to laugh. im a shitty writer and i have just the right amount of self hate and confidence to make it in the adult world. hope you have a mediocre day, do as you please.

Title: Method Of Loci
Synopsis:
Have you ever wondered how a blind person sees? Not their surroundings but in their mind, the place most sacred to anyone. Where they keep memories, ideas, dreams, fears, nightmares and where they let their imagination roam free.
We with sight, see things in still photos or moving pictures from memories, or other references that we see everyday. Framing our mind into something that's usually the same as most of the population, something conformed. We see the same colors the same movements, the same designs. We may all think differently but we all see the same, both on the outside and the inside.
Not Eliot because he was born blind, never seen a thing in his whole life, that is until the satellites appeared giving him vision and the whole world new possibilities.
 
***
Apocalyptic setting. Game-like elements. 
Atleast two chapter a week

Title: Lost in Time
Synopsis: Astrid had gone back to Atlantis with her friend Godric to find answers about where she had come from, but not knowing how to use her powers, they land days before the final days of the ancient city.With the city flooding around them, Godric, in a last ditch effort, told her to leave him behind. Something goes wrong though and with the help of a former enemy, Astrid must unlock the mysteries of the city before Godric is lost forever in loops of time as a stranger of the era, reliving death only to be brought back in a torture only the gods themselves could devise.

Title: Curse of life
Synopsis:
In a world of constant war, immortal beings are being annihilated, echos of a dark past are coming back, those who are weak have to choose between changing their condition or... dying.
The world of Aceria is in danger, follow the story of Harlas, starting with his life as a slave of a tiny village to... what fate depicts.
Come witness the start of a new legend and the changes that follow it.

Title: Ethereal
Synopsis:
Elysia thought that she could never play VRMMORPG again when her father was sentenced to life-long imprisonment for the crimes he committed. As she was about to give up her career, an invitation from the government came - asking her to join Ethereal. If she did, they would lift their punishment to her father. 
 
She only need to become a virtual reality soldier to fight for her country's glory.

Title: Bronze Mirror
Synopsis: It was just an ordinary day. Beating somebody in a chess match for a hundred bucks then going to her part time job at an antique shop. Lilia didn’t know what went wrong when she suddenly found herself in ancient china. Walking around and meeting a soldier, swimming around and meeting an assassin clan, stumbling around and meeting a nobleman, riding around and joining the war. A girl can’t have a break in these dangerous ancient times. With no way back home, Lilia has no choice but to survive and maybe earn an extra gold or two.

Title: Red Scarf
Synopsis:
The Gates mercenary group is well-known far and wide as a powerful force rivaling a country’s army. It is said that just a presence of its members is already equal to victory. Most powerful of them is the one called Red Scarf ,a moniker that came from a scarf that was dyed red from the blood of its victim. With a huge sword and flowing scarf, he strikes fear to both allies and enemies alike.
This is their beginning…
“Nay! I’m not Red Scarf! What kind of nickname is that?”
“I’m not a boy, I’m xiaomei.”

Title: The Black Dragon From Earth
Synopsis:
Are you tired of MCs who's overpowered but tend to hide it? Then this novel is for you.
Sup? Author here. This story won't follow the "secret/hidden identity, hiding powers," or something like that. The MC will be open and direct. Why? Because he's the real deal. Only someone who gained real power can be freed from this shackle.

I was summoned, from Earth.I became a dragon, the strongest existence.I battled, and undefeated, killed and plundered.
Why did I became a dragon?What is my destiny?What is the purpose of my existence?
I am the Black Dragon, from Earth.Roaming the world for countless years.Experiencing the bitterness of war and conflict.Finally—I—came back.With my powers as the Black Dragon retaining, I—shall conquer the world.

I'll be releasing chapters every once in a while. Please look forward to it, but don't expect too much.

Title: Infinite Horizons
Synopsis: This story is about a man, dying of cancer, who finds a new life inside an innovative MMORPG. Integrated in the game, he starts to form this new land, but is also altered by it.

Title: Spirit Binder
Synopsis:
The story of A Young boy and His Spirit Familiars. Join Aris, A young Spirt Binder raised by his widowed mother as he sets out upon the world for the first time. Aided by his Familiar Tarin, a mighty spirit from a different dimension, he will set out to grow stronger and secure a place in the world for his family!
 
Whew! Hello, Author here! I've been an avid reader of stories on this website for a few years now and have decided to try my hand at writing one of my own. The story I've planned out does take elements from many genres so I hoped to explain where I'm going with it. There will be two main characters/ story lines: one following Aris, the inexperienced, optimist while another follows Tarin, the powerful familiar who has lost most of his memories and past. The world will have various LitRpg elements such as leveling, classes, mana, stamina, and health, but they will mainly be percentage based. Please Do give it a try!

Synopsis: The story of an half human and rift-sovereign's, journey and adventure. His power is above the gods and he is omnipotent. With the power of an ruler in his blood he travels dimension. This is the story of an lazy writer (I don't consider myself an author, because I'm torturing myself here, I will refer to myself as an author in the story, though).

Title: The Book Of Witness #1: The Maiden
Synopsis: Live with the fear of freezing to death in your sleep. Thrive in the blankets of others flesh.

Title: The Greatest Conqueror
Synopsis: Chosen by powerful goddesses he descended to upon this world. He constantly trained to better himself, in ways nobody knew existed. Like a flash of thunder, he took over kingdoms and empires alike. He is, the King of Conquerors.

Title: The God of War
Synopsis: Joseph Amida, a man who was ruthlessly experimented on, is made into a 'perfect soldier'. From there he is abducted by a God to fight. He ruthlessly trains, fights, and kills. Eventually he brings himself to the pinnacle, and gets revenge on the God. He climbs the ranks, and becomes the ultimate fighter, 'The God of War'. Bored, he decides to go down to a world to find disciples to teach, and live a 'normal' life.

Title: A New Dream
Synopsis:
There is only one. The creator of the finite and infinite! He, himself, in a spur boredom and curiosity, did something.

Title: Mother Nature
Synopsis:
Additional tags: Action, Drama
A 18-year old teenager was murdered in his own house because of a certain tree in his possession and was summoned into a white room.
A woman who claimed to be the goddess of another world, Ayashi, had offered him a proposal. Ayashi was on the verge of ruin due to the battle between the Hero and the Demon Lord a thousand years ago.
He would be given another chance in life if he was willing to help rejuvenate the planet, which was 99% inhabitable. He accepts the offer and was reincarnated, but fate took him by surprise as he had now become a tree.
I have compiled the status of our favourite MC over here:https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/158yXr5D_R4Ts1gkiGEtTqb4H60WHrWvPKbPh1Gs6j6Y/edit?usp=sharing

Title: The War for Dominance
Synopsis: A man forsaken by the gods, Jet dies. The most idiotic death at that. Soon he found himself in a white room with a kindred spirit. In a world where all the myths reside. A world where every mythical god, demon,creature and heroe fight for supremacy by giving their powers to a human to fight for them. Watch as Jet counquers the world with an unfortunate one much like him.

Title: An overly OP MC in another world.
Synopsis:
My name is Carlos Drake and I've been summoned to another world...along with my three friends Jake, Roland and Lucas, we are aiming to become the greatest heroes in the world!

Title: A Soldier's Fragmented Memoire
Synopsis:
When life turns out scrambled, when the winds of fortune blow you back two steps for every step you take forward, when you are a soldier in a vast army, fresh meat to be thrown at the neverending tide of enemies, what is it you do. A soldiers task is simple, set your shield, draw your sword, and stand your ground. Do not give them an inch of our glorious's empires earth unless it is stained deeply in our blood! NO RETREAT, NEVER SURRENDER, FOR THE EMPIRE!
These are the thoughts of young Dorian, a village boy who fights for people in his town, his country, his people. Yet not everything is an enemy that you can fight with a sword. Sometimes bravery is not enough.
 
 
 
 
(this fiction has been altered from another fiction i once posted under a different account, If you have read that story do not expect things to go the same way, alot of the story has been altered in the months ive been absent.)

Synopsis:

WHERE OUR MC IS REINCARNATED AND GIVEN A CHANCE FOR A LIFE AGAIN WHERE HE BRAVES CONTLESS TRIALS AND FIGHT HIS WAY UP AND MAKE HIS OWN MARK IN THIS FANTASY WORLD WHERE DANGER LURKS EVERYWHERE AS HE BRINGS HIS WRATH  WHILE HE IS KIND AND RUTHLESS! Title: The Inn of Legends
Synopsis:
Jonah is a shepherd. He used to spend his life in the daily routine that his job demanded, herding his sheep from dawn to dusk, nothing out of the ordinary ever happening to him.
But one night something happened and the wheel of fate started to spin.

Title: Reborn in The Marvel World
Synopsis:
The story centers around a boy who has been reincarnated and as a result, can't remember who he is.   The last thing he remembers before dying is fighting with his friend about which superhero franchise is better. The next thing he knows, he has been reborn as Zen Shade, a half- black, half- Japanese kid.  Let’s just say as soon as he gets shot out of the womb, shit hits the fan. His new mom is not ordinary. She takes out ninjas with a magic sword right after giving birth. Zen thinks she is a badass and does not want to get on her bad side.
After being born, he moves to New York and sees the Avengers’ Tower. He later realized he has been reincarnated in the Marvel world. The first fourteen years of his life were pretty chill. He learns a whole lot of shit from his mom from sword fighting to Qui control to martial arts even medicine and poisoning and he even gets a special sword that can cut through anything. One Day, he is at the bank that a super villain tries to rob. He lets it go; none of his business; he is not a hero.  But, they piss him off.  So, using his skills and his sword, Kurohime he beats the super villains. This gets the attention of the Principal of Avengers Academy, Old Man Tony Stark who recruits Zen to the academy. There, he meets the kids of super heroes such as Spiderman, the Hulk, and even Thor. He makes friends and enemies. Being a super hero is easy; surviving high school with a ton of super-powered, emotionally unstable teenagers, now that is the hard part.

Title: The Other Side
Synopsis:
Hana is a twenty year old girl who lives her life alone on Earth, hoping to meet the one girl she fell in love years ago. The girl she loved used to meet her in a dream like world years ago, but one day it all stopped, leaving Hana empty inside. But one day as she is waiting and looking in her mirror at herself, the mirror grabs her and sucks her up into a new world, a world full of Victorian era buildings and customs. She had been transported to the distant world of Hygar, a world that is mixed with technological and magical advancements. But something else is at hand in the world she has been transported to.......
 
This story will conatin Elves, Vampire Nobles, Evil spirits and more, oh my! This is a steampunk Light Novel story that also has a Yuri relationship in it at all times. There will be some sexual content at times. Enjoy.
Cover pic not owned by me, but its not copyrighted I think...

Title: Anime wheel of fortune
Synopsis:
4 men get reincarnated into another world with animes provided to them by the wheel of animes. Will they get an OP anime or something like Moonlight Sailor Moon? Only the wheel knows.

Title: Garathia
Synopsis: Waking up in an unknown place with no idea what is happening is the start of an adventure for our protagonist. Follow Garth on his journey of self discovery as he tries to figure out how he came to be in this strange new world and who he is. His story takes you through a mythical unknown land where streangth is everything as death lurks around every corner.

Title: Forever
Synopsis:
One day, Damion Mercer decided to enter his Immersion Capsule and never exit it again.
He was disgusted. With humanity, with himself. So he left this world for a better one.
Using his capsule's life support, he could theoretically live forever in peace. There he could finally find the solitude that he sought for so long.
But plans never quite go as you intend them to, do they?
 
 
I take no credit for the cover. Honestly, I don't even know where I found it, just chose it when browsing through my pictures.

Title: Ordova's Demon
Synopsis:
Ordova, the land of prosperity and freedom. Within it, a young man named Darus thinks himself the luckiest one of all. After a complicated past filled with constant sorrow and pain, he finds himself finally grazing what he has always longed for; a simple life filled with love and tenderness. However, the planted seed of what could have very well been his future was tainted before blooming. Thrown back into the brutality that was his abandoned reality, he finally breaks his silence. The world has taken enough from him. It was his turn to take from the world. It was his turn to become the demon.
"Welcome to Ordova! The new, hit VRMMORPG! Journey into the lands of Ordova and become an adventure with a story worth telling! Choose and help one of the various kingdoms, become an expert monster slayer, become a skill master, do whatever you want to do! The beauty of Ordova is that you have the freedom to be who you want to be! Join us now and help create what is Ordova!!" - Description of the game, from Ordova Online.
Follow Darus, the main character of my story, Ordova's Demon. He is a NPC character within a VRMMORPG who walks the path of vengeance against the beings known as 'Players', who took everything from him.

Title: Jump! Jump! Jump! Away!
Synopsis: My journey across worlds! Slaying dragons! Saving princesses! Eating delicious food from fantasy worlds! All of this can be accomplished! If only it was that easy...

Title: From Dust
Synopsis:
A woman wakes to an empty world of dust. Confused and alone, she will have to find a way to survive.

Note: I've been playing around with this idea in my head for awhile, and decided to go ahead an make a RR account to write it down. Although I can't make any promises to continue this, I'll try my best to write as much as a novice writer can.

Title: Aggro
Synopsis: The world tournament has been Earths sweetheart since the forties. Those compete aware that they lay their lives for a chance to be immortalized in glory. Such a spectacle for the right people to abuse.

Synopsis:
Dex and Zie; two mates who end up causing trouble one way or another. One day they decide to try out co-op on a virtual reality game known as Seraphina, only to end up getting more than they bargained for.

Title: Digging Deep
Synopsis: The world isn't what it always appears to be like.  There are often gears that are turning behind the scene.  We are taught to ignore the thing that moves out of the corner of our vision, and the connections our minds naturally make.  What happens if there are things just behind the world around us, waiting for us to forget.

Title: Shadow and Silver
Synopsis:
Having recently arrived on the continent of Thayet, Lillianna has been traveling north towards uncharted lands. What starts off as a journey to explore unknown lands might end up shaping the course of history. With the land on the precipice of war, what consequences will the actions of a single mage have on its people and perhaps even the whole continent.
Author's Note: The main character is a lesbian, just a warning in case that is not your thing. It will not include any explicitly sexual content, however romantic interaction between two women will be described.

Bunny is a security officer in Puerto Limón, but when he start his work, as every day,  he find a child in a place where there should be no people in the port.
The child was locked in a bus, his first instinct is to run to rescue him.
After rescuing him, he realizes that he accidentally entered The Unknown Dimension. With what he end up rediscovering the world around him, which is  full  of magic and unimaginable dangers.

Title: Galduta
Synopsis:
What seperates beasts from men isn't the language we speak or any such drivel taught to us in school. It isn't the way we walk or our intelligence that sets us apart. Some would have you believe that it is our ability to think and reason that makes us fundamentally different from the creatures that inhabit the world.
That way of thinking, my friends, is entirely wrong.
What seperates us from them and them from each other, is simply the skin that we all wear

Title: Doesn't have a title yet
Synopsis:
Shane Aero is a 17 year old guy living in a small village with his abusive parents. Shane is the only person in the village who isn't only human, since he has wings. 
I haven't at all gotten very far in the story yet, but hoped someone would give me some feedback if i put it up here. So please leave a comment with anything you didn't like or did like. Enjoy the read!
 
P.S. Please tell me if you have an idea for a name! Thanks!

Title: Sundered World Online
Synopsis:
Yeah, it's yet another VRMMO story.
Today is the release for Sundered World Online, the most highly anticipated VR game in a long time.  The game offers a huge world to explore and a tremendous variety of races and classes to play as, including the random chance of obtaining a rare or even unique one.  Nathan finds himself with a race he never would have predicted, and sets off to make the best of it on his quest to enjoy everything the game has to offer.  After all, if you’re not having fun, what’s the point of playing?

Title: The color of her sapphires is jade
Synopsis:
Life is boring as hell,especially since its the cold season.
The chilly,unwanted snow which had yet to fall for that year,would soon come and add a thick blanket of frozen white,covering everything.Thanks to that all magic tournoments were bound to get closed.Adding the fact that the elites are supposed to shelter everyone,provididng food and warm clothes for the normals,life this year around would come to a sudden halt,untill warmness  would rescue us again.
So as you can imagine... im gonna be busy,doing absolutey nothing.
At least that's what i thought of my perfectly layed out plans,untill his visit  awoke me of my ignorance sorrounding my world,shattered it and gave a new,realistic nightmare.The scars,long forgotten ,the wounds,long healed and time,which had given me the full capacity of enyoing my life even if it was nothing but a dream made of jade,moved.

Title: [Re] Cultivating the Universe
Synopsis:
The Universe is vast and infinite. A being Controls the Universe. He chooses many souls and makes them reincarnate in different worlds. This is the story of the favorite soul of the being
 
 
 
 
 
 
Hi guys. This is re-written version of my first story that I am writing and I am a complete beginner at it.I am gonna take some ideas from other novels and fan fictions.
So any advices about my fan fiction are appreciated and I hope you guys could help me. I will try to reply to as many comments as I can.
Hope you enjoy it

Title: Chaotic|Nonsense
Synopsis: A band of friends in the far future, they met eachother in the game, played with eachother, formed bonds together, celebrated together, created a group together, all based on one idea 'The Devs aren't able to make interesting enough events, they're too constrained, so we'll be the event!". But when the devs and creator are all unkown, and the NPC's are all sentient, randomly casting infernoes in town squares and turning the fountains into rampaging elementals can get you in trouble IRL. But, it clearly doesn't end there, so read on dear reader, and see how far it goes.

Title: Regarding a Certain A.I.
Synopsis: This story is discontinued. sorry.

Title: The start of a rookie summoner
Synopsis: In a certain world a boy is born. This boy has a certain power. The power to summon everything he has ever read. Be it a weapon or a being, if he has read it he can summon it. However there is a catch. Watch as the boy grows in both power and mentality and learns more about the world.This story has a few game elements in it however that is it. I want to point out that i do not know how many chapters i will make nor the release date. I took inspiration from the novel called Summoner Hero. Check the fiction out, if you have free timeI do not own the picture. All credit goes to the photographer.

Title: God of Music
Synopsis:
This is a story about a Hero...But not an Ordinary Hero, but the Hero of Music, read about his journey through this new world as he unites the continents and eventually the world, all through love and lyrics!
 (I'll actually upload this one daily so Enjoy)

Title: Guardian Reincarnation
Synopsis:
This is my first story and I'm still a 1st year college student so dont expect my grammar to be top notch, also I'm doing this for fun!
Synopsis: On my way to home from school on valentines day a really cliche thing happened. I died. After a long time of floating in an empty space, a voice called me and said; "Congratulations lost soul! I have personally chosen you to be a Guardian of my world.Now lets get you inside the cycle of reincarnation shall we?" The next thing I knew is that I'm an abomination of a creature that seems to be respected by all living things around me. This is the story of a reincarnated guardian as he gets involved in all kinds of predicaments.

Title: The Journey of a Scarecrow
Synopsis:
This is a journey of a Scarecrow.... welp what did you think it would be about.......
 
Don't like my synopsis get over it.
 
 
 
 
Doing this just for the pure giggles help is apreciated also there will be polls to find out where the hell im going with this book. there will be profanity may some sexual contient and if you don't like my synopsis tell me and i may or may not listen. hope you enjoy the story.
