Title: Aruna
Synopsis: Its story that happened in a world called Aruna where magic and science does exist. The story itself is about a kid and his mechanical doll who seeks revenge to the one that killed his mother and find the truth.

Title: But I never wanted to be involved
Synopsis: My friend loves light novels, games, anime. All I wanted was for some peace and quiet. But he just had to drag me along didn't he. For once, the idiot was summoned as the hero, here's the problem he pulled me. Then I ended up in the same world just no clue where the idiot friend of mine is gone to.

Title: Universal Strength: Power is Everything **Indefinite Hiatus**
Synopsis:
Power is a thing that many people greatly yearn. Those with power yearn more power and those without power yearn for it. There isn't anyone born with power that they can call their own. Power is either earned or given and in reality it doesn't matter which is better, power is power and power is everything.

This is another story that has been going around in my head and I just had to let it out. I think I did a decent synopsis on this one lol.
I will not be dropping my other two stories and I will be releasing one chapter of this a week as well.
 
Chapter release is honestly whenever I can. (Warning! Story is partially wish fulfillment.)
The cover art used is from Google Images and will be changed when I create one or have one created for me.

Title: Indefinite
Synopsis:
Tied to a room with only the instruments that keep me alive. Having suffered for so long, I too will succumb to the passage of time.
So what is this darkness? What the fuck is going on? What is this indiscernible voice that surrounds me? You going to send me somewhere and i get a choice? and you giving me my memories?
Reborn as a the child of a ruling clan, a fresh start with a family.
This time, I will have no regrets!

Title: The Emblem of Love and Hate
Synopsis: Have you ever pondered, why is love necessary in our lives ? and why hate and love are like two sides of coin . Follow the misadventures of Reincarnated godchild , A girl searching for the meaning of life, A man who lost everything and live for himself and a princess who lost her emotions and see it for yourself.

Title: Dungeons. Why You Might Ask? Because I Can!
Synopsis:
A: Hi Guys. This is a story that takes place in the same "universe" as Reincarnation Royale, but it doesn't just use material from other worlds and the "game" that the mc is a part of is different. If you didn't already guess from the title, the mc will be a dungeon master. The reason I am writing this story is because I'm bored and I can. Don't worry, Reincarnation Royale will still update like it always has. This story is just to let out my frustration since I won't have to spend time researching. Anyways, enjoy. 
B: I think he forgot to mention that since Reincarnation Royale is entering its battle phase that there won't be as many chance to write about ***, and that made him want to write a story where he could write about it while alternating between the 2 stories.

Title: The Ethereal Expanse
Synopsis: Argate is an adventurous guy who has had the great misfortune of leading a boring life.  His life enters a turning point as he is teleported to another realm by means of a mysterious box that houses a dying female with metallic circles around the eyes.  Now he must venture into this new world with oddly familiar gaming mechanics with his robot companion to sate his desire for adventure but only time will tell if this proves to be more than what he bargained for.

Title: 最も強い -- ( Strongest in existence ~)
Synopsis:
First of all this is a story that I´m writing casually in my free time so i think for the first few chapters dont expect regular updates.. 
This will be a story where the comment squad has a heavy influence on the story because I would find it funny to try and mix some things in that you guys suggest me in the comments :)Anyway now to the synopsis : This is a story about a boy named James Anderson.James died because he was struck by lightning while he was walking down the street on a rainy evening... After he thought everything was over he heard a voice asking him for a wish and for one wish only.. He knew his answer as soon as the question was asked because he fought for his whole life despite being only 19 years old.. He always has had a rough time because his family was poor and they needed to fight for every bit of money they could get.. he got in fights a lot.. so his wish was a simple one that would change everything.. " I wish to have the potentiell to become the strongest being in all existence so that i dont have to fight anymore ! "
 
I dont really know where this story will go but i have a few ideas in mind, as alredy mentioned before, i write this on a whim and hopefully " together " with the readers...I hope you enjoy the story ~~~
 
PS: Cover found on Google, i own no rights on that one.

Title: What about this is normal?
Synopsis: Among all the chaos in the street he meets his end by the typical truck running him over. Out of pity God gave him a chance to have a second life. But in exchange he'd do it for the God's amusement.

Title: The Urge
Synopsis:
The synopsis for each book in The Urge Saga is inside each own respective sub topics.
Book One : Blood

Title: He didn't get hit by a truck and die, and missed his reincarnation. So what?
Synopsis:
Um - The story of how someone died due to some reason or another, was reborn in a different world which contained magic and Neko-girls in a pseudo-medieval setting, and attended a magic academy, impressed the old king, had a harem, destroyed the monsters, which was read by over an million viewers on the syosetsu, got adapted into a light novel (for which I’m very grateful, even though it was @lph@p0lis), which then got adapted into a slightly worse manga that didn’t prove to popular and hence axed, (volume 6 is on sale!) and is currently considered for an anime adaptation (pray for it, everyone), or an incomplete OVA (please don’t pray for this) with four spinoffs already in the works, along with two prequels and one sequel -did not happen?!
Warning - Actual Content Varies Wildly, And Both the Synopsis and the Title are Wildly Misleading (Though Accurate, In Lieu of the Negative Sentence Used). Read this at your Own Peril. 
May Lead to Loss Of Sanity, An Uncomprehending Face, or A Tell-tale Heart. Reactions Can Range From Mild Vexation, Medium Indignation, Regretful Exasperation, Passionate Ire And Dissipating Desire. You May Also Hear Audible Breathing, Loud Snorting, Deafening Farting, Or Even Distinct Laughing. Even More Rarer Cases Can Include A Bemused Chuckle, Bloody Coughing, Death Throes, Unquenchable Tears And A Faint Sense of Unfathomable Melancholy (Unlikely, But Still).   
Story is Supposed To Describe Real Life, Which Unfortunately Does Not Resemble A Story. Events, Characters, Actions, and Details Will Be Provided By the Author. Meaning and Morals Depends on the Reader.
This Is A Cipher, Of Which You Are the Theme.

Title: Eros Libera
Synopsis: A boy blessed by the heveans suddenly met a twist in fate, which led him in a situation he never even dreamed of happening.

Title: Forge of Creation
Synopsis:
Author's note: "This is my first time trying to write a novel. Please tell me if I make mistakes of any kind".
I really don't know where I am ging with this, but I want to write a fantasy novel about creation, revenge and redemption. you are welcome to make suggestions in the comments, and thank you for reading this! ^_^

Title: Half
Synopsis:
A child born of a forbidden relationship. 
A child cursed since the day of his birth.
A child who has the power to change the world.
This child was born into the world befalling great calamity, his birth itself is a mistake everything in his life is a mistake.
In this world where half breeds are rejected and the strong are accepted. Will this child ever find his true meanign in life?
Will his power become a blade to clear out his enemies of or a blade that takes his life?
Will he ever find happiness or will he die in sorrow?
Follow the struggles and hardships faced by the person who will soon be seen as a hero, as a ruler or a god.

Title: The Great Nok Ma
Synopsis:
It was year 20XX, earth was facing a crisis with over population and global warming.
It was then that a crazy scientist invented a device to shrink all the humans in the world together with the help of the world leaders.
Smaller size = Smaller space = Smaller pollution 
But they got more than what they hoped.
For this event led to the discovery of the world unknown to all of them.
Follow Nok Ma as he makes the best of it.

Title: Crystal Core
Synopsis: Meet Rob, a Romanian guy that transformed into a crystal core.

Title: Re:Interference- Did something go wrong with my Rebirth?
Synopsis:
<<Would you like to be reborn in a new world, as an overpowered Hero of Justice?>>
The GOD made a simple offer. And the man rejoiced, and gladly accepted.
However...something goes wrong, and instead of being reborn, the man wakes up inside a strange room in a ruined temple.
<<Did something go wrong with my Rebirth?>>
-NOTICE- This series is also available on my personal blog, along with two other series I am currently working on (blog exclusives).
-NOTICE- CHANGE OF SCHEDULE-
Due to some IRL stuff, I am forced to change the schedule for Re:Interference. Because of that, I will make two major changes to the schedule. First, I will be able to release one single chapter each week. Next, the release of it will be random. That means, one week I could release it on friday, the next one on sunday etc... whenever a chapter is ready (writing, editing, proofreading of 9000+ words) it will be released.
If you read this, please do keep in mind that:

English is not my native language (so, by all means, if you spot bad grammar/ wrong terms etc take your time to leave a comment, it will help me a lot)
As this is my first attempt at writing a web novel (well...technically it's my second attempt...but oh well) please leave some feedback about the story. Any kind of feedback will be appreciated (unless it is just blatant, non-funny insult)

Thank You for your Time!

Title: Infinite Branches: Eternal [DARKLITRPG]
Synopsis:
Asgardia is a world of might and magic, one of many worlds of the myriad realms beholden to the Tree of life, Yggdrasil.
How do you cope with your life being threatened by those in power? How do you defend against impossible odds? Fortune and misfortune sometimes go hand and hand. A child must endure what even adults couldn’t possibly bear. 
(Subject to change. This is a side Novel I'm doing for experience's sake. Chapters will be uploaded sporadically and after my other projects)

Title: Guardians Awakened
Synopsis: If there is a sense of reality, there must also be a sense of possibility. -Robert MusilReality is mysterious, isn’t it? Always making you wonder what is real and what is not. That’s certainly the case for our two protagonists.Two Guardians, one world. A tale about one reality becoming another. Our two Guardians futures will be left to fate as they go through confusion, misfortune, trust, and determination. Will they be lost to the unknown I wonder? A better question is, will they survive? Welcome to an Awakened Life.A/N: This is my first story on RRL. Please give constructive criticism and any advice if you wish to. If you read my story and find something wrong with it, don't complain or insult, tell me what's wrong and I will try to fix it. I'm an open minded person.More tags or content warning will most likely be added in later for future chapters. Cover Art was done by me and is also the symbol for our protagonists' guild.

Title: Automaton Goliaths
Synopsis:
In an alternate universe of Fantasy Medieval Europe legends speak of 5 giant mechanical humanoids known as the Goliath. These giants are known to be a super-weapon that spread mischief and wreaking havoc to anyone whom faced it.
A Legend would soon once again become a reality.
What happens when man holds these war machines, the balance would again shift to those olden days of the past.
 

This is a fictional work of medieval Europe. Any resembling characters, factions and events are purely coincidental for the creation of this story.

 Automaton Goliaths can also be found here:
https://generalsporte.wordpress.com/projects/automaton_goliaths/

Title: A Dragon's Soul
Synopsis: This is my first novel. So don't be harsh reading it. Coming up with a better synopsis.

Title: Forgotten Emperor
Synopsis:
Not everything is like it seems. Dark clouds gather on the sky only to be switched by the flash of light. Every now and then you ask yourself what is the meaning of all of this? Life - this strange stuff? And so you are forced to walk in the dark - having only a creeping madness as a companion looking for some answers - but no answers are given... Come with us - on a journey with our (not so)great mc in the world full of magic, wonders and stuffs. Yeah... Many stuffs. It won't give you any answers - but what the hell - just read it...
Warning - story might contain some allusions to other stories on royalroadl - if you don't have any sense of humor - read it. I don't really care.
Warning - I suck at english. And by suck I mean I have some issues. And by "I have some issues" I don't really mean anything - just writing so don't expect mountains of gold and silver and maybe coal and iron.
Warning - I might just stop writing all of sudden - or not. Who knows? I'm a moody person.

Title: The Demon And The Sword​
Synopsis:
A LitWuxia story: After a crushing defeat, the Demon Sects have scattered and the Orthodox Sects dominate the Martial Arts World. Peace is shattered, however, when the Demon King Ma Biao unites the Demon Sects and seems poised to challenge the Orthodox Sects. Qiang Feng, an amnesiac young student at Qingxao Sect, may be the only hope of the Orthodox Sects but his past will come back to haunt him.
 
The cover art was painted by 'JohannaK'.

Title: BlackCrown
Synopsis:
Three hundred years ago multiple meteors broke into earth's atmosphere and landed in various places. The meteors change the world. By releasing strange substances into the earth, air, and water the planet started to change. It was not until ten years later that the first batch of superhumans was born. They had abilities that could not be explained. Superspeed. Superstrength. Magic. The superhumans showed the world that all of it was possible. They called the abilities EXO and the people who wielded such an ability, EXO users.
They quickly found out that not every EXO was the same. One EXO user had one EXO ability and what that ability was could be categorized into one of three types. Offensive, Defensive or Support.
The government was the first to act after five years. Every EXO user must be subjected to whole new laws and they must get their abilities under control. Specialized schools were built all across the world that were made to train them. Under the pretense of saying it was to develop their abilities, the government was actually building an army. Humans were not the only ones to change…

Title: Amunation
Synopsis: Finn Willow the world greatest gunsmith, the most hated man , and the detroyer are some of the many names his been given by the world  finds him self dead a heart attack caused by a bullet he created. Finds himself reborn has The first prince on a new world what will he do now.

Title: Neo Genesis: Online Book 1: Rise of the Lost King
Synopsis:
My life is a drag.
"The Boy Wonder" "Miracle Child of the Ages"
Where do people come up with these absurd titles.
I'm just living my life as it is, in solitude like my blades, Raijin and Fujin.
Wait, is that a new game I see?
"Neo Genesis:Online" NGO?
Well I got this extra time so why not? I'm already successful in this world, why not stride to success in the virtual world?

Title: Cutting the Moon (discontinued)
Synopsis:
Cane Silk or C9, as his old "buddies" called him, whilst still alive on Earth may be considered a thug and gangster, but not even Cane himself understood why his "good karma" allowed for him to reincarnate. The horrid part of California, the crumbled area, as most call it, is in fact Cane's home town or the place he was forsaken. He had to survive on the streets and live by meager amounts of food, but he did survive and Cane became one of the most feard thugs  around California. Cane was shot by a sniper on his way to his old "town" and he died. Cane later wakes up in another world, whilst sleeping soundly in the snow. Cradeld by the snow and illuminated by the moon Cane strives once more to survive within an unforgiving world. Will Cane make it in a world that is even more frightfull and horrid than the one he knows?
(The story may start slow, but I plan on taking it to the next level. I hope who ever tries this story will like it and I hope that someone comments on my grammar good or bad.)

Title: Pure Steel Heart
Synopsis: A human girl who used to be a robot from the past. Seeking her creator somewhere outside of the world. Her only clue is the one she made in the blueprint that she found at her life support capsule.

Title: Rough Beginnings: Quest For the Resurrection Stone Book 1
Synopsis:
In the far future the Earth is overcrowded and as a means of population control Draken Realm is born, players from all over the world volunteer to leave their old lives behind and enter into a fantasy world where anything is possible. However, for siblings Tony and Sarah they soon find that world of Draken Realm is far from a paradise. The Guilds are on the brink of war, and the other player races are closing their borders as the Necromancers and their minions raid more and more player settlements. Seeking to bring peace to their new home the siblings embark on a quest for the fabled resurrection stone, one of the world changing items hidden in Draken Realm by the developers. That is of course if they can survive.
Heads up: This is a rough draft and this is also my first time writing in the LitRPG genre. All respectful critiques are welcome.

Title: Time & Tied
Synopsis:
A war in the future is spilling into our present. Enter Carrie Waterson, a teenage girl who ends up with a time machine. In using it, she learns that she is tied to a future destiny. What does that mean for her now? Who in her high school can be trusted to help out, given how some of her friends have their own agendas and mystic connections? Most importantly, how might Carrie fight against the future, when the future is herself?
(ASIDE: Cover was an old commission from Sabrnyan.)

Title: Slimes live freely
Synopsis:
As a class of students is summoned by the light goddess to stop the demon king. A soul that got thrown into the mix bonds to the nearest soulless living object, a slime. He has broken skills, 25 years, and a grudge it plans to hold.
 
For Lazy readers: an op slime MC with a few cute companions travels the world making references, singing and eating people.

Title: The Guy Who Wanted To Talk To Aliens
Synopsis: What if I told you aliens were real? Would you believe me or just laugh at the ridiculous statement that I just proposed? This is my story of how I came in contact with a group of interdimensional aliens.WARNING: PLEASE READ WITH AN OPEN MIND.

The stories aren't in any order. Browse the chapter titles and pick one that jumps out to you!
J. Elias Epp

Title: Old man's wish 1.0
Synopsis:
Welcome, Dawn SkywalkerYou have been chosen to carry out the lifetime wish of Grandpa Li: Become a cultivator that stands at the pinnacle of martial arts and create a sect for your descendants.
Fuck...I'm an old man? Where's my youth? Where's my charming looks?! Luckily, I got this awesome gaming system. Something troubling you? Let Grandpa Li fix that for you. Got a sickness? This old man can solve it for you. Watch as an old man climb to the pinnacle of martial arts: from a mere mortal to an invincible god.

Title: a ai`s adventure in a different world in space

long ago humanity made a ai but it failed or so they thought and this is its story from birth to death to birth watch as he meets god and is sent to another worldquick note this is a space story the mc will not go in a fantasy setting if you want that i would recomend

Title: Magnus of Theta
Synopsis:
... Thereupon lies the folly of man; the taste of blood in one's mouth; the sweat glistening from their brow; all in search of a single, fragmented moment in time where they, themselves reign supreme, abandoning their morals to see to its final days- 
"Muahaha! I'll take my throne again! Watch me! I'll be the best damned Demon Lord you ever did-""Shush, Mom's coming. And what happened to 'King' or 'Emperor'? And I killed you once already. Don't bother." "Wah! Not fair! I still took you with me, you damned Hero!" ... This is a story of reincarnation with the successor to the demon king's throne and the hero who ended his reign. Will he conquer the world to live out his dream of power, or will the subtleties of life drag him off in a new direction - stay tuned! 
 
---
 
Any ideas for a cover would be appreciated. Will pay in unfinished stories.

Title: Little presence and almost no shadow
Earthen Journey

This story is about a man named John Breeze, a mountain man, a lover of earth, and hater of squirrels.  His journey in a different world that is coomplete with different races, Gods, magic, and all kinds of stupid OP characters.  Will he become one or will he just live in the mountains away from all the noise?

Note: If you by chance have read my previous attempt at writing a story you will find some similarities.

Title: The Dillutionist
Synopsis: Mark Kotz; 46 year old mental ward patient and former businessman. Spent the last twenty years in a state of mental delusion believing himself to be a great super criminal. In his mind he has spent the last twenty years fighting, learning, and expanding his skills and influence as a master criminal to become the most infamous and untouchable man the world has ever known. However when he wakes from this delusion he is shocked to find himself in a mental hospital. He finds out he suffered a breakdown after his wife died and was later deemed unfit to raise his children, leaving him alone. His kids, now grown up, only visit him on occasion and have seemingly given up on him, having grown up in foster care. Most people saw Mark as unstable and irrational during these twenty years and continue to after his escape from the mental ward. In actuality Mark’s knowledge and skills from the last twenty, even though we're all in his head will be used to re climb the ranks of the criminal world.

Title: Alice: Conquering Nightmare
Synopsis:
##Sexual & traumatising content - Contains disturbing stuff such as rape, slavery and such. Stating this clearly now that someone pointed it to me that they really hate that stuff.

2012, humans started disappearing.
At the start of each month, a handful, going on to the tens, hundreds and even thousands of humans would disappear.
Governments, scientists and even the priests, they all did what they could.
But... what can they do?
With a single flash of light, poof goes a person. Nothing more, nothing less.
 
Flash forward to 8 years after, the human population has gone down by half.
The disappearance persists, stronger than ever.
On the first day of January, 2020.
Several millions, had gone missing.
 
 
Within an unknown temple, Alice was summoned, along with ninety-nine others.
Panic. Confusion. All that good stuff.
But, wait.
Isn't Alice trembling a little too much?
 

##Sexual & traumatising content - Contains disturbing stuff such as rape, slavery and such. Stating this clearly now that someone pointed it to me that they really hate that stuff.

Title: Idiots Guide to Saving the World
Synopsis: Have you ever wanted to read a story of a epic adventure full of smart witty, and great adventurers. Too bad. You're stuck with buff idiotic barbarians with a senile wizard that would kill a dragon and take its gold to make a statue of a dragon and nothing else. Luckily for them, they're practically invincible. Don't worry though, one character at least has some common sense.

Title: THE OTHER LIFE OF ACP
Synopsis:
This is about a fat boy who is generally average in someway, dies on a home robbery. he met god, with an unusual apperance, and was able to pick reincarnation or, transportation. he picks transportation, but was not able to pick a cheat skill, it was already picked by god.
 
 
 
oh and i'll be updating this 1-2 times a week. like sunday to saturday. or at least i'll try.

Title: Inferno Falling
Synopsis:
The world was a happy place. A peaceful community that got along. It was also extremely dull.
Then it changed, and for the first time, I was free.

Title: Cloud Shrouding the Sky
Synopsis:
Everyone will gain a blessing from God when they reach the age of 10. As an orphan I, Cloud, also went to the temple as the others when I reach the age of 10. When I was about to get the blessing, I met God. God tell me that he got something extra because my evolved soul. Later I learnt that what I got was a cheat skill. 
With this cheat skill i will be able to create a better future, if i can get into it. But really, kicked out from the orphanage and living on slums, not getting any job because my age and skills. Forced to pickpocket nobles and merchant with risk of getting arrested, sold as a slave or even executed. What a life, the future is bright but the present is so bleak that i almost blind.
Then she came into my life, although it is i who first save her from danger but later on she gave me all i can ask for. A job with good pay, a place to stay, even her father sent me to the world famous Academy with her. She is my lady of luck, all skill i got was because i met her.
Without her, even with cheat skill probably i wont be the present me. She changed my present and ensure my bright future. Right now i pledge that i will always stay by her side and guarantee her hapiness as her servant or companion. With me, Cloud, here even the sky were to fall dont you even have a slighest worry because i will definiteley protect you.
 
This is my first time writing a story, i dont know if you guys will receive it well or not. I started to read LN from NU and RL, and it enchanted me. But unfortunately the author and translator are humans too so they couldnt keep up with my reading rate. From what i had read, i started to imagine what if the world like this, or what if this character had an ability like this or what if the decision the character made was different than the stories.
All of that keep coming up as i read, and then a few weeks ago i started to write what i imagine into a new story. Through writing the story i learnt that making a story isnt as easy as imagine. I must think of name, plot, character personalities, the environment, etc. Then one day i decided, fuck it lets post it first and see how it is going to be.
To tell you the truth i like chinese martial arts story better but i cant make chinese name since i dont know the language. I learnt from the internet that creating a random name in Chinese is dangerous so i make this story to be Japanese like western story. But i still want to add martial arts and cultivation element to it.
I will write what my imagine is like, something will be changed along the way thats for sure but i hope you guys will understand it. Each chapter will at least have 1500 words but i am not so good at english so correct me if there is something wrong with my grammar. I post this so that i can share what i imagine. One last thing, i like OP Main Character and although i dont hate training plot but i dont like weak main character.
I hope you like what i write, any critics and suggestion is welcomed so write it on comment section so we can discuss it with the others.
 
Warning
For you guys that dont like OP Main Character, bad language, violence, and maybe in the future there will be NSFW content, dont read it
For those who seek perfection, you wont find it here
Strategy, Business Management, Trickery not my forte so dont seek it here but i will try to make it if possible
Character skills will randomly appear as i tried to think what op skill i want for my character so bear with it
Plot will be good, well i hope so if not then bear with it

Title: Plane of Darkness: The Battle Against Time
Synopsis: After being killed in the previous World. Innight thought his life has finally came to an end. However, he gets mysteriously reincarnated into a new Timeline, one that he could not use his powers in. One day, Nightius, one of the Rulers of the Dakrness Elemental Plane, creates a Time Cube that grants the user control over Timeline. Things quickly accelerate when Innight and his friends found that someone, or something, is stealing the Time Cubes and the Timelines that they live in are slowly fracturing.  Who could be behind this? Can Innight regain his powers to stop whoever that is using the Time Cubes?

Title: Estranged God of Fiction
Synopsis:
Maxi Seymour has always been a regular person, wanting to find some form of enjoyment within his own webnovel which he had shared to the large vast space called the Internet. He was somewhat famous for what he does on the web, and he grew accustomed to such a foreign concept. (To him anyways.)
But even in his seemingly ordinary life, one special chance has been forced upon him, whether on not he will accept it. 
Now that he was somewhat pulled away from the fabrics of reality, and into the fiction which he had put his hard work onto, he will try his best to achieve... something, he does not know what to do.
Yet even so, with his book and pen in hand, he will try his best to find his own reason while combatting the struggles in which will be thrown at his face in this brand new world, even if he made it in the first place.
 
 
A remake of the first shitty fiction an author(me) made, for it will try to make this second one less shittier. (Mature just in case.)

Title: Godhood
Synopsis:
An all too generous and kind man named Martin Wilde died one morning when he was giving a $100 dollar bill to a homeless man and was stabbed by the same homeless man. He died with only one regret. He wished he picked a different day to be so generous. But unexpectedly he didn't get to move on as he was summoned to a mysterious void with a message appearing within his mind.
-Martin Wilde, you have died with an extremely high amount of karma. You have high enough karma to reiencarnate into the God of a newly formed universe. Do you wish to accept. (Y/N)-
"YES."
 
PS: This is my first story and I'm not that good at writing so critisim is welcome.
PPS: I'm doing this for fun so there may be 10-15 day gaps between chapters.

Title: Fell down into a dungeon
Synopsis:
A story of a boy who fell into a dungeon and tries to find an exit while encountering monsters.
---

Title: Diary of an Insomniac
Synopsis: The content from the diary of an individual who may be more than what he seems. It contains his thoughts, outlook on life, stories of his days, and tales of his sleepless nights. There are frequent and sudden changes in stories and mood. I am not sure what to make of it. I think there may be something wrong with him.

Title: Fated Realms: A Tale of Two Siblings (Working Title)
Synopsis:
In the near future of 2057, VR technology has taken precendence as the most used platform for all forms of entertainment. It became the most affordable way for single users to access the internet, media, games, communication, and more. Over 70% of populations in 1st World countries have any variation of a VR headset.
However, in the most recent VRMMO Fated Realms, players have been disappearing. While it is mainly attributed to mere coincidence, several players think otherwise. Cassandra and Eli, two siblings that are estranged from their family, are thrown into a journey of seeking the truth of those disappearances. Along the way, they encounter and learn things within Fated Realms and form connections between new friends and enemies...

He has different set of values and in some cases lacks common sense, but as being the one who get the job done by any means necessary was one of the reasons to his fame, or infamy, depending on who you would ask.
It's year 2026, and the third world war will soon commence, but before that Pyro has a target to eliminate... or two.

Title: random bandit's story on how he died
Synopsis:
Be aware that this is a short story, and I will not be uploading more chapters... well at least I don't currently plan to...
[begin synopsis] "Listen to a random guy how he tells his death story in the eternal hall. Who he was before his death, and how he came to die. " [end synopsis]

Title: Roaming Through The Heavens
Synopsis:
Meihui is an orphaned divine magical beast hunted by the world. Alone, she must grow quickly in power or be devoured by her multitude of enemies. Can she cultivate fast enough to freely roam the heavens? 
Inspired by the works of IET- Coiling Dragon/Stellar Transformations/Desolate Era/Lord Xue Ying
 
Cover by Royalroadl artist- ei83mon69

Title: Legends of Dorthar: Kato's Tale
Synopsis:
The universe is infinite. It is a place of countless possibilities, planets can be created and destroyed in seconds, lifeforms are produced and crushed through the ravages of time. A beggar can rise up and become a prince whilst an emperor can lose everything to a peasant revolt.
In a small corner of the infinite space lies the planet Dorthar. A place which has seen the rise of kingdoms and the fall of empires, the immortalisation of men and the rise of devils. It is here our story starts, in The Legends of Dorthar.

Title: Wicked Resurgence
Synopsis:
Oct. 31st 20XX
Halloween. 
Kids frolicking around happily dressed in costumes mimicking something they saw once on television encounter on this day the man-made horror's adults put in their lawns for their own amusement. Fake skeletons and corpses lay about porches and hang from trees, tombstones stretch about lawns and Jolly Rogers are painted across doors and on flags. People dressed as clowns and monsters from horror movies prance around the streets spooking onlookers and children searching for treats. Through the terrifying delight that extends over the Earth on this day, a true wicked influence lurks about. Its agents of mischief and sin are entwined throughout the world, waiting to thrust through the surface and hash out true villainy unto the unsuspecting victims called humans. However, heroes, humans with unique abilities, claim to be able to protect their kind with their strength. Not without being paid by the government, of course. These heroes are the ones who will protect the human race from any scum who dare threaten it, and any criminal who disrupts the peace.
Ciervos, however, is not a hero. To the humans, He is, through and through... 
A zombie.

Title: Butterfly's Dream
Synopsis:
A dream in the english language represents two things, either an illusion the mind conjures in sleep or the idolized fantasies of a conscious creature. Unfortunately, they tend to never materialize although almost anyone with dreams would wish they did.
After all, where else could you escape the boredom of reality? The thing that confines you to a monotonous life where you can't indulge in your delusions or fantasies or wishes.
 
*Obligatory first story warning and hopefully sincere statement that constructive criticism is appreciated 
**Any suggestions for cover art once you feel like you have a good feel for the story is appreciated.

Title: Supreme Inhertiance: Soaring Above The Skies
Synopsis: In "The Aries Continent", a great talent named Lin is born. He defeat all who challenged him. Searching for a more profound strength, he enter a forbidden area where no one would dare go. He finally found it but it was more than expected. He unexpectly obtained the bloodline of "The Great Divine Bird Clan". It was a extremely powerful class of magical beast, that was externimated milleniums ago. Their strength was ranked among the best. Having his talent upgraded, he decide to not disappoint them. Resolutely, he swear, he would make them even more grander than before. He will soar above the skies and spread his name far. Witness the elegance and grace of the one of the most powerful beings in the world.

Title: Afterlife Online
Synopsis:
Ralph is a 14 year old boy that has recently died. Taking him to Afterlife Online.
 
Will this be a little cliche? proably.

Title: RE: Necromicy! The Mouse Necromancer!
Synopsis:
Mikey was a good boy... with some mental issues, as his mother drunk a lot while being pregnant, and father sometimes could drop him while tying to cuddle him (he was always drunk) and because of his problems he never got friends. BUT when he was in London in the year of 2012 he got hit by a firetruck and died.
But that was not the end of his journey, as he met an old lady Death, who actually likes cute things, and doesn't have friends due to her looks. So the little guy befriended her before transporting to the new world, but... Death being an airhead as she is, accidentally turned him into a mouse...
***
Warning!
This fiction has no serious plot and is set with rules of Pyro universe, slightly modified.
Made because there were no Mouse Necromancers... There was a Hamster Demon lord, but... RIP Hamster...
Will be updated at least once a week, unless said otherwise. Chapters will be quite short by the way.
Chapters will be posted when I push myself to continue with this fiction. Moose decided to run away, or muse... or mouse, but in this case, it's probably the fault of my cat...

Title: Splattercore: Devil
Synopsis:
After being raptured by the goddess Persephone, Erin Frost is reborn as a [Mythic] corrupted Core. Together with her enslaved souls, she takes her first steps in a world familiar yet different from the one she knew. Her ultimate goal: to find the man who tried to kill her as the world came crashing down - and to proclaim her undying love for him. 
Act 1/Book 1: Progenation
Act 2/Book 2: The rise and fall of the Devil's Empire
Act 3/Book 3: Wild Hunt
 
Disclaimer/About the Author:  
'Splatterpunk, Yandere Dungeon Core.' We'll see if it goes anywhere. Read at your own risk.
Some things you should know about my 'writing process'  before continuing here. Each chapter falls within an outline, and the story overall is meant to have a loose three-act structure, but the details consist more of my fantasies and dreams than planned content and may seem a bit disjointed at the first go. Additionally, while I run my writing through some grammar programs before posting, I will post for a couple of days before doing another read-through and revision, fixing the autocorrect errors, and working the text into something of a second (vastly more readable) draft. As such, modifications to content are expected and will take place at any time.
I don't intend to publish. I write these stories down to get them out of my head and sleep at night. I post them here because my fantasies are sadly missing from contemporary fiction, and I hope to inspire others to write books and stories, in turn, that I would like to read.

Read what other people are saying about this book!

Moreover, gore and truly grotesque sexual perversions are sprinkled throughout in a way that does not add to the story, but rather is clearly just a sad attempt by the author to gross their audience out without rhyme or reason. Zero out of ten."  - Kevin Johnson
"I truly cannot recommend this author's writing to anyone. Title: Swords and Blood
Synopsis:
In a tyrannical world, what is evil? What is benevolence? All living creatures are brutal. Passing through the heaven road to find one’s purpose in life. Struggles to be stronger is not an easy path. 
   "One word doesn't say anything and at the same time it hides everything like the wind that hides the water Like the flowers that hide the mud. A glance doesn't say anything and at the same time says everything like the rain on your face or an old treasure map. A truth doesn't say anything and at the same time it hides everything like a bonfire that won't go out like a stone that gives birth to dust. If one day I don't have you I will be nothing and at the same time I will be everything because in your eyes are my wings and the shore where I drown, because in your eyes are my wings and the shore where I drown"

Title: Tales of The Protector (Title is a WIP)
Synopsis:
This is a story about a boy who discovered that he is a unique person- his father is descended from an alien race of techno-organic shape changers, his mother is the great grand daughter of a dimension hopping magii, and he seems to have inherited the best of both bloodlines. And that's not even mentioning the long list of supernatural and otherworldly creatures he could count as family, if he knew to ask.
Now, he must learn how to be a man in a world that seems out to get him. Will he survive to use his great power responibly? Or will he fall to the darkest depths?
 
"Thank you everyone for reading this new story of mine. I got the idea for this story from a couple of sources. The main ones are tv show's and movies about teens that develop super powers, and in doing so discover that their parents aren't all they seem to be. (Such as max steel and Firebreather) the second big source is a dream I had, weirdly enough. 
So please, read, enjoy, and let me know if you find any grammatical errors, or have problems with my science(which I will be using to explain the tech stuff)"

Title: Confederacy of Dragons
Synopsis:
Born as a dragon in a fantasy world. Our "hero" seeks to lead the oppressed against the tyranny of the other races.
(My first story and I'm looking for lots of constructive criticism, also I do not own the cover. It is owned by a deviantart user named yuchao1000)

Title: Witches of the Night
Synopsis:
Few know this, but, beneath our cities, in the midst of forests and mountains and even under the waters of the ocean, there is another world, a world full of magic, fantastic places, and mythological and imaginary creatures. By chance, I became aware of it, and my curiosity led me to explore it.
Now, I regret not having controlled myself, not having ignored this knowledge and continued with my regular life. For, though I have seen incredible things beyond the imagination of most people, I also met the Witches of the Night and the terrible truths about the human condition and the place of humanity in the universe they brought with them.
 
How do I get back to a normal life after everything I saw? I don't know if it's possible, but this account is an attempt to mitigate the terrible effects of this knowledge, a first step toward normalcy. Perhaps sharing everything I discovered, the simple idea that this knowledge is not only mine, will help me.

Title: Bruxas da Noite
Synopsis:
***Portuguese Edition***
 
Poucos o sabem, mas, debaixo das nossas cidades, no meio das florestas e montanhas e até sob as águas do oceano, existe um outro mundo, um mundo cheio de magia, lugares fantásticos e criaturas mitológicas e imaginárias. Por casualidade, tomei conhecimento dele, e a minha curiosidade levou-me a explorá-lo.
Hoje, arrependo-me de não me ter controlado, de não ter ignorado esse conhecimento e continuado com a minha vida normal. Pois, embora tenha visto coisas incríveis para além da imaginação da maioria das pessoas, também conheci as Bruxas da Noite e as terríveis verdades sobre a condição humana e o lugar da humanidade no universo que trouxeram com ela
Como voltar à vida normal depois de tudo o que vi? Não sei se é possível, mas este relato é uma tentativa de atenuar os terríveis efeitos desse conhecimento, um primeiro passo em direção à normalidade. Talvez partilhar tudo o que descobri, a simples ideia de que este conhecimento não é só meu, me ajude.

Title: Brujas de la Noche
Synopsis:
***Spanish Edition***
 
Pocos lo saben, pero, debajo de nuestras ciudades, en medio de los bosques y montañas y hasta bajo el océano, hay otro mundo, un mundo lleno de magia, lugares fantásticos y criaturas mitológicas e imaginarias. Por casualidad, me enteré de él, y mi curiosidad me llevó a explorarlo.  Hoy, me arrepiento de no haberme controlado, de no haber ignorado ese conocimiento y continuado con mi vida normal. Porque, aunque haya visto cosas increíbles más allá de la imaginación de la mayoría de las personas, conocí también a las Brujas de la Noche y las terribles verdades sobre la condición humana y el lugar de la humanidad en el universo que trajeron con ellas.   ¿Cómo volver a una vida normal después de todo lo que vi? No sé si es posible, pero este relato es un intento de paliar los terribles efectos de este conocimiento, un primer paso en dirección a la normalidad. Tal vez compartir todo lo que descubrí, la simple idea de que este conocimiento no es sólo mío, me pueda ayudar.

Title: Aliens! Tech! War! OH YES!!
Synopsis: Jacob Strickwing 25 medical discharged from the U.S. Army after the 300 Day chinesse war in 2027 stops a group of aliens from abducting some college coeds before they all get abducted from a different aliean speicies.

Title: Journey of the cheerful assasin
Synopsis:
Hyrkan, known as the black reaper, is the ultimate assasin. Knowing thousands of different killing techniques, he finally met his end by working to hard to train (pretty funny if you ask me). He was then recarnated as a young peasant, with all of his memories. 
 
"In my last life, I killed myself by training for 1392 days non-stop. I will not make the same mistake again. I am going to relax and have fun, unlike what I did in my previous life"
 
Witness the journey of the ultimate troll and his carefree attitude to life. 
#Please note that this is my first fiction

Title: sticks and stones
Synopsis:
everyones heard of skeletons. everyone knows they're the weakest undead you can summon. 
or at least, thats what people have seen.
what if there was another kind of undead? another set of reanimated bones that no body knew about because it was casually stepped on and killed in the dungeons? and these kills? give so little experience value that no one even takes notice.
this story follows one such undead. a pile of broken bones with spunk and determination

Title: Not Just Your Average Book
Synopsis:
Hello everyone who's reading this.This is my first book, so please forgive any lapses from my side...
This is the tale of a schoolboy, Eliwood Wolfe, who aspires to become the world's greatest detective. Although he doesn't get good grades, he has some other attributes which make him an amazing person. But don't ask his teachers, they'll just say he isn't special.( Because most teachers look only at grades. But, there are exceptions to every rule...)
Follow this book if you too spend a lot of time thinking about what would have happened if you had done things in a different way...
Read this book to see how Eliwood hones his detective intuition, alongside his inferencing and deducing skills, when later on getting the opportunity of becoming a detective, while alongside realising who the perfect girl for him is. Read this book to see an amazing romantic tale which ensures when Eliwood realises who the perfect girl for him is...
His lifelong dream comes true when he gets the opportunity to clear a scandal which threatens to shake the very foundations of the government, thus gaining fame and success and proving to everyone what he's made of. That happens with him realising his life would be colourless without his loved one. He gets trapped between his lifelong dream and his loved one...
So, which would Eliwood choose, his lifelong dream or his loved one...

Title: Lury Adventure's.
Synopsis: Lury Koest always had extremely bizarre tastes and manias, in the eyes of society he was nothing more than a simple cashier at the local supermarket "SuperMarkot" located in the city of Valpoz, but in reality Lury had something that set him apart from the plebs since he was a child...

Title: Granny God-mode

Inspired in part by a legendary tumblr exchange:

Title: Baldur's Gate -  A tale of Craylon
Synopsis:
Narration of the Epic Bhallspwan Saga, and classic video game Baldur's Gate.
Join me as I bring you along for the journey of Baldur's gate.
I hope to verbal life to the classic game of Baldur's gate.
 
I have sat and tried to think of a new idea for quite a long time, and as I got Re-dragged into playing baldurs gate, I had the idea to narrate the adventure.... I only hope that my idea works well. 
I plan to tell the story from the point of view of the main character, embracing all information as new, and as if it were I.
Constructive criticizm is welcome.
 
This is a Fan-Fic and is not my property

Title: Modify
Synopsis:
(This pretty much counts as the prologue and the synopsis)
There was young man, all alone in a dark place, stained with blood all over. This man was a chosen candidate of a god. The god wanted to win a tournament that all chosen god candidate's were to fight and chose this young man.
 
However, to this gods surprise, he granted this young man a power he should never have given. This young man, when he obtained this ability, he grew non-stop and until no one was able to beat him.
 
The young man won the chosen god candidate, but to everyone's surprise, he killed off everyone and therefore; he became unbeatable.
 
With nothing left, all alone in the world, no, the multiverse, the planet he lived in; gone; the universe he lived in; gone; the multiverse he lived in; gone. With nothing left but darkness; the young man talked to himself, as if he was talking with someone, then a hole appeared out of nowhere, infront of the man; he entered the hole.

 
It's Telsa, and this is a new novel I'm working on.
 
I coudn't refrain myself from sticking with one novel.
 
Anyways, I will be working on this novel but will still work on "World Edit!".  This novel is not my main novel so release are random, it depends on how much free time I got, and how I use that free time.

Title: Happenings of Ira
Synopsis: I Will Grow Strong  Out of the night that covers me,       Black as the pit from pole to pole,I thank whatever gods may be      For my unconquerable soul. In the fell clutch of circumstance      I have not winced nor cried aloud.Under the bludgeonings of chance      My head is bloody, but unbowed. Beyond this place of wrath and tears      Looms but the Horror of the shade,And yet the menace of the years      Finds and shall find me unafraid. It matters not how strait the gate,      How charged with punishments the scroll,I am the master of my fate,      I am the captain of my soul.

Title: GENESIS PRIME- New Beginning
Synopsis:
For five millennia human kind flourished military technology advanced. In the whole milky way galaxy they found no equal, only but primitive life form to enslave planets system and star system to conquer. The greed of mankind set their sight on the neighbouring galaxy called andromeda only found tragic defeat from the first campaign and both galaxies destroyed.
Traveling to the  farthest edge of the universe to escape the inevitable racial demise escaping from unknown threat. Crashed in a habitable planet, in a star system that they called GENESIS PRIME, would the last survivor humans driven to extinction or would they strive again just like their primogenator did.
 
This is an alternative universe where Nazis won the WW2 and the continuous warring guided them to progress in an advanced superior military technology, which led the Fuhrer Supremacy colonising the whole Earth and by the Empire's ruling, humans dominated the whole Milky Way Galaxy.
 
Warning: This is a fiction alternative universe. // /  //  / / /   This novel carries a disclaimer about the characters bearing no relation to living persons and does not necessarily reflect those of the historical figures themselves, or other fictional characters. Any similarities between the people, dialogs, event, or plot is purely coincidental. Title: New: The Dark Inheritor
Synopsis:
A princess should live her life as a princess, right? Sadly, this is not that story. Oppressed by her father under a sheltered life, a princess is trapped in her cage, yearning for escape. With untapped potential, a strong desire for freedom and exploration, and a hidden fate, she rots behind ignorance. Unknowningly, destined for greatness, a scheme happens behind the scene. One day, a mysterious woman grants her the perk "Defeat Inheritor." From that day onwards, Aisha begins her new life filled with freedom and danger. Corrupted by a madwoman, praised by geniuses, champion of a crazy entity, Aisha travels the vast world of Aelea. Watch this young innocent, ignorant princess bloom into a dignified and fearsome queen. As she ventures forward, she discovers a wider view on the world she was kept away from. She will tackle the hardships and situations that will block her advance. Not knowing how to love, she starts her own harem (unexpectedly). 
 
 This story is influenced by The Coiling Dragon and Re:Monster. I added some mix into this, revealing some other components that blends fantasy with numerous things. 
 
Rating: M 18+ Strong language, graphic content, sexual content, and blood and gore. There will be a lot of lesbian (yuri) scenes. And the cover picture is my own work. I created it.

Title: Crimson Night Sect Young Ancestor
Synopsis:
"His past: unknown to them.
His strength: unfathomable for them.
His goal: their will.
At 17 years old, a young boy with unknown origins arrives at the desolate region of the northern mountain range. The energy of heaven and earth and mana are both scarce, the population which lives there are struggling each and every day to live. Until he came. He offered to those people a choice: follow my lead and join my sect and I will transform this entire region in a completely different world, or continue to live your pitiful life.
They chose to follow him. Since then, their lives completely changed for the-"
"ELDER!"
crack. (Rest in peace, pen whose name shall never be known)
"WHAT?"
"Little Yu has fled to the young Ancestor's pagoda again!"
"This little brat! How can a 8 years old girl outrun you bunch!? You all go back to training! After I’m done with her, I’ll thoroughly take care of each one of you!"
The disciple who came to report the news had a difficult time keeping his smile as he was crying in his heart.
Why?? She’s a genius in speed how do you want us to compete? Besides senior brother and senior sister, no one can match her among the younger generation and you want to punish us for that….
----------------------------------

Virvid kommer att resa med sina barndomsvänner Elbart och Renald. Tillsammans söker de slagsmål, mening och sanning. Elller som fiender och vänner bitter brukar säga: Det började med att Virvid, Elbard och Renald. Må deras död ej vara i onödan.

Title: Requiem of Souls
Synopsis:
Did you ever wonder that there might be another world? a world where magic exists? A world where dragons, devils, gods and more.
Well, our Mc thought that those worlds were but the fantasy of crazed writers, and would only read about them in books and stories.However, he was transported to such a world, he and his classmates. A world where the laws made by men were easily bent, where life itself was not worth the pebbles on the roads.Betrayed by his classmates and offered as an unholy sacrifice, Daiki finds himself in hell, bound to eternal torment and destitution, forced to undergo hideous torments for sins he has yet to commit, Daiki swears to bring down the ones responsible over his demise.
The story 'truly' starts with the journey to hell and its seven circles, it is but the beginning of an event that will shake the heavens.
"I shall bring the divine to their knees and call upon the requiem...For it is my task...and my revenge."
(World mythology is included in this story, from Christian: like the fallen angels. The four horsemen the princes of hell, even Celtic, Indian, African, Greek, Hebrew, Egyptian and more. A lot of mythologies have been included within this story to add to its complexity and beauty, I hope you are a fan of old myths, this story is filled with them)
Before you start reading the reviews i advise you to read for yourself first, positive or negative reviews might give you a wrong pre based idea on the story, many great stories in this website have horrible reviews and many poor stories have positive ones, you are the judge of your choice don't let others make you refuse a story just because their opinion of it is different of yours.
Btw I am a non-native speaker and have self-taught myself English. So if you find mistakes please help me with proofing.
Edit : currently editing early chapters (7/17/2017)
 (Book cover is not mine...)

Synopsis: As a child, Johnny Wellington was different than others. He didn't know what, however. Soon he was captured by the government who found out about his potential. A few years passed and now his life is about to change. Not only his but the entire world. Will our friendly neighborhood main character manage to protect the world from the evil that waits for him?

Title: Escaping the Box
Synopsis: Leylin had been inextricably shunned by his father even in his most distant memory. His father, a gifted mage and respected noble of the Varius House, should have raised him to be an heir to his position, but instead, he was ignored. Thinking that his father's apathy came as a result of his personal faults, worked from a young age to improve his mind and body.

Title: Shattered Crowns
Synopsis:

"You will kill my second brother ".
 
 
Is the prince trully crazy?

Title: The Crimson Fiend
Synopsis:
"Fear is our greatest asset, the most powerful emotion; leveraged and used brilliantly by our predecessors since ancient times" 
In a world inflicted by countless years of brutal and unhumane wars, where the strong prey on the weak and the wicked scheme, behind the cover of shadows against the honored. Mind games, violent counter attacks and ingenious strategies are occuring daily in this war torn land. Legendary tales of powerful hereos battling for power against the demons in human skin, known as the most vicious and sinister warriors in history; The Crimson Fiends.
Meet young Kirlin, the son of a deceased powerful captain in the crimson fiend faction, after his fathers demise kirlin was left to fend for himself and his two younger siblings. Homeless and poor and with the most notorious slaugtherer creeping around the corner, widely known as winter season!
How will Kirlin and his siblings survive? follow him on an epic journey as he grows up struggling for strength to protect his own. Defeat, betrayal, loyalty and extreme bloodlust
(Author's notes; Hi everyone! this is the first story i've ever written so please bear with me. i know this will be a bumpy ride with quite a bit of mistakes, and i'm happy to recieve any critisicm as it will be of help to further my writing.)
P.s hopefully, I'll try to keep the ball rolling and release 1-2 chapters p/week

Title: Lost Archive
Synopsis:
Enter the Veil? [Yes/No]
Winston Beckett is a linguistic scholar, poring over musty manuscripts and ancient translations. That is, before he finds a book of magical runes. Before people start disappearing.
When he deciphers the strange book, Winston discovers a secret so big it throws him into a different world. Literally.
No more grading papers. No more research. No more work. Just him and The Veil, the eerily realistic game world he falls into. 
Desperate to find his missing colleagues, Winston must navigate this strange new world, using only his wits to survive. Quests, skills, and loot await him…if he’s up to the task.
Along the way, he’ll need to fight enemies, recruit allies, and go on a journey of magic and adventure. And at the end? Well, let’s just say he won’t be the same person he started as.
Lost Archive is a LitRPG Adventure and first in the VeilWalkers series.

Title: Run to the Sky
Synopsis: What do you intend to pursue? He runs. He runs more. What do you intend to finish? He fails. He fails hard. Because...? He quits. Whether by choice or by accident, it has been seven years ever since. There is more to life than running... and he runs away from it. And now? Does the track call you back? Who will listen? Is this just another running narrative? Shall we go then? It was 2015. It is now 2022. Follow the story of Rendo Lobo, a poverty-stricken student who left his running passion to pursue something... or someone... else. Yet, is it worth it? In the seemingly endless difficulties of an apparently normal life, will it be fight or flight? The passing moment is here! Read the latest work of Al Raposas, "Run to the Sky" (Takbo Papuntang Langit) here. #RTSPlanning: January 17, 2017Writing: February 7, 2017Published online first on Wattpad: February 17, 2017Published online in Royal Road: March 4, 2017

Title: The Mystic Emperor - Dropped.
Synopsis:
Synopsis:
An existence, living an eternal life in misery and agony. Tormented by, even God's scariest nightmare, boredom. Trapped in a white, endless realm without being able to feel any emotion or sensation. Until a certain event which leads to it's freedom. Watch as the existence finds itself in a new harsh and unforgiving fantasy world with only common information. Follow it and it's struggle for glory and power, the power to never be bind again, the power to choose it's own fate. As it finds friends and enemies, as it seeks to explore the world, to see everything there has to be seen, for adventure!Will it find what it was searching for all this time or will it curse the day it got released from it's eternal prison?
Author’s note:
This will be a mature read. I do not plan to make it light and will probably contain  psychological questions pertaining to life and our existence as a whole. It may contain detailed illustrations of scenes that, according to some, may not be the most morally correct.
No plot armor or easy strolls in the park for the characters. Every little thought and action counts. The smallest mistakes can lead to disasters. No one is saved from the sweet embrace of the maiden Death.
Frequent and quality updates. The rate of upload depends on my free time. I will try to upload at least 10 000 words worth of quality content each week. If you find any mistakes, please do point them out in the comments. I am a normal human being afterall, one or two are bound to slip through my fingers.
For anyone who wants to materialistically support me and get involved in the novel, I have a patreon! Thank you in advance!

Title: The Bardic Path
Synopsis:
In the vast multiverse, Earth is just a low-level planet, devoid of any immortals or gods. Samuel Haze, a music-loving high school student, has his body taken over by a weakened immortal who fled to Earth. Years pass, and Sam has witnessed numerous atrocities committed by the Immortal in his body. Finally, one day, Samuel regained control of his body for a short time. During this period of time, he kills himself.
 
Samuel is reborn into a new world, one of magic, swords, fantastical beasts, and more. However, after learning that he has almost no talent for magic, he sets out to become a bard instead. Yet, Samuel has no idea just how deadly the Bardic Path truly is.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- I came up with this story after creating my bard for D&D. I am a high-school student, so releases will be irregular, until I make a schedule for myself.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
During dialogue, slang and other terms, such as “gonna” or “ain’t,” will come up.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This synopsis doesn't really capture the point of the story. After I reach a certain amount of chapters and start releasing chapters on a regular basis, I'll change it myself or see if someone can do better.

Title: PenDragon's PicToStory Challenge
Synopsis:
Welcome to PicToStory, a weekly PenDragon challenge where you are pitted against fellow authors to see whose mind works the sharpest! Each week we will reveal a picture for you to base a short story around (5000 words max limit). You have the entire week to join (and you don't even have to be a member), while using the form supplied. Simply type your story somewhere, post your nickname and the link into the form, and you're done, it's that easy!
Our panel of competent judges will review you on RRL standards regarding the familiar categories of Grammar, Style, Story, and Character, so make sure your work is the best it can be!
The winners will be elected to the prestigious Council, which not only gives bragging rights and a pretty colour, but also has limited slots and access to a secret base with special permissions! Good luck and just remember: this is all about improving, not winning. If you don't win, you can ask the judges to give you constructive feedback to improve on your writing. After all, this group is meant for you!
Submission form:  https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1VJ5HvuAMQ0sYsmXd-dzlteBDA5XOIv3KBFZYK1AP1G8/edit?ts=589e65bd#responses
A minimum of at least 6 entries is required for a competition to go into the judging phase.
Communication is handled through our discord server, a join link is in here
 
Anyone who reads this on RRL can enter, the picture for each week will be posted via both RRL and the Discord server. All stories must be submitted by Saturday, 12:00AM pacific time, you can edit and have them edited by anyone except for judges (they are stated in the PenDragon discord).
 
Good luck!
-Aucis Josh

Title: Eadenara Online
Synopsis:
This is a story of the vrmmorpg game world of  Eadenara and of a young teacher who has chosen to explore this new frontier. 
I've added the tags for gore, sex, profanity, and trauma since i'm sure it'll show up eventually.

Title: Survivor: An Age of Steel and Myth
Synopsis:
When people think of the world ending, they usually come up with some idea of a Zombie or Nucular apocolypse. The reality was a bit different.
The world ended in a hacking cough, due to an illness that had infected the lands around us. A group of 'terrorists' wanted to create a symbiotic disease that would force humanity to evolve as they said that Humanity was a stagnant species doomed to kill ourselves. So they made a biological weapon, a virus that acted like a bacteria, fully capable of self-evolution. It was made to infect only humans and nothing else. It was made to push humanity to the next level of existance, to unlock the latent potential hidden within our minds. They released it across the world in highly populated cities, from New York to Hong Kong. No country was safe, as only a single person would enter a country with this virus, and when two hundred people invaded the hundred and ninety something countries the signal was given.
The world as we knew it ended in a week. Durring that time, people started to mutate, change into monsters and undead creatures. Durring all this time I was sick, locked in my room as I lived of medications in order to keep a horrible cold at bay. I never knew of how the airports transported this disease across the world, of how the miltary was infected and unable to fight, of how humanity hid in bunkers to try and survive. I was busy being locked up in my apartment, and it wasn't until three weeks after the world ended that I was able to head outside.

Title: The Queen of School
Synopsis:
Hi there, my name is Jason Corvus, you can call me Raven. My parents really (like a lot) wanted to have a boy, so when they found out that I was a girl, they still put me a boyish name.
When my father was alive he always wanted to go to Tyndall Quantic Soren high school, but to the common people it was known as an elite school, but in reality, it is a school for those who are more than simple humans. My mother told me to fulfill his last wish and go to that school, but I am not that excited about it.
Well, whatever. This time things seem more complicated than before, and I have no idea how long this time will last.

Title: My Life, as an Irregular Tamer
Synopsis:
"Why does this happened? as a human being... as a Tamer..."
In that fateful day... the life of a young boy changed. Along with the people that he ever cared about... everything changed.
The start of a thousands years of struggle against fate, the catalyst will trigger the fate of the world... The beginning...

Title: The Blood Emperor [Dropped]
Synopsis:
In an era long forgotten lived a man, a man who holds magical power unmatched by the strongest of mages and martial skill beyond those of sword saints, he gained power far beyond the reaches of mortal men.
He once sought out power to protect those in need, but he was betrayed by those who feared him and the very people he swore to protect wanted to end him. He was forced to use the power he gained to protect, and use it to kill the ones that he once loved. His story now lost in the passage of time, but his soul still continues to roam the pitch black void, searching for purpose.

Title: Transmigrated Dragon
Synopsis:
Why has this happened? I just wanted to take a sweet bath in that nice looking purple water, couldn't you tell me beforehand that was a damn portal to another dimension?
and I have these green and blue bars above my head... great.
 
The tale of an orphan dragon who was adopted by humans, who after reaching adulthood gets sent to another world.
