Image: Thanks to Emily Saathoff for letting me use her image. If you want to look at more art, you can find her portfolio at http://www.illus29.com
 Uh, an extra warning— the extra chapters might depict scenes of violence not suitable for impressionable children. tried to keep it somewhat down but still, be warned. (no gore though)
The extra chapters are about the past of Doraig (Before stepping through the portal into the L'arc continent) And you don't need to read them to understand the story, but since one person wanted to know more about it I could do nothing but comply!

Title: The Doll That Fell to Earth
Synopsis: In a world where the line between fantasy and reality have begun to blur, a young girl in tattered clothes arrives in a city whose streets run slick with blood. Drawn into these slaughters by the unseen strings of a mad god, just how will this bloody conflict end? Will the sun finally set on these gruesome murders or will the streets once again be dyed crimson?

Title: Number 1do!!! (Number 1 Idol!!)
Synopsis: StrawberryEunice-chan, a famous cosplayer on the internet. There isn't a single person on Earth who hasn't heard of "her". Everything was okay until "her" crush found out about StrawberryEunice-chan's secret. That he is actually a guy!Thus, he was recruited by Mica, a lively/deadly girl who had the hopes of being a somewhat, school idol because she saw it on an anime that she watched.After the heart warming confession and spine chilling blackmail, Niko agreed to be both Mica's lover and a member of school idol group.Niko's silent life as a crossplayer who earns tons of money is now shattered. Will he enjoy it now that he is spending it with the girl that he loves or will his everyday turns into something much worse?

Title: Dreams of Greatness  *dropped*
Synopsis:
This takes place in a world similar to Earth (Imagine Warring-States period China but not so much emphasis on ranks and the like, though there will be some, and maybe a sub-plot there [also there will be a mixed naming sense depending on what I feel].) Follow the journey of bastard orphan Siegfried as he tries to go from nameless peasant to a high-ranking military officer, and maybe even a general.
 
 
 

So this is my first story and while I am a native English speaker I am by no means a professional. This is not a Historcal fiction nor a Fanfic even if it does have some simmiiarities to the two (i.e. using the term glaive or officer ranks from Kingdom or a name of a former or modern country). At times you may think ' Why didnt he select this tag or genre' and the reason is I wasnt sure if it would fit and didnt want to mislabel

Title: Threads of soul
Synopsis:
Threads of soul
This is story of Maximus his adventures and tragedies follow him as he discovers new Magic and looks for dragons and unknown artifacts and his crazy Misadventures

Title: Unsanity is Relative
Synopsis:
A mad man who considers himself un-un-sane is summoned through an ancient ritual to a land of magic and wonder. He finds himself in this new world, accompanied by nothing but the voices in his head and the gown he wears. He finds himself wondering if any of this is real, and then wondering if it matters.
Follow him on his wild adventure through a litrpg world. Where he will do whatever he can to find some pudding, or invent it if it doesn't exist. The only problem is, he doesn't know the recipe.
 
----
 
First story please give critisism and comment about grammar errors and misspells.
Cover art from pinterest.

Title: Gigantomachia
Synopsis: Long after the fall of a civilisation of giants, on the continent of Vannin, the realms of mankind are constantly threatened by all sorts of monstrous creatures. In order to fight them, they created 'Contractors', people who have obtained control over the four elements through pacts with nature spirits. Phelim Jocelyn, a teenager from the eastern Republic of Dalkeith, is one of these Contractors; every day, he undergoes the same thankless grind, fighting against the beasts that plague the countryside in defence of his fellow citizens. One day, what seems to be a routine hunt reveals that there's something darker at work, and it's up to Phelim and a few of his fellow Contractors to find out exactly what it is. However, he might be getting into something far above his head ...

Title: Tales Of Martial Path
Synopsis:
A man betrayed by those his love soul is cast to the winds. A
boy whom has been cast off by his family and used as a puppet.
Both are one and the same and with the awakening of this memory
of the one once called the devil, his journey toward the ultimate
truth he seeks.

Title: Light Bulb: A Hero
Synopsis:
I was inspired to write this when my light bulb blew out on me and I had to sit in the dark one night while reading. I suffer from depression so negative thoughts come to me realativly easilly when something goes wrong. Sometimes something as simply as a light going out and sitting in the dark can get me down in the dumps. I decided to write this as a way of self-reflection on how I could have been if I truly had no hope and if I had nothing but my hobby of writing to keep me going through each day.
(That said... sorry to anyone that read my stuff since I haven't been posting anything lately. I just haven't really been in the mood for anything lately. I am trying though and just got distracted and wanted to write this after my light blew out the little bugger.)

Title: Desert Rpg
Synopsis:
Ethan's entire school is transfered into a desert overran by monsters. Without electricty and with very limited food and water will they be able to make do?
And what is up with these RPG like elements? Leveling up? Who would want to fight the monsters here? Only a maniac would want to do something so dangerous.

Title: USC : Winds of Change
Synopsis:
They say once enough is enough.
What if the White King after seeing gory events regarding to the world's future decided to pull a 'Divine Intervention' while reorganizing his beloved faction as its leader?   With such intervention from supernatural forces, the world and society itself will what would be described by one certain Punisher's -now president- presidential slogan.

Title: Singer Wannabe
Synopsis:
Synopsis :
A man who loved music since young and dreamed being a singer became deaf after that an accident occured after he graduated from a music university.
2 years later, he commited suicide from depression and learned that God made a mistakes which caused him to become deaf.
Giving him a second chance with cheat-like abilities, can he truly realize his dream to become a singer?
 
Schedule :
Most of the chapters will be released the week-end but I'll try to post chapters once I finished writing if my schedule is free during the week. 
 
Author note:
This is a story of romance and slice of life, but just to let you know, I'm writing only for myself and for fun.

Title: Otla
Synopsis:
After hundreds years of war the land can take no more. The rulers listening to their peoples plead and in the light of an unbelievable discovery decide to call truce. Most believe that is their greed guiding them since the mages announced there is way to travel to new lands, new worlds. But the people are content if the war leaves their homes. If the rich heroes want to find glory and fame let the search it somewhere else. What the future is going to be from now on?
                                                                                                                                                                          

Author note

Hello everyone, this is the first story i actually write down and yes english is not my first language. Since i don t have someone to edit any correction will be welcomed. I put some tags if i think i need to add some later will do. As for release it will be one every week. Thanks for reading me.

Title: A magic world chrpnicles
Synopsis: it all started with a tiny misteke a single error that would end up chaining all of our fates together                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     the world of ometeotl a world diveded by the war of the two spicies that live in it the humans and the magic race humans that use their technology to advance an evolve and the magic race that uses its magic to enriched their knowledge of the world and mantain its balance these two have fought for milenia during the last few years a peace treaty betwen the two have finally put a stop to the war allowing the two races to finally recupear from all the damge the war has caused them but beneath the shadows the organisation responsable for majority of the technology and reserch of the human society are in the midle of a secret project that will change the fate of the world. And thus a chronicle of events that will change the world is abaut to start with two children belonging to this project                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       hi my name is jru and this is my first atempt in making a fiction im sorry if a make any mistekes english isnt my native lenguage this is my first atempt and it might not go anywhere i am doing this as i go along not much planed any helpful critic acepted

Title: Cecidit Mundi ; Fallen World
Synopsis:
War will scar the world.
Time tells, that humans will wage war on themselves. Such event is set in stone. Soon, they will slaughter each other in an attempt to gain power, authority and resources.

Such is the nature of humans.
And in this world, Adelheid, the flames of war is already burning brightly.
 
The country of Leysvert is under constant war. It can be said that it is already on the verge of collapsing.
In order to save the country, the King of Leysvert orders the Court of Magus to summon a Hero.
In this circumstances, what will the Hero do?

Title: Omni
Synopsis:
World setting:
 Game world-Gods came back after millennia of war against the darkness in order to re-forge humanity to face the coming end. They brought back a few of the creatures of myth and legends from the frontier realms to earth in order to adapt them for the coming days.
And the best tool for the job is humanities imagination.

Title: The Runesmith
Synopsis:
A Bad Man Gets Badder
My name is Harald Runestorm.
In real life, I help children with their homework and volunteer in a library project for homeless refugees (due to a probation order), but in my spare time, I log into the World of the Greenwood and kill people for fun.
Sometimes I torture them too, and I generally rob them, but other days I stay in my tower and craft things.
One day, from a shady informant,  I heard about a shipment of gold ore through the woods. It seemed the Druids Guild was taking its gold diggings to market, so I thought I’d take it off them. I’ve always hated hippies, with their 'respect the woods' and 'pet butterflies' attitude to life. I wanted them to respect my sword and pet my fist. My Runefist that is. With their face.
I went down to the woods to teach them a lesson about pain and loss. Then I learned a lesson myself.
 A LitRPG short story (15,280 words!) set in The World of The Greenwood MMO.
Caution: The Runesmith is light hearted so if you don't like light hearted, or short stories or LitRPG (or any combination thereof), don't read.

Title: The God of Cowards!
Synopsis:
A world where the strong and the brave thrives, a world where the weak and the cowards are prey.
 
A young cowardly man destroyed all these thoughts.
 
"Who the hell said I can't be strong and be cowardly at the same time?!"  "I, your father will beat you!" 
 
Follow the journey of Leylin, an ordinary coward who by all odds reached the apex with meticulous cowardice and luck!

Title: The Ascendant: Endless Reincarnation
Synopsis:
My name is Richard Brooks. I died while saving a kid.
Kicking the bucket at 28 was really depressing, you know? There’s so much I still wanted to do.
But instead of passing on, I was thrust into an endless series of reincarnations. Whenever I die, I earn Karma points based on my achievements and growth. These points can be exchanged for weapons, spells, or other bonuses to make my next lives more interesting.
“What kills me only makes me stronger!” Or something like that. 
Honestly, it feels like I’m stuck in an RPG. The difficulty setting can be pretty ridiculous too.
Sometimes all I can do is grit my teeth in frustration as I die an ignoble death.
But I won’t complain. Even when it’s dangerous and painful, I love life. This is all an opportunity; I’ll do my best, no matter what kind of sadistic fate the System throws at me.
I will swing the warhammer of justice! Craft and enhance the most amazing artifacts! Overwhelm opponents with a barrage of auto-casting spells! Lead powerful vassals in Domain wars!
All for the sake of creating an eternal sanctuary.
With my unique power of Runecrafting, maybe I’ll even become strong enough one day to overturn fate… or at least find out what the hell is really going on.
It might take a few hundred or a thousand lifetimes, but what’s the rush?
I have all the time in the world now. 
(Note: R15+ This is the work of a very inexperienced author with a full time job. Please expect an erratic release schedule.)

Title: Magic Monsters Money
Synopsis:
Key Godfre Tanner is just your everyday normal guy, or supposed to be when one morning, he woke up with a news from his mother that he isn't a normal human, but a magician that came from another world and an arictocrat. By his mother's wish, he has to attend an academy for magicians in the other world called 'Marzenthura'.By fate's unexpected twist, he suddenly becomes the enemy of the Gods and branded as a heretic. Now, he must travel in order to find a way to retaliate against those gods.Will he be able to survive with that world's Gods against him?
 
 
 
 

!Warning!*Genre changes along the way**Confusion in the story is inevitable**First few chapters are boring and stupid AF**Author is Playful with readers**Best to ignore common logic in this.**You'll hate 1-6**This warning is Stupid*

Title: Soul Quest Online
Synopsis: When Brenner starts playing the new VRMMO Soul Quest Online. He thought he'd just be relaxing with his friends while dealing with the multiple voices in his head. But, to his dismay, his entire world breaks down from what he knew. With souls, spirits, and cross-dimensional space-time travel. He must understand the secrets of this new world that has been presented to him while maintaining his regular life. Which is kind of hard when you are presented with otherworldly realities and claiming they're real. But at least he has his personalities for company! Though he isn't exactly sure how well their journey will go and where they will end up. So join them on their quest in Soul Quest Online as they have a soul quest online (PUNS!).

Title: Lotus Ascension: Uncrowned War God
Synopsis: A tale of war, chaos and legends. In an ending era where heroes fall, a hero who lost everything in the previous Heavenly War found himself reincarnated in the World of Mortals. Taking the identity of Asten, a son of a Baron, he climbed the world to reach the top of the Immortals once again--all for the sake of retribution.

Title: SEIZE THE MEANS OF DESTRUCTION
Synopsis:
What does it mean to be a Super Villain you ask? Well I think you would find that it actually means very little, that is of course if you are the average mook employed by the boss man. But NO before you stands Soviet Russia’s third greatest biological super soldier, right after Communist Godzilla and that giant space octopus thing.
 
As a trusty lieutenant of our great leader it is my job to sporadically commit acts of terrorism and be compulsively evil…. What the hell am I even doing with my life, I’m not even really communist.

Title: Reincarnated as the Homunculus Queen [Kingdom Building LitRPG]
Synopsis:
The year is 25 A.E., 25 years after The Empire united the human nations under its rule, wielding an arsenal of holy weapons known as homunculi. These magical beings, brimming with immense mana reserves, have been enslaved to serve as power sources and instruments of war. The Empire's grip tightens as it sets its sights on subjugating the demi-human nations, heralding a new era of conflict.
Trapped in an endless cycle of unpaid overtime, Homika Fujimoto endures an overbearing boss and slave-like conditions. Lost in mundane tasks, her struggles ignored. One night, exhaustion leads to unconsciousness. When she awakens, it's to an unfamiliar room and ceiling. A new enigma unfolds – she must navigate this new world to uncover not only her own fate, but maybe something even bigger than herself.

Title: Only Me wasn't brought to another world, at least for now....
Synopsis:
Left in this world alone as an abandoned, live alone in a world full of animals which hate humans to the cores...
I am Alone...
feeling saddened, I thought of...
why can't I just create my own person to talk to myself?
Thus, My life on the world which being left behind by the humanity, which being abducted by aliens comes to open its curtain, and...
by the time humanity come back on earth...
the curtain of the show, which being played by the earthlings' blood and tears starts while Me?
I am Alone...
[Father! the show gonna start soon!]
well, not anymore...
 
*the story has some resemblant with EER(everyone else is a returnee) but not all...

Title: Why does the world looks like some fanfiction? (Hiatus)
Synopsis:
Hiatus, till I get more time...
 
Jack was your average human being, with quite a bit of imagination and an adaptive life view, but then he died and met a God... well one of them at least. That god decided to alleviate his boredom by giving the Jack some powers and equipment, before sending him to some world of his choosing, but... when Jack got the powers and the stuff, along with a yandere dragon, he got transported to the Earth after the cataclysm. Now he seeks the fun, and a way to move on other worlds, where will be monsters, heroes, kings and beast-girls... beast-girls are mandatory!
***
Note that this is fanfiction and will have different characters from different stories. Will be posted once a month at least. May post more or less depending on the situation. Oh and it's also Sci-fi a bit, but as I can choose only three genres I chose those that are most notorious... well LitRpg and Sci-fi are not really, but... hey we need to choose them all, right?

Title: Moonlight
Synopsis:
Three powers were discovered and harnessed so that they could be controlled. These powers are required to keep the planet alive, and need human bearers to focus and amplify their individual powers, but at what cost to their bearers? Power over the elements, controlling the flow of time, and dictating life and death are the powers that three young adults wield in Moonlight, but their lives will be changed forever. 
Moonlight follows the stories of Claire, Jayden, and Seraphine, as they learn to control these powers that desire to consume them.
 
Author Notes: Hello! This isn't my first attempt at writing a story, and it isn't even my first attempt at writing this particular story, but I'm not in any way what I would call "experienced". I decided to upload my writing here because I just wanted to get my ideas out there, and I wanted to get some constructive criticism for my writing from the RRL community. All comments are welcome, but please try to keep them positive and constructive! If you leave a rating, I would appreciate it if you left a short explanation of what you liked and what I can improve on.
I'll be uploading each chapter as I finish them, but this is still the first draft so anything and everything is subject to change. The cover art is drawn by me, but I'm in no way married to it. I just wanted something that showed the three magical sources, as I picture them in my head. If you do any art based on this story, send it to me! I would love to see it. I'll stop talking now, I hope you enjoy the story!

Title: Grey Horizons
Synopsis: Eric Lorens is just a typical twenty two year old collage student. In his first year of college, he moves out of his parents house and starts to live in an apartment block by himself for the first time. His neighbour is a twenty year old girl who seems normal on the outside, but has hidden away many truths and secrets. Will Eric be able to break down her walls and find out these secrets? Or will he be completely shut out and isolated from her?

Title: Devious Dungeon [Dropped]
Synopsis:
A man seeks his own path, deviating from the norms.
For his own goals and desires, he seeks a path uncharted.
For the sake of satiating his curiosity, he sought to tresspass in the domain of the divines.
Achieving something none had before, he transcended his limits.
Denied was he from fruits of his labor, cheated and cast away to be forgotten.
Yet he was given a chance, a gamble to reclaim what was lost.
Did he lose more than he gained, or did he stumble upon a yet another path untrodden?
 

 
Hiya, first story I started to write. This story has no definite goal as of yet, as I'm using it to improve my writing skills as english isn't my native language. Main theme is going to be dungeon building. Is the theme cliché? Well yes, yes it is. And I don't care, as I'm going to try add some new twists and turns while experimenting with my writing.
In the future, story will contain more mature content, you have been warned.
Thus speaking, constructive criticism is welcomed, random bashers and weeaboos are promptly ignored. Updates are sporadic in nature, happening when inspiration strikes.
I do not own the copyrights of the cover. These rights belong to the respective artist.

Title: I just want to live peacefully but these girls...
Synopsis: Our protagonist is a working student who works hard just for her sister's sake. It was all well at first but his trouble started when his childhood friend who treats him as her rival appeared to be his classmate.

Title: Enime Master
Synopsis: Dexter Fore is a young man, whose life revolves around his mom and enime. One day the power gets shut off and groundbreaking events happen to this young man that will determine the life of his and his mother. But first, he's going to have to get ruthless, maybe even killing all the ants in the world. Just to collect all the enimes he needs to take over the world.

Title: The Parasyte
Synopsis:
After living a blessed life on earth our protaganist finds himself in an early grave. Fortuanately or unfortunately for him He is going to by given a second chance at life in a world far from our own. Essel is a fantasy world of magic and conflict. 
This is not a typical reincarnation story where the main character is reborn into a noble family to be pampered and doted on until adulthood. The protaganist, Ravel, is reborn as a member of a dying race, the Vishna. His people have been hunted to near extinction by the humans of Essel. Will Ravel be able to do what he has to in order to survive in his second life or will he be condemned by his human weakness.
Author's note: The race of the protaganist is heavily influenced by the ghouls from Tokyo Ghoul with many notable differences. The protaganist, while not a sociopath, has rather flexible morals when push comes to shove. Some people like an evil protaganist with no regard for human life. Some prefer a selfless hero. Ravel is somewhere in the middle.
Warning: There will be profanity, gore and some sexual content (I'm still not sure to what extent.)

Title: Night Terror
Synopsis:
Story is currently 'on hold' for an indefinite period of time - I will eventually post the whole thing when it's complete, see the news post for more details.
 
 
After dying young, a man reincarnates into a new world as Abe Haruki.
 
'This whole world is suspicious...'
 
Despite the fact that Haruki had never once met a god, even during his reincarnation, he couldn't help feeling that this world was just too... Intelligently designed?
I mean, seriously... Levels? Classes? Stats? Items? You can even level up your abilities!
 
'Definitely suspicious...'
 
Unfortunately, the Church have been keeping close tabs on him from the shadows. They've heard rumours of a boy, born with a golden ring. With magical affinities that defy logic. Darkness and light energies destroy each other, violently, so how does he have the affinity for both?
 
Can Haruki live his peaceful life along side childhood friend Suzu? Or will they fall to the coming darkness?
 
 
::Author's note::
While there are stats and exp etc, it's not LitRPG. They are there, but not the focus in any way. The world is more hardcore - A human is soft, so a pierced lung should eventually kill them. Even though they have a small pool of HP, a single deadly blow can end it all. If you ever want to say G'day, I'm in the discord chat every now and then, so feel free to join the madness ;) 
 
Thanks for reading <3

Title: Child of Fate
Synopsis:
The story of when the darkness slowly started to devour the land. Human dying, Animals turned into monsters, and the land lose it ability. When the darkness slowly covering the world, the light would shine and seal the darkness away.
Follow the journey of three heroes who have to do this heroic mission, to seal the Darkness. However, their journey is not smooth as they expected. Story of romance, comedy, and trust. They are only a human, where their heart also can be contaminated by the darkness of their desire. When the road to their goal is harsh can they still able to maintain their trust of each other when they have their own problem and ego?
Their target was a thousand year monster which sealed by the previous hero, but it also have experience far exceed them. Is the story would repeated with them manage to seal the Darkness or they was the one failing?
______________________________________________________________Guys, this is my new novel project. I planned for oneshot, but somehow it ended in (very) long story... I want to know your opinion and comment, and is it good for me to update it all or make it into parts? Thanks.

Title: League of magic
Synopsis: There many worlds,many galaxy and universe.But unlike any planet,this planet,called Manox, holds something that cannot be found else where.Magic but since the great war,its magical structral in Manox has changed.

Title: The Adventures of a Unique Snowflake [rewrite in progress]
Synopsis: This was my first attempt at writing and I am not very proud of it. You're welcome to check it out, but know that it is only still available because someone requested that it stay up.

Title: The Revival: New Reality
Synopsis: Synopsis will be updated pending a rewrite/Revision. Cover art will be updated pending a redo as well.

Title: When The Laws Of Men Crumble
Synopsis: The world's end came in a form no one would ever expect - an RPG game brimming with monsters that could easily kill men. Only those with talent in combat and are willing to kill have a chance for survival; a good example would be the exorcist Dairenji Kyouya and his three familiars.

Title: The Ring Of Wealth
Synopsis:
What would you do if you have an unlimited amount of wealth?
 
Show it off?
Start a business?
Raise army?
Taking over the world?
 
Read to find out!

Title: Limits?
Synopsis:
Richard Heartly was the richest man on earth. He has a net worth of $200 billion. He is the boss of the Heartly Corporation.
On May 17, 2000, Richard Heartlys net worth decreased to $0. On May 17, 2000, Amber Heartly died from liver cancer. Richard suffered a heart attack because of the shock. There was a very slim chance of him recovering at his old age. On May 17, 2000, while hospitalised Richard donated all his assets and money to the cancer trust. That night Richard passed away.
Before dying Amber gave birth to a son.
My name is Jack Heartly and I am the fastes... *cough* *cough* My name is Jack Heartly the son of Amber Heartly and the Grandson of Richard Heartly. At the age of 19, I have died. Currently, I'm sitting in a small white room currently processing what I have been told. I'll give you a quick sum up of the events, I was sitting their confused, then a voice started talking claiming to be God, God was apparently impressed by my grandfathers' past deeds and offered him 3 wishes, my grandfather used one wish and it was to give me his last two wishes of limitless possibilities. Oh, the most important thing is that I'm about to be reincarnated and the wishes will be used in the next life.
 
AN/ 
So this story is something I plan to do before going to bed each night. It isn't going to be great because I suck at writing, but if you enjoy OP mcs and cliches then come right ahead. This story will not contain a harem surrounding the mc. The mc is going to be bi, so if you are a douche homophobe then, please allow the door to hit you on the way out. Would also like to apologise in advanced for the people who get salty about me stealing the wish idea from Dexs adventure, just really like the idea. Thank you, author, for writing that story it is my favourite.

Title: Nailed It
Synopsis:
A collection of unedited/edited short stories, rants, poems, narratives, anything that comes to mind in the middle of the week.
Note: read at your own risk!
Tags: Short Stories

Title: Fire in the Blood
Synopsis: The story of a man who is struck by tragedy and embarks on a journey of vengeance. But in seeking the blood of the monster or monsters who've wronged him, he himself is forced to do villainous things.

Title: Dissonance :: Tranquillity
Synopsis:
A small collection of short stories that i wrote ages ago.
 
:::: TIME :::
Man tossed on a strange land. A broken man. A man that has come to terms with his inevitable doom. 
It's time. Time to end it all.
+++ JOURNEY +++
Existance for some can be varied. It can be something close to experiencing life. It can be something close to pushing through life. Sometimes its better to let go. And sometimes it is better to let yourself go.

Title: Glitchscape
Synopsis:
Something malicious is bleeding into the landscape of Magnet Creek, and a grab bag of morally questionable children are the only ones who notice or seem to care. They’re mildly pissed. After all, strange creatures, rumbly happenings in the night, and physics-bending party tricks aren’t especially conductive to a happy childhood.
Mole just wants to shoplift cute clothes. Seconds and Kelvin have guild dungeon raids every Sunday. Candela’s waist-deep in apocalypse prep, Kilo and Meter are busy with their Youtube channel, and Ampere’s starting her entire life over.
But whether predestined for this fate or not, the universe seems to contrive around their involvement. There isn’t a lot of time left in the day for Nintendo when rogue slices of sentient space-time want your town wiped off the map, but when the collateral of infinity can be twisted upside-left and flipways, anything in the vein of a set number of predictable outcomes is possible!
----

Title: The Dark Lord's Daughter Wants To Be A Fashion Designer?!
Synopsis: Usually in stories that are surrounded by heroes and villains, the hero and villain meet, and it results in a fight and they either lose or win. But if you think that it's this kind of story, YOU'RE WRONG. This story takes place in Welnarius, a fantasy world where villagers, heroes, and much more roam. 17 year old vampire thief, Raythn Ospar, decides to steal some magic stuff from a castle and basically blames his team for stealing the stuff, such a sneaky liar. However, he comes face to face with a young girl named Ikini, who he recognizes as the daughter of the Dark Lord, Neowyld.  And just when you think that the dark lord's daughter and Raythn would be battling in a win or lose situation, Ikini doesn't want to be the next dark supreme, but rather. . .A FASHION DESIGNER?! And so begins the tale between a fashion wannabe dark lord's daughter, a vampire thief, and a couple of other girls as well. . .

Title: The Misfits
Synopsis: Five former US army Rangers find themselves set on the path of adventure after they accept a contract from an anonymous organization to protect a group of archaeologists and scientists from harm in their quest to excavate a ruin deep in the jungles of South America. Once they reach the jungles however they find it's not your average security job, but rather a quest to save the world from an organization that wishes to conquer the world, and rule as kings and queens. To stop this evil group the five friends must work together with the group of researchers and their team to reach the ruins of the fabled city of gold which is said to house a weapon or tool able to destroy entire nations... Stuck between two unknown organizations, the five friends must do what they must with so little intel.

Title: High School Murder Anthology
Synopsis: In Washington High School the lives of its students burned like the brightest of stars, and yet even the brightest stars fight to be seen. On that day a star which had seemed to have lost its luster burned for the last time, it burned brightly and fell, dragging many of its fellows along with it. Such are the lives of humans, filled with light and casting shadows where ever they go. This is the story of the school mates who were robbed of their lives by the very star they unwittingly cast in the shadows. The stories were collected from the broken fragments of their souls moments before the faded into the dark nothingness. Read on for they had lived, and as such they deserve to be remembered for faults just as much as their positives.

Title: The Black Reaper
Synopsis:
The young boy Elijah was raised to be a soldier at the age of 6 this was not a common thing in the world, but it was certainly not rare anymore especially since the third World War had started. By the age of 16 the War had finally ended this does not mean that everything was suddenly peaceful, but the majority of large military forces where being withdrawn back to there individual countries.
While the large military forces were withdrawn Elijah was a mercenary who would be contracted out to whoever was willing to pay the most for his services, even though the War had officially there were still a few jobs that needed to be completed, and since the War had ended nations would secretly hire mercenaries to take care of some loose ends, and so Elijah was contracted out.
After completeing his mission, and waiting for extraction Elijah was suddenly transported to a different world with only a note from God left behind.

Title: Rivignia: Dragon Warriors
Synopsis:
In a world were the future is predicted by the Gods and enforced to humans to follow, how will the children of the unwanted could change their fate?
Should one simply follow everything without a question or break free from the curse and change one's own future?
Passion, courage and love. 
Would these be enough to defeat the enemies and change one's destiny?  
This is the story of a young knight who dared to change everyone's destiny. With the help of a mystical dragon, Jo delved into the world of spirits and summoned them to be the most powerful knight Rivignian had ever seen.

Title: Just a Writer
Synopsis:
The story of a writer, as he decides to write a story and his trials and tribulations to reach the top most fiction of the site. He shall fight against indifferent lurkers, troll readers, and the angry mods and much more evils before he finally reaches the end of his journey.
And even then his victory uncertain. 
Will he win, and seize his dream?
Or will he fall, like countless others?
Only time will tell...

Title: Father never came home.
Synopsis: A short story written in a few minutes.

Title: Fighting for the Lord of Earth
Synopsis:
A fleet of alien spaceships were detected coming into the Sol Universe heading for Earth.
During the initial talks with the humanoid aliens their leader took control of the planet itself becoming the lord of Earth. He demanded the world leaders send him subjects that would be trained and fight for him who fought for the King of space. In return the Earth would be protected and their primitive knowledge would be greatly expanded.
Roughly 6,000 people from all around the earth were gathered into their ships and taken to another planet for training. After they would be dropped off the ships would return several times to pick up the full numbers demanded.
Kohn Lowson was the first to step on one of the alien ships.

Title: Let Beat the Crystal Heart
Synopsis:
Meandering along a lonesome dirt road rides a cart carrying a boy who will change the world. This boy holds in his body a heart that beats unlike any other. Purchased as a slave for the metal elves he travels to Mi'lah, an elvish bordertown tetering on the edge of the High Elven kingdom, their the boy finds his purpose and destination. Grand conspiracies and ancient promises of repentence clash with the will of one boy.
"Caution, my friend, the crystal knight pleas
Beware of the magic you feast
For when the crystal knight leaves his disease
Now approaches the great crystal beast."

Title: Ciphered Realm (A LitRPG Adventure)
Synopsis:
DECEMBER 2023 UPDATE: at it again lol. I probably won't publish here, but just know that if you remember enjoying this story at all, IT WILL be published one day. mark my words!!!!
AUGUST 2020 UPDATE: back online. 
Ciphered Realm is an action-packed LitRPG adventure with brutal fight scenes, character building, and a hard leveling/stat system. Written in a casual, often introspective and sometimes humorous voice.
Contains:
-Gory and brutal martial arts-based fights in a multi-layered combat system
-Drug use, mental illness
-Grinding, stat-chasing
-Explicit language, snarky/crude humor

SYNOPSIS:
After months of psychological turmoil, a burned-out cubicle rat named Cal seeks medically assisted suicide. Rather than finding the afterlife, he finds himself on a transformative psychedelic journey to a realm governed by an RPG-like gaming system. Rediscovering his will to live, Cal embarks on a brutal quest for self actualization under a new alias: Solomon. Constantly turning inward while striving for growth and improvement, Solomon is determined to make the most of his chance at a second life.

Title: Lesser Throne of Seventh Heaven
Synopsis:
What would you do, if your family, your people, were attacked?
Would you take shelter, away from danger, hoping for the best?
Or would you go out, and face the aggressors in full force?
 
Krone Kozak was fifteen when the leading superpower, The Union of Lords, attacked his homeland Kharlussia.
In addition, news of mysterious beasts appearing and wreaking havoc all around, reached him.
Desiring to help, he entered the draft.
Willingly.
 
After nineteen years, he was standing beside Kharlussian’s Great General.
Facing a Grand Rift in the sky, the very gateway for Grand Beasts entering their land.
When their march seemed unstoppable, that thing came out.
With one incantation, a shockwave filled the surrounding, wiping them all out.

Why is it throughout Earth’s history, that after every mass extinction an abnormal explosion of new life and growth occurs, spurring life into a new era?
Simply put...the world changed. The losers did not.
Those that survived grow stronger and became kings.
The old world disappeared, and new one took its place.
The strong do not wait.

Title: The Crimson Void
Synopsis:
Inside a dungeon that appeared in ancient times long forgotten was a boy by the name of Zion.
Trapped and alone for what had seemed to be an eternity, Zion explores the dark dungeon in hopes of being able to get away from his own personal hell.
As he continues to strive in the insidious dungeon, Zion soon realizes that death is only a temporary setback, it was a cursed fate where even death was not possible.
Zion continues his struggle with nothing but an indomitable will and unwavering determination, in the dungeon that was once known in ancient times as the Crimson Void.

Title: Dungeon Heart
Synopsis: The death of an old dwarf, the reincarnation of an old soul into a dungeon. He was expecting a peacefull, lonely death, and now he is a dungeon. Well, it could be worse, after all, dwarves are at home underground. Now he has to re-discover how to survive in this new life. He and his creations must carve out their place in the world with their own hands. Note: Currently trying to update every Tuesday  week.

Title: Musica
Synopsis: Chun Mo our little protagonist a simple newly graduated student from the conservatory was suddenly transported to another world where music is none existent. Join him on his journey on spreading the wonder of music.

Title: Throne of Bones
Synopsis:
After sitting on the Throne of Bones for countless centuries, the first Arch-Necromancer in the history walked of the stage. He had cheated death for over a thousand years and still wasn´t able to break the chains of his mortal body. His wish to ascend to godhood failed miserably. In his over a thousand year long regain nobody ever dared to attack his people, but the iron fist he used to frighten his enemies also scared his own people. He had no family and friends anymore, death claimed them all sooner or later, everything that death left him was a kingdom scared of his own ruler. So he embraced death like an old friend.
Nobody remembers this king. Not even a legend of him remains anymore. Somebody only truly dies when nobody remembers this person anymore. The kingdom which he build with his blood and sweat didn´t exist much longer than his thousand year guard. The kingdoms enemies only feared the old monster nobody else, soon after these enemies heard from his death they attacked and destroyed his kingdom. Who these enemies were? Well who hates Necromancer more than the holy church?   But life and death mealy are the opposite sites of a coin. After wandering many years the soul of the first necromancer finally found his way to rebirth. Follow him on his path to reclaim his beloved throne of bones. Who knows maybe you get to watch how he creates his own road to godhood.

Title: Little Legs
Synopsis:
"Have you ever considered that you might be involved in a terrible incident? Yeah... me neither... It makes you think. Makes you think about everything in a different way. It changes the way you percieve everything. Everything changes and nothing stays the same..."
 
Aimi Rapp was just a normal girl. She attended class, did her homework, hung out with her friends, and made mistakes. However, one day, Aimi makes a mistake that will send her spiraling down a tunnel of pain, regret and misery. No one could have guessed what fate had in store for Aimi...

Title: The Game [SCRAPPED]
Synopsis:
Adrian is your regular computer nerd and shutin, or that is what he used to be.
One night Adrian gets frustrated while watching footage of a game that just released which was very hyped, the game was not what he thought it would be and it was not made in a way he liked, so adrian decided. 'I need some food!' and he walks downstairs. Or well, he tries too. He slipped when he was gonna walk down the stairs and ended up dying, but was luckily selected to be a part of 'The Game' as a contestant.
How will it go?
--------
Feel free to criticise me on my spelling or obvious writing mistakes. I'm a beginner at writing but I hope to improve.
I hope you enjoy my story and I hope I can convey it in a enjoyable way!
 
WARNING: This story contains a lot of mature content, read at your own discretion.

Title: Into the Unknown
Synopsis:
Time travel... is a complete lie. 
There is no such thing as time travel, once an event has occurred there is no changing it no matter how one tries it is simply, for a lack of better terms. Set in stone. But while traveling to the past is a complete lie seeing what the future holds is not.
Going to the future is merely called living. If one wants to see the distant future, all it takes is figuring out how increase their life span, by one way or another. Be it for 100 years 200, or a thousand years. But by doing this, you eliminate all the things you know all the certainty’s in life and simply travel into the unknown.
 
This is my first book. I will be writing in my free time. All creative responses and criticisms are welcome. My grammar is not any were near good so I will be taking my time.

Title: My uneventful life changed...

Title: Lone: The Wanderer [Old Version]
Synopsis:
Nine-to-five. The daily grind. Life. Painful years of school. Working as a slave for some undeserving corporate big-wig. The monotonous life of unemployment. We all experience this in one way or another, and we can all conclude one thing: it's dull.
Such a fact rings true even for the fabled Lone Immortus, a powerful nine-tailed Golden Foxkin. However, what would you do if your monotony was suddenly ground to a halt and you were thrown out of your comfort zone along with a young girl forgotten by time?
Perhaps you might have done things differently, been more organised, immediately died, gained control of the world in a matter of days, but this is Lone's tale, not yours.
Watching two insecure people struggle to survive and find their place in an unfamiliar land just might be enjoyable to witness. Who knows? One thing's for certain: it won't be an easy path for them to tread, and what could possibly be more entertaining than watching people endure hardships and grow?
I know of at least eight gods that would answer with, 'Absolutely nothing.'
I wonder, after seeing this journey from start to finish, how would you answer?
[Goal of 2 chapters per week, the only exceptions being announced breaks or emergencies]

A/N: This story is in the middle of a rewrite, so please forgive any noticeable plot holes and wonky chapter numbers. I am working on it every day, so understanding would be greatly appreciated.

The new cover art is a courtesy of the very kind and talented ssddx.

This novel is a participant in The Writer's Pledge

Title: A Trace of Heroism
Synopsis:
As the 7th son of the 43rd generation of the 1st Hero, Axel does not have many aspirations.
With his talent in the sword, he could probably barely slay a tame pig. With his talent in magic, he could probably light up his room. And with his talent in business, lets just say he'd go bankrupt if he didn't have a bank account limiting the money he could use.
Compared to his 1st brother, the most famous general of the North, or the rest of his family, which happen to include famous magicians, adventurers, knights, merchants, and even nobility, he was a piece of trash. 
However, sleeping within him lay the power of a Hero. With it, he could slay dragons, call down thunderstorms, and even slay demon kings.
So when an event rocks the whole North continent, will he be able to protect his people, his family, and save those closest to him?

Title: Spirits Maligned
Synopsis:
Sophie is your average middle schooler–except for the fact she’s top in her class and has been asked by her teachers to help tutor several subjects. While admittedly lacking some experience where boys are concerned, Sophie agrees with her parents she isn’t ready for that stuff yet.
One night, she gets a phone call from a classmate who presents her with an unexpected request–to draw his picture. At first she is a little tense about talking to a boy on the phone for something other than schoolwork, but as they chat she gradually warms up to him and eventually agrees to meet him.
At the boy’s house the next day, things are going fine until he whips out a bottle that looks suspiciously like alcohol, another thing she wasn’t prepared to get involved with. But Sophie soon learns that his intentions are far more sinister than she could ever imagine, causing catastrophic problems for the city, if not the world.
Spirits Maligned will take you on a crazy ride to discover the mystical origin of alcohol in a tale equal parts greed and redemption. Those who cannot control the spirits will be controlled themselves.

The Thief. The Mad. The Murderer. The Calamity.History talks about those and more men, and their many deeds.What it doesn't tell is that all of them were only one man.He was known by many names.The Summoner.So, tell me, haven't you heard of him before?It doesn't matter, so listen, as I will tell his story one last time.

Synopsis:
Luki, who originally was jobless suddenly die. He really excited when he thought he died but God from another world really disappointed him by sending him to another world without his permission!
 
"I don't want to go to another world! I just want to die!"
 
"Because of your impudent behaviour, you have been granted immortality until your task is done!" said God.
 
"GODDAMNIT!" Thus begin his adventure to erase his immortality and rest in piece, if he didn't end up rest in pieces!
 
PS: My first story and my first writing in English because it is not my mother language.

Title: First Academy
Synopsis:
At sixteen, Leigh had lived in her brother's shadow for as long as she could remember.
No matter how hard she tried, studied, worked or trained... she always fell short of his accomplishments.
But all of her shortcomings would not matter, not if she managed to get Selected First...
On the night of the Selection, a shocking turn of events propel her into the path she's always dreamed of, but success turned out to be not what she expected.
It was dark with a bitter aftertaste.

Title: Dungeons: Rising of a new soul
Synopsis:
So it should rise! Till it pierces the sky or the core of the world.
So it should  grow!
So it should live!
 ON HIATUS ( sorry people, I made a mess of the story before really starting it , I have too much ideas and don't know where to begin and then where to go , so I have to organize it)
Author :Welcome to my first story, I discover the writing world so here is the product of my imagination and my will to share it . The prologue is  announcing almost nothing of the rest of the story, but I had to write it to commit myself to the writing of this story.
I'm open to criticism if it's constructive. I will go at my rythm so no schedule, but if something is on hiatus or dropped I will notify you. Good reading.

Title: Absolute Knowledge
Synopsis: My life changed in a matter of minutes. The choices I made led me to a life of crime and caused me to become the worst sort of criminal; I became a traitor to the country of New York. For better or worse, the path my life has taken is irreversible. I’ve killed, I’ve died, and I’ve risked my life in attempt to destroy a society built on over one hundred years of lies and corruption. My name is Jacob Ashton, and this is my story.Absolute Knowledge is the first of a cyberpunk science fiction trilogy which takes place in a dark, futuristic New York City set in 2146. The country of New York is divided into three physical tiers and the faceless Government is working to establish Absolute Knowledge.Working as Thinkers, the citizens of the Slums are paid for their thoughts and given vouchers needed to sustain their cost of living. Since the Government controls almost everything, most citizens are forced to either work as Thinkers or turn to a life of disconnect from society under the harshest of conditions.In Absolute Knowledge, every thought has a price.

Title: Bonecaller (The War on Magic #1)
Synopsis: Raven's a dreamer trapped by a witch at the Edge of the dark wood. Her only friend, Sim, can read the stars. When Raven whispers the name of an ancient power, she steals an old and illegal magic, and inserts herself into a war. She draws the attention of the Marshal, a collector, who hunts people for a purpose of his own. John's a ship captain who's tired of running. The murder of his twin has been a mystery he's spent most of his life trying to solve. Directed by a soothsayer to find two people of magic for answers, a stowaway throws him into the war he's been avoiding. She's a witch fleeing for her life and John finds himself fighting for someone he barely knows.Answers for both Raven and John lie in unlocking dark secrets. If Raven doesn't embrace her destiny, her power could be used to conquer the world. If John can't remember his past, he may lose the love of his future. Both might lose everything.Bonecaller is a young adult fantasy of wizards and witches, keeps and dragons; an adventurous tale of ancient magic that will balance the powers of good and evil.

Title: MALEFICENCE
Synopsis: SYNOPSISSeveral people say life is a game, and mine is certainly no different, save for the fact that I'm playing for stakes a little higher than the rest.I'm a player. The board is the world, the game world domination. With nothing but my wits and rationality, I'll challenge this unforgiving world. I am Lancelot Amon, and this is my story.  Disclaimer:R-18: Contains profanity, descriptive sex, (hopefully) traumatising content, and gore. ? ? ?There will be graphic depictions of RAPE. There will be graphic depictions of TORTURE. There will be graphic descriptions of gore. There will be explicit depictions of suffering, torment and anguish. This story is NOT for the faint of heart, neither for the squeamish.? ? ?  The story may contain propaganda, and contain Author's opinions on Philosophy, Politics, Religion, and other bodies of knowledge.

Title: Legends of Tarthirious: Book Three of Kylia's Story
Synopsis:
This title is available on Kindle Unlimited and Amazon.
The third book in the Legends of Tarthirious series sees Kylia Redmond start to pull her life together and gain some stability after the past few weeks of arrest, near-death, and complete Hell that has surrounded her. With more focus on having fun in the game, it's shown that she is having an easier time completing some of her goals when she's got her head screwed on straight.

Title: The Mage who Walked through worlds
Synopsis:
Synopsis:
The world was clouded in fear, this was because information... no... it was proven that witches wizards and the likes exist. This happened and made a global phenomena.
At first everyone accepted these magic using men and women but things turned for the worst and it became a witch hunt. Men and women were burned at stakes starting from the weakest of them all children and aged men and women were slaughtered. Then the more powerful of them were singled out by armies.
These people were not seen in a different light because of some accident but because they were seen as different.  As monsters who threatens the world as they knew it. Soon the world leaders made the decision and finally the last man was caught.
Alfred Woncaster, the greatest and youngest archmage to have ever been lived. He was hidden and the whole mage populace wanted him to survive as they saw him as their hope. But after a few years of the hunt he was caught and now...
In front of the whole world he was to be burned at stake...

Title: The Conversion: Rise of the Black Flame
Synopsis: The continents have collided and the Vatican has seized control. People have been forced to forsake their god for one they barely know. Katalina Torrés has known only death and sadness. She never believed in destiny or the Fates. At least, not until her first Death Warrant is issued. Now, she is running for her life and trying to come to terms with her destiny. The question is, can she free her people from oppression? Or is the world too far gone to be saved?

Title: Ka'artspel
Synopsis:
In the year 3473 a man named Kart Springfield popularized a card game known as Ka'artspel which in just 2 days took the world by storm.
Now legally accepted as a sport, Ka'artspel is now played by almost every single person in the world!
Little did everyone know that Ka'artspel is not just a normal card game but a gateway to a whole new world.
Follow a set of people with varying age as they unlock the mysteries of the game.
-
Hello! Freezing here. This  is my first ever fiction and I'm still in my 1st year in college so please bear with my grammar.
This fiction is very similar to yu-gi-oh which is where i got the idea from.
Also I have no clue if card games plus novels is such a good idea.(lol Im gonna try it anyways)
Thank you for reading this!

Title: Deck of Cards
Synopsis:
Echo, 18 year old man, with a horrible past is summoned to an another world with his class. The reason for their summoning is Simple: kill the demon lords.
AN: it won't be the usual "MC is weak or/and has useless skill and later is betrayed by his classmates" kinda story.

Title: War in the Greenwood
Synopsis:
The game world is burning and the forests are on fire…
Newly promoted ranger, Barcud, provokes the anger of the evil city of Horrabia, and rumours of war abound. In a race against time, Barcud must found a village at a strategic river crossing, level it and defend it against the oncoming threat.
But the Rangers Guild can't fight a whole city on their own, and they must seek allies among the unwilling, the unreliable and the wicked in order to survive.
A story set in a virtual reality MMO where PVP is universal and heavy griefing is allowed by the developers to make the stakes ever more real for players. 
Elements of city building and strategic total war bring this conflict alive and force Barcud to the limits of his abilities as he faces loyalty, loss and likely destruction.
Set immediately after A Player in the Greenwood, war is now brewing between the evil city of Horrabia and the city of Vinab for Vinab's part in the humiliating raid by the Rangers Guild and their Vinab allies on Horrabia.
Horrabia is raising troops and preparing armies. The ranger Barcud is in the Forest of Nightmares picking poisons when he observes a meeting meant to be secret. He is sure that it is something to do with the impending war.

Title: Drive Time
Synopsis:
Three friends just invented a machine that can send messages back in time. Can they use the machine to rescue humanity from a bleak future?
Technological evolution is about to become supercharged.
Simon, Spencer, and Victor have rewritten the rules of physics. The human race is heading towards a dead-end future, and these three friends are the only ones willing to stand up and save humanity from itself. Using their Time Drive technology, they will reshape reality itself until it's inhabitants are guarded against extinction.Time manipulation is not an easy task; along the way, there will be mishaps and wrong turns, but the trio think they have time on their side. The problem is, time doesn't take sides.

Title: Magician's Tale
Synopsis:
A tale of a young boy, who learns of his mistakes and his future. A question about ability and relationships. 
The division of a faction - the creation of new conflict among the citizens of the people of Ulgard. Ern, a destitute young man of 18, lives with his mother in peace, which cracks under the craze of the people for a war. Having lived already 18 years with his mother, Ern faces the decision to either enlist on one side, or declare neutrality and risk escaping from the political tension of the young empire. 
-----------------------
Please leave your thoughts on the chapter in the comments, it does motivate me! ;)

Title: The Hero of Aerda
Synopsis: Darren, a young man living in a small one-bedroom apartment, working 20 hours a week at McRonalds while he studies for a degree at college suddenly dies from choking on instant noodles. Immediately after death, he is offered a second chance at life by the 8 Elder gods of another world named Aerda. Darren accepts their offer and is thrust into his new life full of magic, warriors, different races and adventure waiting to happen.This story will be the first I have ever attempted to write. So I am sorry if there are mistakes, I will actively try to better myself throughout the story and hopefully, it will be good enough for you the readers to wish to continue reading it as I upload.This story will feature slight gore and profanity as it is set in a world where battles happen. I cannot say for sure if sexual themes will be introduced or not as of yet but if they will be I will certainly update this text.Thank you for reading.

Title: When Plush comes to Shove
Synopsis:
An: So the last synopsis wasn’t really all that good, it was just some mumbo jumbo with no actual point to it so I decided to make a new one that’s a bit more accurate.
Leo Lush, just your average everyday (slightly chubby) schmuck, or at least he would be if he didn’t carry around a stuffed toy everywhere he went.I mean, he was a man who could read the atmosphere a bit so put it away in his bag whenever having a stuffed toy out would be rude but other than that he brought it with him all the time, it was a memento from his girlfriend who had died three years ago and keeping it close made him feel better.
That’s also why his classmates gave him the nickname “Plush”, though that's neither here nor there.
One day at the train station he’d lost his dearest stuffed toy, one of his classmates found it and lobbed it towards him, something that they’d already done many times before, but this time something went wrong and Leo found himself falling in front of the train due to the force of the throw.
Now follow Leo as the spirit that developed in his stuffed toy and killed him forces his ghost into another world to possess a different stuffed toy.
He doesn’t know much about the world or why he’s there but what he does know is that according to a magic book his girlfriend was also sent to this very world when she died in a plane accident three years ago.
An: For those who want to know a bit more about what kind of story this will be: I want it to be a chill feel-good story and stay as far away from those despair-fest stories as possible (No offense to people who enjoy them, I’m just not one of you)Let me make something clear; I’m not writing this story with hope of it becoming really top tier among RRL (Though it did get above rank 500 once which I’m still very proud of even though it’s gone back down to ~850 at the time of writing this) I just want to write a story that I would enjoy reading, that’s why I’ll be mostly skipping over a lot of the parts that I skip when I read other stories, such as stats, the exact value of money and other such precise statistics that no one(as far as I’m aware) really cares about all that much. Just feels like a lot of effort for something superfluous.There’s a single exception and that’s one of the battles, it’s not a despair-fest or anything but it’s got a different feel than the rest of the story due to me being in a funky mood while I was writing it.

Title: A Persona User in a Marvel and DC world
Synopsis:
This is the story of a boy recarnated into the Marvel and Dc Universe where he gaining the power of his favorite video game series.
