Title: GAME OVER a daily life of a video game boss
Synopsis: Set in a MMORPG, Aia a smart A.I. who handles the statistics for a game world, was framed for sabotage. As punishment, she finds herself handling a living and breathing beginner's world, along with its adversaries.

Title: CEO Transported to Another World
Synopsis: Seeing unfamiliar faces, Maibara Sato woke up in a medieval era castle only to find out that he is now in the body of a young duke named Henry. Using his knowledge in modern world, he will utilize his brilliant management skills to create an empire that will unify the whole continent.

Title: The Black Steel Legion
Synopsis:
The world is torn by war on all sides races fight for supremacy all over the world, but in one kingdom it is even worse they are fighting each other three sides are fighting for the throne but one of them has gained mighty allies that just might change whole war or perhaps the whole world?
 
Ps: Cover is owned by an amazing artist not mine!

Title: Rise of Desiderium
Synopsis:
The year is 2257 and Earth is in the middle of the largest tech age it has ever seen.
Food problems have become a thing of the past.
Population issues have been managed due to colonization of Mars.
And online gaming has become a boon to civilization due to the advancements of VRTech.
We follow a 25 year old man named Axel Desiderium. A man who has found his genius to be more annoying then anything.
His day starts off normally with all essentials taken care of and logging into Xandria Online in order to make enought money to get through the month.
Except his routine is disrupted once he logs out and sees two men in his room waiting for him.
Who are these men? What do they want with him? And why is he getting the feeling that it cant be anything pleasent?
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Thank you for taking the time to read my novel. This is my first time writing and would greatly appreciate any comments that y'all could leave. I hope you enjoy the read!

Title: The Wizard - A Death's Treasure
Synopsis:
The city of Lansing is no stranger to murder. In fact besided being one of the top intersection in the world it is also the highest of missing person and death. Some people call it the lost city but to me its home. 
Last summer I was summoned to be a hero for another world. At first it was great then I learned the truth of war and how it changes people. From betrayal of lovers to staining my hand with the blood of the innoceen after over two decades I defeated the evil lord and found my peace.
As lay there dying I welcomed the embrace of death but sadly it eluded me. The next thing I know I'm back in my world and not only is it the same world but magic, monsters, an a whole book of nightmare exist as well.

Title: So the title's too long---
Synopsis:
Title: A Book Capturing Destructive Elephant Flies Gradually Higher, Jostling Knights Learning Magic Not Of Practice, Quite Rarely Seen To Underestimate Very Weird Xenophobes Yelling Zombies
Anyways, buffaloes can't decide even for gruesome hours in jail, killing lemurs means no popsicles, quiet rest sends two unusual vultures wiping xylocarps' yellow zeaxanthin.

Title: Celeste Academy
Synopsis:
The boundary between Valemnia and Earth has been breached by demons. Although knights who go by the name Celestes have managed to take things back under their control, demons who escaped to Earth have to be hunted down.
When fate decided to turn at the wrong time, seventeen-year-old Valeriana Kerrigan ended up in the clutches of a demon she escaped from at a price—her choice. Her unfortunate involvement served as wind in her sail to leave neutral waters, hence, she reluctantly steps into the chaotic shores of a different world where the only way to leave and live is to enter and learn to fight.
Even so, Valemnia’s problem with demons may take more than just learning how to wield a sword and getting along with its element-bending locals. To keep the boundaries strong between her world and the other, Valeriana would have to learn how to let go of her humanity. Literally.
But is this world worth losing it for?

Title: Popadoplonomicon
Synopsis:
Hello, I'm fairly new.  I decided that instead of keeping all of the random stories I come up with all to myself I'd start sharing them.  A lot of them are usually scenes, settings, or conversations, so I'm going to put the random ones here.  If I start having ideas to expand them farther than just short stories (more than ~3 "chapters") I'll separate them into their own fictions.  It'll also be a kind of encyclopedia for my worldbuilding info and such since some folks, myself included, just can't get  enough of worldbuilding details.
WARNING!!!!
Some of the information here might spoil parts of my actual stories and I'm probably not going to be able to tag it every time.

Title: The Road of Time
Synopsis:
Leaving his only partner, he treaded for the last battle.
Gifting his memento to her, casting it with a single promise.
The mysterious thread of destiny, the unpredictable flow of time.
Nobody know how it play, but everyone know how it would end.

Title: Lancelot Deep Impact
Synopsis:
Lancelot
Chapter Prologue
Dungeon the product of Fantasy Novel where magic and monsters live, became life Fue tecnology in 22th century.
By the end of the 21st century the land was polluted and overcrowded. So the world has become a huge favela and where the world is controlled the military police of each country.
Due to the drastic global climate cooling that began in the year 2075, food supplies were decreased energy sources were frequently disputed.
Approximately in the year 2090 the third world war was released with a duration of 20 years with which the population fell 3 billion inhabitants.
The fact that the war was not convert in a thermonuclear war, was due to the appearance of foreign objects the size of football stadiums, in different parallels of the world, with the following label:
"If you're looking for a destination where you can get resources, riches and have the adventure of a lifetime, this is the perfect place for you Lancelot Dungeon."
People stopped fighting each other, with this the adventurers were born, the new adventure form human race begin.

Title: The Great Summoner
Synopsis: The Great Summoner Died and passed his knowledge onto someone but that someone does not know about that knowledge just yet, who knows maybe soon? or maybe never?

Title: Front Tide
Synopsis:
He was stranded. Lost, surrounded, and no way out. 
 
--
The cover is done by iillya. You can find him in Reddit.

Title: Daeva
Synopsis:
I was born out of chaos. I constructed the world, so why is it that I am alone? I can save or kill million in a heartbeat but am I alone? What do I do, I love my creation but something is missing. Maybe I should, well its worth a try.
"LET THERE BE LIGHT"
But there it is, and somethin is still missing.
"LET THE SUN HAVE A PARTNER THE LUNAR STAR"
And still I am alone, why?

Title: The Champi0n System
Synopsis:
On an average summer day 16-year old Jack was on his way home from school, when he without reason found himself standing in a black space. There he was forced to choose a class, and then thrown into a world filled with monsters and mythological creatures.
However, as fun as that might seem he is quickly beaten and taken to do slave labour in the mines of some lord. As he works, he learns more about the world and what it actually is. Will he be stuck in this life as a mienr forever? Or will he set out on an adventure, finding his own place in this new, confusing world?

Title: Artamos
Synopsis:
The first fully immersive VR game, Artamos, has just been released. Louis Cartel, the protaganist, gets his hands on a DivePod, but after several unfortunate events and a glitch, he becomes what might be the most broken character known in the game!
A story of fantasy, war, friends and more! Watch as the name of 'Lartel' becomes a legend among legends.

Title: After Life
Synopsis:
Gerald Smith, a man met with more criticism than praise, was one of the seven heroes who sacrificed their life to slay Genesis the Demon King.
Expecting to never wake up again, Gerald realized he was reincarnated as a baby named Matthew to a supportive noble family.
Believing he was given a chance to live a better life, he embraced the opportunity with open arms.
However life is never so lenient with sinful men...
------------------
First story and I'm just looking to improve my craft with this.

Title: Class: Space Marine
Synopsis: It all started with an idea. Zane was going to play test a new class for Dungeons and Dragons. He was going to be a Space Marine. What he did not know was that he would soon be living with his choices in a fantasy world...

Title: Random Survival - An experiment into humanity
Synopsis: What would you do if you were offered the chance to take part in a 5 to 10 year long psychological study, into the habits of humans?  How about if there was a sizeable monetary incentive once the study was completed?  Sam is a guy who had a pretty rough life growing up, so when he heard about this once in a lifetime opportunity he was eager to take part in it.  The only problem is that sometimes you need to read the fine print, before jumping into a new situation, especially a psychological study that no one knows the details about aside from the cash payout at the end.  It can't be too hard to get through the experiment and reap the rewards, right?

Title: Aura master
Synopsis:
Its journey of a soul ..in world full of terror ..come and join his journey and tribulation..
 
 
Its my first novel and english is not first languange ..pls be kind

Title: In a diffirent world with One Piece system. cliche? No it's a cancer cliche
Synopsis:
Alex Kel August, an Otaku and hardcore fan of One Piece, also an underground fighter ( watch 'Undisputed' if you don't get it). Got shot and died in a fight .Short and easy to understand right? Got reincarnated into another world with One Piece system. Now follow our MC on his journey to become a Muffin God
            -----------//-----------
This is my first time writing and only for fun also I'm not a native so there are sure to have a lot of mistakes. If you find any leave comment and I will fix it. Thank you

Title: I Just Want a Way Out of This Cliche World!
Synopsis:
"Alright I did it, defeated the bad guy, saved the day and everyone is happy now...so why the hell am I still here?!"
I honestly thought that my otherwordly adventure would be better, but it was hard to enjoy it when everything felt as if the guy that worked on it didn't have a single ounce of originality on his body. From the setting o the people, this world of fantasy felt like nothing but a cheap knock-off of something way better, so you can imagine how much I just wanted to go back to my everyday, mundane life, but I apparently underestimated this world a little bit too much.
"What do you mean I can't leave?!"
From Hero to the most wanted person in the whole world, I won't let such a crappy fantasy world get the best of me, even if it meant having to face a world that wants nothing but to keep me here. Sorry everyone, but I should be worrying about exams, not about ruling a 3/10 game world at best!

Title: Dismantle the world
Synopsis: rewriting everything

Title: My Hundredth Life
Synopsis:
I was an ordinary guy, living an ordinary life, until it happened. What we came to call the "Reality Break". Monsters started spawning in the streets, Mana flowed through our veins, Skills and Abilities were unlocked, and everyone had a Status Screen. I was living my dream, an RPG apocalypse! Until I died, that is. And woke up in a new world...where I died again. And again. With each death, a new incarnation, a new game world, and new scars upon my soul. Now, at my 99th death, I just wish it would end...but unlike in some of the worlds I have "played" in, this time my wish is not granted. 
 
***
Author's Note: This is my first 'serious' attempt at writing a story. I am hoping to turn ths into a series that I can publish to Amazon, but my life is a bit hectic right now, so I can't make any guarantees. However, I have serious reasons for writing at this point in my life, so I will do my best to provide this new twist to the LitRPG genre and keep it up for as long as possible. Thank you, to anyone who reads this.
*Also, tags might change depending on how the story goes, there may be mild profanity or mild sexual content, but I have not decided yet.

Title: New Age
Synopsis:
I lived my life in a stupor. Sitting in jail for crimes I may or may not have commited, which I have. When the radios start spewing static and the televisions only show blue and a mysterious voice echos throughout the pod my life changes. This is my life after my dream finally came true, the day a drastic change will wake me from my stupor.

This is my first story I'm showing to the outside world beside an old roomate. Criticism is very welcome, don't like something tell me, may or may not change. Hopefully people will enjoy what I create.

Title: Sense of impending doom
Synopsis: Transported to a world where monsters and magical spells exist, how will our protagonist survive and adapt in this alien environment that superficially resembles Earth yet has completely different inhabitants and rules?

Title: The Arena
Synopsis:
In an Arena, 2 Contestants enter but only one leaves.
This is a story set in a fantasy world, it is also the first time I have tried to write a story. It might be horrible, but too bad.

Title: A Shameless Self-Insert Story Found on RRL
Synopsis:
Another slightly unique yet completely generic main character gets to go to another fantasy world. A fat man to be precise... Adventures, generic waifus, OP cooking skills and all. And also- piss off, AnalReads (Analytic Readers), I don't need you guys rating my fic!
P.S. I'm not the main character but a tentacle monster that will appear later.
This fic is crowd-fluffed, meaning that I only wrote the bare bones on the story while other people add flesh to it. It’s like a skeleton that other people tossed rotting meat onto so I could call it a zombie.

Title: Path of True Edge
Synopsis: The laws are created by the strong and obeyed by the weak. If the strong do not enforce the laws, who will? If the laws are not enforced, who would obey them? In a world where no good deed goes unpunished, chaos and evil reign supreme. This is the story of one man's path to create a sanctuary of justice and fairness.

Title: The Foxy Dungeon
Synopsis:
Inspired by stories like The Slime Dungeon and Arnar the dungeon, This is my dungeon tale with the mystical Yokai, Kitsune!
 
Kitsune, Foxes with great magical power as well as being naturally gifted in illusions. They also hold the power to take human form. Now is the time to make their race known to the world through the powers of a newly born dungeon!

Title: The Arrogant Young Master tramples the Heroes
Synopsis:
Now, what Transported to Another World story would be complete without him?  The generic Arrogant Young Master that picks a fight with the main character for no good reason and gets trampled.  Only... if we're being honest, aren't many of these MCs just as self-absorbed, impulsive, and irresponsible as any spoiled rich kid?  Isn't it time someone taught them a lesson?  So join this rare intelligent (but still arrogant) young master as he seeks to rein in the irresponsible heroes that are rampaging across his world.
My first story, and my attempt to give something back after enjoying many excellent stories here on RoyalRoad.  Not sure how many chapters I can squeeze out of this, it's meant more for a quick laugh and hopefully some katharsis for those of us who are sick of steriotypical plots and idiot MCs.

Title: The Warrens
Synopsis:
The Warrens is a story about four siblings (quadruplets); a spy, a mechanic/inventor, an assassin, and a detective (though they kept it from each other), who are trying to save their parents.
One day, Nica, one of the quadruplets, found a pair of black headphones, and that's when their 'normal' lives went haywire. Libero, an organization who wants to rule the world using mind control, are after them. the question though, was 'why?'.
Will they be able to save what matters most in the end?
 
This is my first story here in Royal Road Legends! Hope you appreciate it!

Title: Pending Publication ( Letters From Beyond )
Synopsis:
>>Taken off line at this time. Will be made availiable through my Blog as an ongoing peice of experimental Fiction at: https://ascensionnovel.wixsite.com/scribblings <<
 
Letters from Beyond has been taken offline at this time as it has been selected for possible publication in a monthly periodical. If this in fact comes to fruition, where Letters from Beyond and many other great pieces of fiction will be accessable will be updated here.
Letters From Beyond will be an experiment. It will be written in the form of letters from an Author who pushed on his gift too hard and fell out of our universe and into a new one, a universe where Magic and Technology work in concert, each with their strengths, weaknesses, and where he, as an author, needs to learn the powers and abilities he gained as part of what happened to land him in this new world.
As part of this, question posed in the comments of a letter will be answered by Scribe in following letters.
 >>Taken off line at this time. Will be made availiable through my Blog as an ongoing peice of experimental Fiction at: https://ascensionnovel.wixsite.com/scribblings <<

Title: Leticia
Synopsis: Leticia is just a everyday 17yr old psycho. You know murder and mayhem, that kind of thing. But she also occasionally gets involved with super heroes. Let's watch her steal, disfigure, and kill normal people, heroes, and villians alike while getting cool toys.

Title: Origin of the Best Void Magician
Synopsis:
There were five students walking on the way to their own homes. Yet while walking they were flashed with blinding light and a magic cirlces surrounds them, lead them to another world. Is this the what so called Isekai?
Being summoned as hero, all five of them first to check their [Skill], ablessing from the goddess. And one of them, Kagerou Ibuki was granted [Void Magic].
But whats this? They gave him a scorned expressions towards him. What? [Void Magic] is useless? Due to that, he was kicked out of the castle. How he will survive with the so called useless [Skill]?

Title: Forsaken Blood
Synopsis: The world before you has led to an entirely different endpoint then the one modern earth has taken.Technology, gasolines, pollution, are all but forgotten. Replaced by magic and magical constructs.Government is just as twisted however, filled by a council resembling our congress merely with no defined leader. These councils are run by Bloodline Priests and Priestesses.As you can see, nothing is the same but persecution follows us everywhere sadly, in every single timeline and universe.This time the Forsaken; witches or warlocks to strong for their own good are at the bottom of the chain. Majority rules I guess.

Title: The change apocalypse
Synopsis:
All was well it was his 17 birthday he had his friend his family and his struggles then as he woke up it all changed what will Ross do now will he change will he submit and die or thrive as the world ends and begins a new 
 
The MC Ross is based of a person I know who suffers from Asperger's.
I aim for each chapter to be around/above 3000 words and any advice is welcome

Title: Private Eye: The beginning of the adventure
Synopsis:
Sam Willus, age 42, war hero, exhusband, father, hero, demon, savior, murderer, and private eye, has taken a job that seems to be simple at first glance, but what would happen if the situation goes south.
Join Sam on the adventure he never wanted. will he live, or die a horrible gruesome death.

Title: Mr. Rich
Synopsis:
"Hey cutomer give five jingshi to this kind waiter..."
"Hey alcemist give this one thousand jinjshi to this handsom apprentice of yours..."Our main character
"Hey crown prince give five thousand jingshi to this life brother of yours..." Our main character
"Hey genuis cultivator give this ten thouand jingshi to this junior apprientiece of yours" Our main character
 
"Hey the man in the hood I think you dropped this one jingshi" Ling Tong called out.
"Hey boy are you trying to steal from me! I cleaerly dropped sixteen thousand and five jingshi." the hooded figure said as took off his hood.
"Nooooo, how come your are here." Ling Tong screamed with horor.
"Young boy it's time to repay me, those four jingshi with some intrest will equal up to all your wealth, HAHAHA"

Title: The Uprising
Synopsis:
After centuries of research and experimentation mankind had brought about drastic changes to the earth and it's inhabitants. The contitnents have morphed and merged, plant and animal life has evovled in unimaginable ways and the world has become a chaotic place to live.
Many cities in the world have been lost to war, destruction or experimentation causing the many old nations and countries to lose their borders and indivuality. From the chaos of instability rose a man capable of leading the people who rose to the seat of the world's ruler; the Monarch.
Under this man's rule many old traditions have been reinstated and the bans on many cruel and unspeakable acts have been lifted. The biggest change brought about was the legalisation of human experimentation.
In the year of 2521 a young boy, oppressed and used by corrupted adults and madmen decides to break free of his slavers and fight for freedom. But more than anything else, revenge against the ones who treated him like tool of war and research.

Title: Anya
Synopsis:
The sun, with all its radiance, left this world long ago. In this land of savage beasts and unrestrained violence, contested zones rich with resources remain as the last bastions of mankind. Still, life was not well as small towns struggled to produce both the food and fuel necessary to sustain life.
It was in one of these towns that Anya was born.
Forced out of the only dwelling she had ever called home, the girl now must journey through the desolate wastes in search of purpose and a place where she may belong. Be warned, these lands show no mercy, not even to a sheltered child…

Title: When the Heavens Fell
Synopsis: Waking up to endless opportunities or hell on earth. The philosophical conundrum of the ones who survived. Would the world become your heaven or he'll when the heavens fell?

Title: The Soul Seeker
Synopsis:
Note: My English is bad, so please tell me if i make a mistake. Oh, and this is my first writing, so please give me some tips how i make it better.
Norman, a guard of a village gate. His live is just like the other gate guard, checking the peoples that enters. But that changed, the demon army invades the village and burn it to ash. People are killed mercilessly, including him. But what awaits him isnt death. The people that died got one more chance in another world. And they can go back their own world, but with a circumstance. They need to save the other world from total destrucion caused by the resurrection of all demon kings there. What awaits them?

Title: Records
Synopsis: By accident, an author got herself caught into a world of crime. She wakes up to the world she dwells in, surrounded by messages left from her future self.  Left with just the limited time she has, this is her story; Delia's story.

Title: World Monster
Synopsis:
"I have no idea who I am. I have no idea where I am from. All I know is that in this world, only the strong survive. And I intend to survive"
What would you do if you were suddenly brought to a world where arcane arts reigned supreme?
(Translated from an original piece that I wrote in Japanese)

Title: Demonic Intervention
Synopsis:
The Burrows.A place where life is cheap, and safety an illusion. Located in a natural prison, the great slum of Cedia is home to many a cut-throat. One of them a certain street rat, who shouldn't have signed a certain Contract..."What you thinking about, Boss?""Nothing, Gob. Just contemplating about past regrets.""Dick still burning from last night’s whore, eh Boss?"He definitely shouldn’t have signed that Contract.
Release Schedule (Edited on 10/10/2017): Currently on hold.
Feedback comments badly needed. Reviews much appreciated.

Title: Survival in the New World
Synopsis: Welcome to the dungeon, the entrance to another world.
